desc: Hotel is having a good location next to Orchard Road. Clean and good standard. Bed comfort is medium good. Pillows are very basic level. Food is reasonable not good not bad. I would try next time another hotel as the bed comfort wasn’t good for me.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: COVID-19 Customer Service
desc: My family and I have not stayed at the Quincy Hotel as we were forced to cancel our travel plans for two nights later this month due to COVID-19 travel restrictions from my company. Although I have not stayed, the Quincy will be number one on my list when we are able to return to Singapore due to their customer service. We purchased non-refundable rooms through Agoda. We asked the hotel to consider refunding our reservations due to the unusual circumstances caused by COVID-19. At first, our request was denied by the hotel. However, I just received a notice from Agoda that the Quincy decided to allow the cancellation and Agoda has credited my account with Agoda cash that I can use within the next 12 months. While it is not a refund that is credited back to my credit card, I do

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Brilliant value
desc: This hotel has top quality, super modern rooms with great beds and pillows. Fabulous staff. Best of all, a free breakfast and evening buffet with drinks. The pool has a great view. Way better value than neighbouring 5 star brad hotels, which we also tried.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome Stay
desc: Stayed at the 9th floor, awesome view. Comfy bed and huge variety of tv channels. Wifi speed is overall great. Their customer service is awesome. The Manager, Shakila Fernandez and their Senior Sales Manager, Sophia Beh has made my stay great. Cheers to both of them and their team!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome Stay
desc: Hi Quincy Team, The rooms are comfortable and cleverly designed. The bed is very comfortable. Love the free mini bar. And all the little touches that you gave during my stay, including the birthday cake for my daughter. That was very sweet. Wanna say, keep up the good work!!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Quarantine felt like a holiday
desc: Spent a week in quarantine in this hotel and the cleanliness and superb service of the staff really made the stay feel like home. I spent my birthday here which I was dreading- but throughout the entire week I had random acts of surprises from Joyee and Shakila which really warmed my heart. I was welcomed with bath bombs from Lush- great touch since the bathtub was huge. And flowers and a cake when it was my birthday (and I didn’t even tell them!) Spent lots of time by the bay window soaking in the sun and the desk space was huge and comfortable for me to work at. Would recommend this to couples/business travelers who want a unique experience rather than business hotels. :-)

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: For Quarantine
desc: I was given a 14 days quarantine notice and Quincy Hotel is where I'll be staying during the period. I'm so blessed that I got to stay at the Quincy Hotel. WHY? I shouldn't say it's a quarantine as the stay at the Quincy Hotel was just like a 2nd home to me! The staff have extended their warm hospitality. They have showed care, concern and compassion during my stay. The room was very clean and sanitised and the amenities were well taken care of. As this is a quarantine, the staff showed extra care and cautious handling me during checked in and during my swab tests. Special shout out to Shanice, who never failed called me every evening to check if I'm okay or need help and assistance. I wish to extend my appreciations and thanks for making my 'staycation' an awesome one.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A home away from home
desc: I served my Quarantine in Quincy Hotel from 16 May till 28 May 2021. In all honesty i've not heard of Quincy Hotel before thus you can be certain that this is review is non-biased. I spent 12 nights on the 8th floor of the facility. My room #802 was facing the lift hall but it also offered a splendid view of the area and it was at that moment that i realised i was conveniently located near Far East Plaza. This provided me with a wide variety of food choices around Orchard Road that i can order through various online platforms. On average i had about 4-5 orders sent to my room daily, most of which were surprises from my friends to give me encouragement and support. I would like to highlight the service of the staffs in Quincy. Orders will reach my room within minutes of their

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A Uniquely Retreat :D (Wonderful Hotel in a Great Location)
desc: Spent 11 nights here serving out my Quarantine Order and it was truly a pleasant experience. Staying alone anywhere can be tough especially when you are confined to a single room due to Quarantine but Ms. Sophia made the experience a pleasant one with regular calls to my room to check on me and finding out if there was anything i needed to be sent up, constantly making sure that i am fine. Her calls were so genuine that it really disposed that feeling of being left alone here. The room was spacious and very clean. My view was kind of obstructed due to me being on a low floor, but im pretty sure it would be amazing on a higher floor as the location is beautifully nestled near the heart of Orchard but away from the bustling traffic. The frontdesk staff here are really warm and

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful stay
desc: The customer service staff and especially Ms Phin Xing from the Sales Department is extremely helpful and caring. l am here serving my quarantine and they really listen to make my stay here extremely pleasant.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Had served quarantine order at this HORRIBLE hotel
desc: This is the WORST hotel I had ever stayed!!! Had to serve quarantine order for 9 days from 04/05/2021 to 12/05/2021. I was been allocated to room 1002 which was near the elevator. The room isn't sound proof at all... very noisy... could hear the elevator press, the staff talking at the elevator while doing collection of trash bags. The biggest problem was the aircon ventilation... there was always a loud "BANG" sound every half an hour for the entire day, even at night which deprived me of sleep. Called the front desk however there was nothing they can do... only able to provide a ear plug which was not helpful at all as the noise was really very loud. Saggy bed that gave no lumbar support. There was also water leak from the ceiling. Overall a terrible and horrible

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect Hotel!
desc: I was being checked into Room 701 from 22nd May - 1st June under quarantine order, I’m surprise that the room condition is SUPER PERFECT! I also had a switch of my meals to Western and the food is extremely tasty! Even though I’m here unwillingly, I fell in love with Quincy’s setup and given a chance, I’ll be bringing my family over to enjoy the pool amenities once Covid is over! I would also like to reiterate that during my 11 days of stay, my e-Buddy AMBERLY CHIA have been very thoughtful and attended to all my required needs, she checks in on me everyday, making sure I’m staying sane and adequate food items such as sugar for my daily coffee etc, thank you Ms Amberly! To be frank, I would have rate this perfect hotel & staffs if there’s a 6 STARS! Thank you for the smooth

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Thanks
desc: During this quarantine period, I would like to thank every staff member of the hotel and the government for the arrangements, whether it is food, accommodation, service, etc., all are handled very well for customers, and the hotel facilities do not let customers have any trouble or dissatisfaction at all, especially the waiter who will call every day to greet really well intentioned, my room number is 1401 Low Wei Dong sincerely thank you again.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Shanice
desc: Shanice was hospitable. Called every afternoon to chk if everything was ok and if i needed anything, and even called on her off day. A pleasant and caring person. This review abt her should be considered at the next appraisal.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Quarantine
desc: My mum was quarantine at Quincy hotel & her e-buddy, Shanice, was excellent. She was telling me all about her the moment she came home. She will take the effort to call my mum & ask her what she needed during her stay, e.g. snacks or coffee etc. My mum constantly praise her & she mention that she can certainly feel Shanice’s sincerity when they were talking on the phone. Thank you Shanice for the hospitality. 🌟🌟

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Special Joyee during our 10 days of Quarantine Order Stay
desc: Owe the long overdue review to all the wonderful staff at Quincy Hotel and especially our e buddy ms joyee assigned to my mom n me during our 10days quarantine stay. Having to juggle working on my latop, attending to the medical n routine needs of my elderly mom and worse of all to confine ourselves in the room for such long period, i would say the adequate room facilities kept us going. The unfavourable side of it can be taken into consideration by the hotel or team from MOH to address the issues of having elderly to stay on their own with no caregiver during the QO period as follows: - offering coaching on the various use of appliances and facilities within the room - provide non-slippery footwear as most hotel rooms flooring do not come with non-slip tiles esp in the

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A pleasant and comfortable stay
desc: Phin xing and her team had done a good job to make my stay a comfortable one. She even call up to seek for the feedback just to make sure everything goes where during my stay. Keep it up the good work.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Quarantine
desc: A big shoutout to Sophia, Front Office, Housekeeping, security, E-buddy & GQF Team to make the Quarantine stay doesn't felt like Quarantine order at all. It was definitely an splendid holidays you ever wish you can get. Sophia, front office and housekeeping teams got everything settled for you whatever and whenever you needed with just a call away, as unable to left the rooms, hence need to trouble the teams by giving them a call to get the items you need to send to you rooms. They always send it up in a jiffy. They have wide selection of food choice which you can choose from. Highly recommend the Western food, especially the American breakfast. If you get bored of hotel food, food, mart delivery is also available with your phone. The staff from hotel will send it up to you.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Quarantine
desc: I did my quarantine order from 17th July to 27th July 2021. Seriously, I never felt it was a quarantine at all. The room was so comfortable and sparkling clean. The staff were extremely compassionate and courteous at all times whenever I requested for tea bags, ice shower gel etc. Those doing the swab test for us were very professional, explaining the procedure and very patient. A special Thanks to Amberley, my e-buddy during my stay. I told her, due to my health issues, I cannot take those sweet packet drinks, I requested for bottled water instead. She told me she will try to accommodate my request. She really did try. For the rest of my stay, I was given bottled water. This shows that she did her job to make sure my health was taken care of. Once again, Thanks

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Quarantine Stay
desc: It's been a wonderful stay and the room is clean neat. During me n son ZF quarantine stay is well welcome by concierge n security upon check in and also lead us for the swap test. E-buddy Sophia had been giving friendly call on asking our wellness with all the reception and housekeeping staff that are prompt in assisting us getting our hygiene amenities needed since we unable to step out the room. Its a highly recommended hotel stay. Its will be in our staycation list in future.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation
desc: Double room, very clean & cosy, bed felt soft initially, but after a night it's just right. Staff responded spontaneously upon all request. Location not far from shopping centres. Away from traffic and pollution, quite surrounding.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Quarantine Stay 7 - 17 Aug 2021
desc: I was abit worried when I need to served QO in the hotel. But when I arrive I was so impressed the hotel lay out... The security and the hotel staff assist me promptly. Without fail every day the hotel staff check if anything they can assist me. I was so impressed with food cause previously I was inform QO meals was very bad... But what I experience beyond my expectations. The room was fantastic nice view. Without forgetting staff Shanice who always check on me and concern toward me. With her call cheer me up with her warm and friendly tone. Am sure that I will come back for my staycation. A big thank you to the hotel making my Quarantine stay a memorable one.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Quarantine Order (CHIJ KC)
desc: Really comfrontable and the front desk ppl were so nice especially this staff named Joyce or was it joy? Idrk but I love the gift , thanks for that ! keep doing what your doing and stay safe . Xoxo ,⭐-_-💧 (✿ ♡‿♡)

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice new clean hotel with great Staffs.
desc: To Joyee and to all Quincy staffs & security. Thank you for your hospitality and taking care of us during our stay here in room Q303. So much love for this nice, new & clean hotel with comfortable bed and pillows. My girl loves the toilet with clean tub. It just feel like home. The care that you and your wonderful staffs have provided to us has been nothing short of amazing and comforting. We are very grateful for the support and help you've given us. We truly appreciate all that has been done. Again, I want to thank every single person that had helped alleviate the stress and anxiety. Will definitely recommend Quincy to others and looking forward to come back here again for staycations. Thank you, Till then take care, keep well and stay safe.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: QO from 16 Sept - 23rd Sept 2021
desc: When I received a call from Cisco telling me that our QO will be at The Elizabeth Quincy Hotel, i was relieved. From the start of our stay till we check-out the staff have been very helpful and friendly. I would like to also thank Phin Xing for the surprised belated birthday gift for my daughter which was so unexpected. Eversince she received the teddy bear, she kept hugging it. Would definitely come back for staycation once they allow it. Thank you Quincy

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: ELIZABETH & QUINCY HOTEL
desc: The hostitality and the service provided was heartwarming especially during this pandemic. I was taken care by the staff and the hotel was good and clean. I would give a 5 star for this 4 star hotel. Staffs like Cerlyn made sure both quarintine and stay cation residents are taken care off. Even liasing with SHN was smooth. I would bring my family and my overseas relatives to stay here when the travel opens.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very well-run hotel with friendly atmosphere!
desc: Quincy Hotel provided the perfect place for us over the 7 days, which we stayed in Singapore. The staff was very attentive and would always go out of their way to help. You are always greeted with a smile and we really felt as part of the Quincy family. The facilities are also great with a pool and gym on the 12th floor with amazing views! They also have unique concepts that I have not seen in any other hotel, e.g. pick 5 free items for the minibar, when you arrive and breakfast until 3PM. They also have free drinks and canapes every day at happy hour! My wife and I also really appreciated that you had the options of both Western and Asian breakfast options. We will be coming back next time, we are in Singapore!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Impeccable service. The best stay in a hotel I had so far.
desc: I would like to start the review by giving a big big thank you shout out to the whole team at Quincy Hotel Singapore. From pre arrival communication and patiently answering all my queries, to giving us such a warm welcome, management working the ground and supporting the team during new year eve, greeting us. Giving us welcome drink and even leading us personally to our room and give a introduction to facilities and room, we felt like VIP. The front desk and management are all so genuine and down to earth, they are there with a clear objective : to make their guest happy. And they achieved their objective totally. The management lead the way, and the employees follows. I have never been to a hotel where the Area General Manager of a international hotel organisation come down

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing Staff and Facilities in the Heart of Singapore
desc: We loved our time at Quincy!!! The nicest staff you could imagine. While the quincy provided a calming space, the bustling Orchard Road with Singapore’s best shopping was just minutes away. A great gym and a pool on level 12 overlooks the city and both were kept extremely safe by staff in relation to COVID! Highly Recommended!!!! Be sure to take advantage of breakfast being available right up until 3pm…. And the complimentary soft serve ice cream.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Overall genuine and first-class hospitality and amenities
desc: The hotel has modern and classy vibes, offering tastefully furnished rooms. The added perks of 24-hour access to refreshments at the lobby lounge, as well as complimentary evening canapés and cocktails, are definitely a bonus. But most of all, it is the warm and sincere desire to serve the guests of the hotel, that stands out most during our stay. We must give special thanks to all the service staff who made our one-night stay especially memorable, starting from Frieda at the concierge, to Ifa the hotel manager who made an effort to engage us during the evening canapés and cocktails, as well as Jim, the area GM who made us feel very welcome. This is a boutique hotel worth repeated visits, as it embodies the true spirit of hospitality that is quite rare in the service industry

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Best staycation
desc: Smooth check in. Polite and friendly staff. Clean room & great amenities. The kids really enjoyed the infinity pool with beatiful Orchard Rd skyline. Delicious sumptious breakfast. Wish we could stay longer. Thank you very much for your service.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A perfect vacation stay
desc: A perfect vacation stay in my books! As Terminator says, I’ll be back! Quincy hotel is located within walking distance from orchard, providing a staycation with shopping convenience which my wife loves. We chose this hotel for our staycation as it has a romantic ambience and a great lounge to unwind after a hectic work week. Light refreshment was provided when we relaxed at the lounge even in the middle of the night! The check-in was fuss free and we were greeted warmly with a welcome ice cream dessert. A god send due to the afternoon sun. The receptionist also provided 5 items from the mini-bar and arranged for our evening cocktail as part of our stay. The hotel have a program called Qunicy Qurates that provides a list of attractions and shopping partners with attractive

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A memorable stay with great service!
desc: It was a memorable stay at Quincy like in a private club. I miss chilling by the bay window with my book and not having to worry about going hungry as we got to choose our preferred welcome minibar items at check-in and there were light refreshments available at the lounge all day. Really enjoyed our wholesome breakfast and I have to say the croissants were so flaky and yummy! In the evening, the lawn area is very pretty with nice ambience, which we had our evening canapes and cocktails there. Lastly, the friendly team made the whole stay experience even better. I would like to give special mention to Jacqueline, for her warm welcome at check-in and Lee who was friendly when serving us the meals and assisted us promptly when we accidentally left our keycards in the

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: my best experience at The Quincy Hotel
desc: The facilities are super good and food are delicious.swimming pool 24/7 is the best given with this pandemic situation we can be less in the crowd. Receptionist even call to check if I want to have a slot to be in the lounge area. I am impressed ..KUDOSS!!!!!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: AWESOME
desc: Staffs were great, hotel room was just nice, bathtub and breakfast was def scrumptious. Def a place to come to relax. Infinity pool 24hrs but of course booking is required. Js the place abit far off for anyone looking for 7-11 etc 😂

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing hospitality and stay at Quincy Hotel
desc: I had a wonderful experience staying at Quincy Hotel! The check-in to my room was fuss free and the staff at the concierge were eager to help with the entire process. The room was stylish with modern furnishing. Facilities in the hotel were also superb, especially the infinity pool with a relaxing view of Orchard landscape. Lastly, I personally love the long breakfast duration (7am to 3pm) that the hotel has, which provided good flexibility to wake up later and still enjoy a wide choice of scrumptious breakfast (really love their big Breakfast!) I would definitely have another stay with Quincy again!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great service! Amazing stay!
desc: I was relocating to Singapore so was staying in Quincy for a month. Overall, their service was top notch (breakfast til 3 pm, so many snacks 24/7, canapes and drinks in the evening!) Location was also very nice as it is close to Paragon, Far East and Ion and close to the bus stop in Far East that goes basically almost to anywhere.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great experience!
desc: My staycation at the Quincy Hotel was amazing. Firstly, the hotel's location is convenient, being a 5 minutes walk away from Takashimaya and Paragon. The reception staff, Freida and Bhavani were courteous and helpful. They thoroughly explained the hotel's amenities to me and my partner upon check-in. The staff also gave us a welcome ice cream sandwich that was delicious. The room was superb and sparkling clean. High touch items like the TV remote were wrapped in plastic to show that they were sanitised before our arrival. There even was a self-care tool kit consisting of face masks, wipes and hand sanitiser which are useful for today's age of covid. The toiletries provided were high quality and bath salts were included for a relaxing soak in the tub.   The evening cocktail and

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful Experience for Staycation
desc: Everything was perfect. The room was cozy and comfortable. The included breakfast was a brunch style menu which could easily cost you a few ten dollars per person in any brunch cafes, and the greater part was it is served till 3pm. The evening canapés and cocktails were also great and was sufficient as being a dinner by itself. Since we were staying multiple days, we ran out of things to try for cocktails and they even went on to create some drinks out of the menu. The staff are really friendly and genuinely cares about your stay. The remember your names and recall what you preferred on the previous day. This was by far my best experience for any hotels I've been to, and 10 out of 10 would recommend to anyone looking for a staycation.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect Staycation
desc: Absolutely love the service & design of the Quincy! Service was good. Front desk staffs are efficient, pleasant and helpful. The room is spacious, clean, and perfect for staycation. They serve variety of snacks and drinks during evening cocktails ! ….. surprisingly the breakfast is served until 3pm. The location is very convenient and take around 7-10mins walk to Paragon, Far East Plaza and Lucky Plaza. It was a very pleasant stay !

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic Stay at the Quincy Hotel
desc: It was fantastic stay at Quincy because the staff are truly remarkable. We enjoy strategically located at Orchard, great value on the breakfast, evening cocktail inclusion and lastly the rooftop pool. Bhavani, Cerlyn, and Nicholas are confident, great poise, and friendly

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic Staycation Experience with Great Service and Food
desc: I would like to thank the team that worked and interacted with us from 31st Jan to 1st Feb. Every single staff member that we met was just very friendly and accommodating. I've been to staycations at multiple hotels and even those expensive ones have very textbook-like customer service standards. However, the experience at Quincy was just different. It was just warm and friendly on another higher level. Another thing that would make me come back for is your breakfast. Every single thing that was served for breakfast was cafe-standard that even my 2 very picky sons loved it so much. It didn't feel like the standard hotel breakfast at all and it's definitely something worth to come back for. Thank you for the experience and keep it up!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Outstanding Service
desc: I stayed at the Quincy Hotel in Singapore for 27 nights. The service of the entire team was absolutely outstanding. They were always friendly and cheerful and addressed and even anticipated my needs and wishes in an exemplary way. What I liked best was their authentic friendliness and care, which made me truly feel at home. I am a seasoned traveler, having stayed in many hotels around the world, including luxury hotels. My stay at the Quincy will remain one of the best memories about any hotels I have ever been to.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent stay!
desc: It was a really great stay at Quincy Hotel! Staff were all very friendly, greeted us with all smiles and we had a really enjoyable time! Room was spacious and clean, wifi was fast, evening canapes and breakfast were all so delicious! Definitely recommend anyone to stay here!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Best staycation I had so far
desc: My stay at Quincy was amazing. Upon arrival at the hotel, my partner and I were warmly welcomed by Freida and Bhavani. They ran through the hotel’s amenities and Bhavani offered to give us a room tour. This initiative is helpful for first-time visitors to the hotel, and it helped me and my partner settle in hassle-free. The room feels spacious, and the large table makes it suitable for remote work. We enjoyed the evening cocktails and canapés served by Nicholas. There is a good variety of both hot and cold canapés and a cheese platter. For those who do not drink alcohol, there is a good selection of soft drinks and fruit juices. I enjoyed a great view of the surroundings while relaxing in the infinity pool. Having a 24-hour pool allowed me to use the pool in the evenings

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful Staycation!
desc: Service staff was friendly and eager to attend to patrons' needs even though they need to tend both front desk and lounge. The complimentary all day snacks and evening canapes with cocktail was a great addition and of good standard as well.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hospitality
desc: Very satisfied by the personalised service by the hospitality team. Entire booking, check in, stay, and breakfast went perfectly. Only downside is the dated TV without Google Chromecast and/or AppleTV support. Otherwise, would highly recommend.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great to be back
desc: Alas, the hotel is opened for staycation There are some good changes or arrangements in hotel. The café or lounge is opened 24 hours which one can help oneself with beverages especially after a late night out. Breakfast hour is extended till 03 pm which one can have sufficient sleep.. The foods served during the breakfast and evening cocktails hours were delicious and well described by serving staff. Guests were given and selected choice minibar items. Most impressively, the services by staff and Managers were impeccable. They were friendly, attentive to details and served with passion and smiles. Certainly an asset to the Organization. They are : Area General Manager Jim Khoo Hotel Managers Ifa and Shakila Front Office : Tonny, Freida, Mohd, Zai, Nicholas, Hennessy, Wei Ting

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect hideaway
desc: We had a very lovely staycation here. Check in and out was a breeze, kudos to the front desk staff for their great service and welcoming smiles. The complimentary 5 welcome minibar items was such a luxury, unlike the paid ones in other hotels and we totally enjoyed them. There was an all day refreshments at the lobby lounge, which was great for chilling or reading a book on a peaceful afternoon, it definitely did not feel like we were in Orchard. After that, there is yet another complimentary evening cocktails and canapes, what's not to like?? Apart from those, the amazing mention here is you do not have wake up early to have breakfast because it's 7am to 3pm, which means you do not have to rush for breakfast (like we sometimes do for other staycations). It's also a short

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Our Short & Amazing Getaway!
desc: After a very long and tiring Christmas & New Years Weekend in the F&B industry. We really needed a short break and this turned out to be the perfect getaway! The Quincy Hotel is located along Mt Elizabeth, just right next to Mt Elizabeth Hotel. And with it being a short walk in, from Paragon or Far East Plaza, it feels like ur away from all the hustle and bustle of Orchard Rd and yet if you want to get some shopping done or take a stroll, its just 5 mins away. This amazing boutique hotel comes with Club Floor priviledges for all rooms. Which means, you have 24hrs access to the Pool & Gym + coffee, tea and other drinks and snacks . And from 6pm - 830pm daily, they serve free flow of Beer, Wines, Cocktails and delightfull canapes. And it was really nice sitting at the cafe while

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation
desc: Staff was friendly upon arrival. Check in was fast and explanation was clear. The room is super clean. Their food is good too. Due to rainy day. Hence, the aircon a bit cold for me. Overall the service is excellent :)

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing hotel - friendly staff and great location
desc: Quincy Hotel is conveniently located near Orchard Road- the famous shopping area in Singapore. All the staff I've met during the stay are so friendly and helpful! Breakfast is served everyday, which was really nice too! Room was smaller than expected, but other than that it has been a great stay.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: FAMILY STAYCATION
desc: Staff were friendly and helpful. The food is good and variety of free flow refreshment. We also got to enjoy the pool all by ourselves and nice gym room as well. Unfortunately sauna closed due to covid-19 restriction. About 10 to 15mins walk to the malls (Orchard area). Good for us during this season as we shopped for CNY clothing :)

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A Qool Team with RED HOT Service
desc: Your welcome starts before you arrive with an email inviting you to choose your complimentary mini bar items and pre registration details. When we arrived, I hadn’t even got out of the taxi before Tonny had loaded the suitcase on to the trolley and greeted my wife by name(. I still haven’t worked out how they do that). Registration was easy and even though we were early, it wasn’t a problem and we were shown to our room. Bhavani gave us a comprehensive intro to our room and our journey had begun. First night, we decided to try the complimentary canapés and cocktails which, were all excellent and generous.Breakfast next day was also excellent and there is a reasonable choice of options and also generous. The thing that sets this hotel apart from many that we have stayed in is

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Quincy hotel .
desc: Had a great stay in quincy hotel . Room comes with a bathtub and a great view facing the city. King size bed with comfortable pillows . Toilet was dry upon check in. Breakfast was nice , comes with yoghurt fruit appetizers.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fav hotel ever!!
desc: Lovely lovely service by the staff - special shout-out to Hennessy, Olivia and one more young Indian lady (didn’t manage to get her name) throughout our stay who were very kind to us. The staff were attentive to our needs, friendly, and efficient - extremely proactive and thoughtful. The amenities were great too - the bath tub was significantly larger than most other hotels and the bed was super comfortable! They even have a 24 hour gym (which we didn’t get to use this time round) and an infinity pool. Even the food was great - free flow drinks in the evening and breakfast service till 3pm! ☺️ The environment is perfect for people who want to getaway from the city (quiet and very calming) while at the same time be near to most of the attractions (e.g. Newton food Center is just

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A good place to relax and unwind..
desc: Fantastic & service oriented staffs. Service staffs are responsive & polite. Our room was so clean. Bed was neat and tidy. Towels and robes are so white and clean. Can smell the fresh aroma. Breakfast was well managed. Only downside was TV inside the room. At times we can see lines running across the TV screen. Will be good to upgrade the TV in the future. Smart TV perhaps. Overall... a very good place to relax and unwind.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: The perfect long stay hotel
desc: I would like to extend my sincere thanks to the Quincy team for their professionalism in handling my staff. The hotel ambiance was fantastic and the front office team was always there to answer her queries and was super friendly. Not to mention, the room was super spacious and everything was beyond our expectations! Would definitely utilize Quincy Hotel again and do keep up the good work team!! you are very appreciated by us :)

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome stay
desc: I was surprised prior to arrival the hotel asked me to pick 5 welcome items of my choice for the in-room mini bar. Was a wow for me. Breakfast was served up till 3pm! Great for people who wake up late. Portion was huge too. They also served canapes and cocktails in the evening (we had the Pandan cocktail and it's so good!). Light refreshment available at the lounge 24/7. Pool was nice and quiet. Special mention to Wei Ting at the reception. She was very helpful, attentive and professional. She even showed us to our room. :) Bed and pillows were really comfy. Can't ask for more.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing staycation!
desc: Was very satisfied with the service. Staff were all very nice and helpful all throughout our stay. Out of all the hotels we've tried, this is the first hotel that I've felt a very friendly, welcoming & comfortable atmosphere all because of the staff's service. Was allowed to check-in early and checkout late. Stayed there to "work from home/hotel" and as both me and my husband work late at night, we appreciate the breakfast timing of up to 3pm since we're both able to enjoy our sleep. Breakfast options are very good. We had the Avocado toast, Quincy's Full Works and Nasi Lemak and all are very satisfying. The complementary minibar items are also good as well as the all day light snacks/refreshments. The evening cocktails(free flow) & canapes are also delicious. We had multiple

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect Staycation!
desc: Love this staycation! We felt welcome the moment we arrived as we were greeted with smile and the warmth hospitality from the staff. They patiently explained their facilities and the 'Dos' and 'Don'ts' when safe management is of top priority during this pandemic. We have the whole infinity pool to ourselves. The evening cocktail and the canapés served were delicious. They also served one of the better breakfast in most of the staycation that we tried. We loved the new concept where breakfast was until 3pm. Yes! You heard it correctly -- 3pm! We could sleep a little longer without having to worry about missing our breakfast. Everything here was just great from their product to their impeccable services. This is just what we needed, a perfect staycation! Well done Quincy! Keep it

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A birthday weekend
desc: Thank you to Freida and Hennessy, and all the restaurant staff for making this a memorable stay for a special occasion. And for the housekeeping staff, we wish to express our appreciation for their effort to decorate the room with balloons and fairy lights. These added a nice touch to the room, as was the elephant folded from towels. The cake was the icing for the romantic weekend getaway.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful Staycation at Quincy
desc: It was a fantastic staycation for us at the Quincy Hotel! The room was clean and spacious with the choices of 5 welcome minibar items which we submitted before arrival. And the staff were welcoming and friendly with exceptional service provided from them. We had a good time during the free flow cocktail session included with the evening canapes. Most impressively, their breakfast hours is from 7am to 3pm. So allow us to have longer sleep time without worrying miss out our breakfast. We definitely will come back again for a staycation. Thank you Quincy Team and Keep up the excellent service!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: My Best Staycation Ever In Singapore
desc: I celebrated my Fiancé's Birthday at Quincy Hotel on the 26/02 as recommended by many of my friends and I have to say it is the best and most memorable experience I ever had. And here is why: Prior to checking in to the hotel, an email from Quincy was sent to me to collect basic information as to what time I was checking in. I chose the option to check in at 12pm (2 hours early than the usual) and Quincy actually accommodated to my request (this is of course, also subjected to the hotel's availability of the room). I was first greeted by a male staff at the front desk (apologies I did not get his name), and was offered a variety of snacks, drinks, and even Ice Cream! We then made our way up to our room. And my Fiancé was pleasantly surprised by the decoration on the bed

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good
desc: Hotel is quaint and cute.. no in-house restaurant yet but they are planning to open later in the year.. location is abit far, can be a bit inconvenient esp when its raining. Love the quietness and the staffs were awesome.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Truly a hidden gem in Orchard!
desc: My partner and I came for a weekday 1 night stay just to relax and unwind and we were definitely in for a treat! We loved the all-day refreshments and the little snack surprises at check-in and Leckerbaer options at evening canapés and even pastries from Mr Holmes Bakehouse at breakfast. These are little touches of luxury that we appreciated! While there were some obvious signs of wear and tear in the room (eg. The bathroom door was stuck on many occasions), it was still clean and comfortable with all the amenities you could need. Service was exceptional and special shout-out to Tonny, Hennessy and Bhavika who never failed to serve us with a smile. Thank you!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing staycation
desc: From our arrival at the hotel, it was already a great experience. The staff was detailed in explaining the facilities/programmes available. The team also prepare us with a surprise cake for my girlfriend even thought it was 1 days past her birthday. Overall a great experience and the room was clean and spacious. Breakfast was delicious. Highly recommended!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent service
desc: Excellent service and generally a nice stay with all the amenities you need. The hotel is very accessible as Orchard Road is just a stone throw away. Facilities are well maintained and the room is simple yet clean. Nice gestures like providing complimentary mini bar and welcome snack as well as their evening cocktail also further elevated my staying experience.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Qool Stay at Quincy Hotel Singapore
desc: My family had a wonderful time during our stay (21st to 26 Feb 2022) The service experience during our stay was exemplary. Despite being in Singapore, we were still able to relax and enjoy ourselves because of the warmth and kindness from the hotel staff. The smiles from every hotel staff were contagious & it made our day. I never realised that just a smile can go a long way. A special thanks to the Area Manager (Jim Khoo and the rest of the Team for making our stay an exciting one with personal handwritten welcome note & a complimentary wine bottle ) We had a Qool Stay indeed!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A cozy & affordable stay
desc: Stayed for about 3 days & 2 nights and it was just great. The staff (housekeeping, front counter & restaurant) were very accommodating & polite. There were a good variety of breakfast options. Breakfast could be even considered as lunch as the timing was from 7am-3pm. The cocktail menu (6-8pm) was different daily. All-day refreshments were included in the package as well. There's a 24 hours gym & pool. Staying in the hotel was possible as everything was included. If you're considering to walk around the town area, it's just a 10 min walk to the bustling streets of Orchard, Somerset where there are shopping malls, cinemas & good eating places. I wouldn't mind coming back to stay.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: An excellent retreat for business and pleasure
desc: I thoroughly enjoyed my 10 night stay at The Quincy Singapore. The rooms were modern and bright, the staff were attentive and courteous, and the complimentary tapas and beverages each night was a nice touch. Loved the pool and gym- hopefully next time the sauna and steam room will be functional again. I would definitely stay there again.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycay 28th Feb
desc: Hi, check in was a breeze and all the staffs are attentive, I am very bad with remembering names and all of them gave super good service. The room was spacious and I love the bathroom and bathtubs. There was a mini surprise for my friend who is on a Keto Diet. The note was so personalised that I kept it with me. The light refreshment was a plus and its nice we can have our drink to go. Evening cocktails and canapés was superb too. The Lady Host an Indian Lady was super attentive and asking us for any dietary restriction. Perhaps a slightly more cocktail selection perhaps 2 or 3 more selection. Thank you for the enjoyable stay and everything was just walking distance from the hotel. I will definitely choose your hotel again if there was a good promotion. Till next time 😘😘

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Simplistic Club Hotel
desc: Superb service from the hospitality team ! Check-in was smooth and fuss free. Refreshing welcome ice-cream sandwich instead of drink that you can take with you to room. Club lounge is at the main floor next to lobby. Simple modern design define this hotel Breakfast from 7am - 3pm. Evening cocktail from 6pm - 8pm. e-Menus, 1 serving for food and free flow for drinks. Club lounge access 24hrs. Room is clean and decent in size. TV is LED but without screensharing feature to connect to your device via bluetooth. But HDMI ports are available to connect. Firm bed and sheets used are finely combed from touch. Kudos to Bhavani, Hennessy for their exceptional service and attention to details. Their warm and attentive service made our stay enjoyable and carefree. Effects of Covid-19

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome staycay!!
desc: Great hospitality. Superb food option for breakfast and evening drinks and canapés. Located within town but requires abit of walking. But overall still really enjoyed the stay! Will surely go back again.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Relax and enjoyable trip
desc: The front desk and the restaurant staff are very friendly, we enjoyed the hotel facilities such as gym, swimming pool and nice and quiet view at the lobby. We like the 24 hours refreshments and the lounge cocktails at evening that is free, everything is wonderful and excellent. It's just five to ten minutes walk to Orchard for your shopping spree. We strongly recommend you to book this hotel for holiday or for business trip.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fancy hotel with top notch service
desc: Located conveniently behind Mt. Elizabeth Hospital, the hotel was a 5 minutes walk to Paragon. This was my third time back at the hotel. Booked a last minute staycation as my cruise got cancelled. The hotel's service was exceptional and I have to say the evening canapes and breakfast was an improvement over my last two stays (pre-COVID). The selection of beverages during their evening cocktail was sufficient.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Friendly and approachable
desc: When i and family arrived the location the staff there very welcoming..they give us a lot of stuff till we check out..we bring back stuff home..the breakfast was awesome and delicious that we can choose from the menu…what we request before coming to the hotel they manage to do it..

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Simple and cool
desc: The room is clean. The service is good as well. However, the location is a bit far from the MRT Station. And a bit tired when walking under. Booking the room was a breeze, and communications were prompt and detailed when making amendments to my booking. The service staff is friendly.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Love it!
desc: We enjoyed our stay here during CNY. Our room was bright with plenty of sunlight, clean and with a bathtub. The food provided by the hotel was adequate for a whole day so we didn’t have to step out for dinner. The gym and pool opened 24 hours and we got a timeslot that only us in the gym room. The staff were amazing. Big shoutout to Hennessy and Olivia! They were so friendly, made us feel welcomed, warm and special. We were surprised by the cake, card and instax photos. Also, Freida, Nicholas, Bhavia and Muhammad and others who worked in the hotel, all of them were courteous, helpful and efficient. Compared to other chain branded hotels, service here was more personalized. We were pleased with our decision to celebrate a special occasion in this hotel. Keep up the good work!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: NIL
desc: The room is clean. The service is good as well. However, the location is a bit far from the MRT Station. And a bit tired when walk under the hot sun. A bit restrict for us to vist the swimming pool area.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Stay, Great Service
desc: Booking the room was a breeze, and communications was prompt and detailed when making amendments to my booking. Service staff are friendly, efficient and pro-active. Breakfast till 3am is a great thing - we usually wake up too late to enjoy at other hotels :) Evening cocktail time is fun - we actually skipped dinner! The hotel is located in Orchard, but away from the hustle and bustle. Just a 5mins easy walk from Scotts Road. Everything feels really cosy, with little touches so there are many great places to take photos for the gram. :)

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: staycation
desc: stayed at the hotel over the CNY holidays. great location, stone throw away from orchard road but at the same time away tucked away from all the hustle and bustle. Great team attending to the guest, very helpful and attentive! hats off to Bhavani and Freida, manning the check-in and also assisting at the restaurant.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: An above expectation staycation!
desc: Loved our stay at Quincy Hotel. Indeed the stay and service was above expectation. The staff at front desk and restaurant are very friendly and make one feel welcome. The room is very clean, love the smooth, comfortable bedsheet and great pillow! I am one who is never fond of hotel’s complimentary toiletries, but Quincy surprised me with Kevin.Murphy’s toiletries, nice! The toiletries also included bath salt for a relaxing bath soak. It was also nice to have Nespresso machine in the room. The hotel's swimming pool is just next to the gym, which has up to date gym equipment. The background music played at the pool make the poolside experience relaxing. The breakfast timing is from 7am to 3pm! This timing is great because we don’t have to wake up in time for breakfast! We

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Home away from home
desc: The Quincy excels with a great staff and makes you feel welcome and at home even on longer stays. Great location and very convenient. Close to the Orchard MRT station for your transportation needs within Singapore.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Stands out from the crowd -- exceptional hotel
desc: The Quincy is not your ordinary hotel. It looks bright, colourful, luxurious and different from the outside, and that's how it is inside. The clever service concepts, including breakfast, evening canapés and all-day coffee/refreshments served in the beautiful ground floor lounge/garden, bring executive club experience to all guests. While COVID rules may have restricted what was offered, the quality of what was on offer was first-rate. My room on the ninth floor was distinctive, colourful, bright, beautiful and luxurious. The swimming pool was beautiful. Service was friendly, personalised and always so professional. It was the sort of hotel where I was greeted by name on almost every encounter with staff -- impressive. While I would single out Ms Freida Ng for her exceptional

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Hospitality and Service
desc: One of the best hotel that I have stayed in Singapore! Staff are really friendly and polite. Celebrated our anniversary there and the hotel prepared a pleasant surprise. Our booking includes breakfast (up to 3pm), complimentary snacks/soft serve/soft drinks, and evening cocktail session (canapes and wines/beers). Special shoutout to Wei Ting and Jacqueline for their excellent service throughout our stay! Having said that, all the staff are really welcoming, with really prompt room service. Slightly difficult to get to the hotel if you are not taking taxi/cab. We had to walk uphill a little (about 5-10 minutes) from the nearest bus stop/MRT station. Overall, we would love to visit the hotel again for our next occasion!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great service, enjoyable stay
desc: Enjoyed our stay with Quincy, staff were attentive and always willing to help. We enjoyed the breakfast spread and evening canapes. Location was good as well, a short walk to Orchard road. Room was clean.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay
desc: I stayed for just over a week in March 2022. Great friendly staff. Special mention goes to Olivia for her great Korean restaurant recommendations. Location of the hotel is good if you prefer something a little removed from the main action on Orchard Road. The only thing that I will mention is that the hotel is situated on top of a hill. I guess some would say that it's a gentle hill, but I'm extremely lazy so I would have preferred not to have to had to walk it all.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A lovely short stay!
desc: I had a great time at Quincy. Location was good! Near to paragon, far east plaza n lucky plaza. They had 24hours free light refreshments/snacks as well as free wine n canapés from 6-8pm. Some minor issues we faced was staff forgetting to seve water, no granola which was included in the breakfast set... I had to remind staff and she didn't apologize and asked how many I wanted! Such a silly question as it's supposed to be served to each person. No coasters for drinks on one occasion. Swimming pool is covered and has 24hr access but you have to go down to the lobby to access the pool as staff have to press the lift button for you. Abit troublesome. TV channels were not very clear and limited. I would return if there was a good deal

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: The perfect stay
desc: Our stay at the Quincy was a delight from start to finish. The staff were incredibly accomodating, warm & friendly. It felt like a luxurious home away from home. The breakfast was top notch & the canapés sublime. Amazing view from the pool. Great location. Of note I would say this is NOT a family friendly hotel which was a highlight for me personally.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Me time staycation
desc: Hotel is kinda old and abit poorly kept (can see mould, furnishings old, one set of lift lights weren’t working, one lift extremely cold and another one had no a/c) but it’s an old hotel so I guess can’t complain. What made the difference is the staff, always had someone at the front desk ready to help with a smile. Hotel attendants were attentive and ready to cater to any requests. 10/10 for service , 6/10 for amenities (pool seems well kept but hotel generally looks like it’s in need of abit more love) , room was well kept too, just abit dusty and had a weird smell (like a scent but I guess that might be the air freshener or smth). Hotel aircon was quite good, follows the temperature you set it to, not like other hotels. Room doors are abit thin so you can hear other people

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Clean, enjoyable and good quality staycation base in close proximity to Orchard Road.
desc: My family (2 adults + 2 kids) booked 2 rooms for a short staycation recently. Rooms were around 30sqm each so may be space constrained for larger families. Overall experience was very positive. Hotel was located just behind the Paragon mall which is at the heart of the Orchard area. Walking to explore the various shopping and restaurant options in the vicinity was very easy. Rooms were affordable for the area, very clean and well maintained. It was however fairly basic, so not for those who are expecting luxury. There is also a small pool within the hotel itself. Room packages came with a complementary pleasant canapés selection in their small F&B section from 6-8pm that was very nice which also included wine and beer options. Overall the vibe was very casual and there was

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Stay at Quincy
desc: Homely place with very friendly people Very convenient for our requirements Comfortable rooms very well maintained Breakfast is decent too ! We will definitely stay @ Quincy on our next trip to singapore If they can have a dinner / room service would be ideal in the future

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: anniversary staycation
desc: Without doubt , one of the favourite hotels we stayed during our pandemic "holiday time " in SG. Upon arrival we were warmly welcomed by the staff and general manager .The staff was extremely friendly, the welcome ice cream sandwich is yummy & with the 24 hrs lounge providing drinks ,snacks . the restaurant very flexible breakfast to brunch (appreciate this!) and the restaurant team deserves a special thanks ^^ We had one great evening here cocktails & canapes which obviously also added up to the experience. I truly loved the outdoor lounge area too bad it was raining that nite we did not get to enjoyed it . The atmosphere was beautiful with the lightings it would be a relieve to sit in the quiet and peaceful environment enjoying nite drinks . will be great too if its a heated

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome staycation
desc: The team provided seamless hospitality for the guest ,miss Freida ,Olivia and Muhammad really did a good job and care always fulfill your request if their can breakfast and canapé with cocktail amazing, the housekeeping is really efficiency, didn't manage to get the Indian lady name she the person take extra mile to serve when I request to change the blanket type ,only one thing is the cocktail on the house 2 round hopefully next time when we visit change back to freeflow 2 hr time ,thanks for the team giving us the best weekend ,good job team 👍👍

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic Service and Stay
desc: Attentive and accommodative staff, service was excellent! Celebrated birthday there and there was a cute towel cake made by the staff with a candle in the room. During our cocktail, the staff surprised us with a cake and polariod too. Very sweet gestures and staff are all very friendly & warm. Thank you Freida, Nicholas, Tonny, Bhavani, Jacqueline and the rest of the staff!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: SHN + extra SG time
desc: the usual hotel stay for the last 6 years. Friendly staff, efficient, personal touch, helpful at all times. If I have to express anything negative, some more healthy options could be introduced in the menu. but in general no complaints at all.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Birthday Staycation!
desc: Celebrated my husband's birthday there with a staycation. Quincy Hotel was so nice to arrange a birthday cake with a Polaroid picture for my husband!! Thank you so much! Will definitely arrange another staycation with my in-laws during their birthday!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Most enjoyable birthday staycation
desc: Excellent service from the Quincy staff during my 2 days stay to celebrate my birthday. Room was clean, swimming pool and gym bookings are well managed and booking process is more convenient then other hotels I've been to. Quincy went the extra mile to change our room when my friend puked in the room. Especially love the lounge meal selections, evening canapés and cocktail variety. Appreciate the polaroid photo and birthday cake which was a nice gesture, will definitely stay with them again!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Family Staycation
desc: It’s been a pleasant stay, made even better by the staff’s great service. Pool was a nice one as there was hardly anyone using it and we managed to have the whole pool to ourselves. Breakfast was good too. Will definitely stay here again!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Enjoyable experience
desc: The staffs are all very friendly and helpful! Very attentive! The cocktails and breakfast were great! There were snacks and drinks available! Highly recommend for couples and friends! Will return again!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Best Singapore Visit
desc: We have visited Singapore countless times and always chose hotels by Orchard road. By far, This was THE BEST!!! From the friendly, helpful, accomodating , hardworking staff ( wei Ting, Tonny, Sofia and Jo and the rest!!!) to the Food, the rooms and the unforgettable breakfasts!! Dont get me started with the cocktails and canapes!! The yummy snacks locally produced and sodas were limit less!!! And as the cliche goes…..” location location location!!”” It says it all!! The convenience of the covid testing at Mt Elizabeth Hospital being so near !!!! What more can i say…….. Choose Quincy!!!!!!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very good
desc: Very nice place. Excellent location and unbelievably good service especially for Singapore. Expensive like most things in Singapore but reasonable considering location and service. Good room and comfortable but not exceptional. But overall an excellent choice

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: HERO TO ZERO
desc: This was my favourite Hotel in Singapore -stayed here maybe six months first after it opened over 10 +years ago -twice per year by 5 days since post COVID. After Covid stayed last week-DISASTER place -spoke to Assistant Manager even she could not sort out -checked out two nights early ( prepaid ) and they have not even the decency of contacting me to refund two nights-specifically 1) Rooms still the same -very nice -great bed -was in a small room this time but still ok given location-bathroom amenities great -ok not as good as Moulton Brown at one stage -better than last ones . 2) No Free Mini Bar -sure they will give some Covid answer ? -room price not cheaper though-explain this? 3) Main point food a disaster -I was sick three times after eating it so gave up -outsourced

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great service and food
desc: I came from US to meet my family in Singapore. I found Quincy hotel from a friend. It exceed my expectation. Their staffs are so helpful. They helped me with my 6 luggages and 2 wheelchairs and put them to my room. Frida helped and lifted up all my heavy luggages. I love their a la carte breakfast especially nasi lemak. Quincy's afternoon snacks are good, too, especially their truffle potato chips. Jim is great. He is accomodating and very friendly. I would love to stay in Quincy hotel again in the future!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic!
desc: The stay at Quincy hotel was extremely pleasant. The staff were courteous and most helpful. Room was very comfortable. I particularly liked the bay windows where I could relax and enjoy the wonderful view of the sky and skyline.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Quiet Gateway
desc: Quiet weekend getaway alone. Comfortable stay. Clean and spacious room. Comes with breakfast and evening canapes and drinks. Staff are attentive and friendly. Location is just a short walking distance to all the major malls along orchard road. Only down side was somehow the Wifi network was quite laggy during my stay.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfection Hotel
desc: Everything is in the title ! 🙏 Staff is so nice and so cool 😻😎😻Locations is near the coolest places of Singapore 👍🏻 Subway and buses are close. The room is wide and really quiet, and the bed perfect 🤩

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Superb Location, Outstanding staff team!!
desc: Had a two night staycation with the cocktail and canapés option. From the beginning, even before check-in, the staff were excellent - Freida made the check-in a breeze by anticipating possible time choke points and suggesting less busy alternatives. She also suggested time slots for the evening canapés and the breakfast that would involve less waiting in view of the flow of movement. We really benefitted from her experience of traffic flow and appreciated her going the extra mile to share this with us. She took a pro-active approach to improve our experience and this set the tone for the entire staycation. We had the opportunity to chat with a Ms Ping Xin, who is in the Marketing/BD Team but was helping out due to the long weekend. Another superb representative of the FEH

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful stay @ the Quincy Orchard Singapore
desc: We are having a wonderful time staying at the Quincy Hotel. The staff are superrrr friendly, the room is big and nice. Complimentary 24 hour light refreshment for us. The kids love the snacks. Evening cocktail is also included in our booking. I think this is by far the best experience we have with hotels in Singapore. Not to mention perfect location for us. 5 minutes walk from Paragon but yet secluded and private. Wonderful wonderful stay.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycaytion on 3rd to 4th May 2022
desc: My wife and I really enjoyed our stay here! The food was impressive! We especially loved the canapés and croissant and au pain chocolat! Service was excellent - staff were polite, cheerful and friendly! We also really appreciated the flexibility offered in terms of the whole day gym and pool access, as well as late closing of breakfast (up to 3pm). The location is a short walk to Orchard Road, although the lack of shelter could be an issue if it rains.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Pleasant stay at Quincy
desc: Pleasant stay at Quincy. Special thanks to Tony for smooth check in and help. The hotel was clean and comfortable. Rooms were week designed with all luxury you need. Breakfast was nicely created by chefs.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Highly recommend
desc: Went to this hotel for a stay to celebrate my wife birthday... Room is clean and nice.... Staff is very helpful and very polite... Their breakfast and canapes during evening is wonderful... Everything is wonderful except the tv is blur...

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very good
desc: Everything is very smooth from check in to check out. Room is spacious, love it. Very nice evening cocktail makes our stay feel special. Breakfast is yummy! Thank you for the hospitality! Keep up the good work

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great service and hotel location
desc: Staff were very welcoming and provided great service. Location is slightly further from the main roads of Orchard but that makes the area peaceful. Price is a little on the higher end but definitely worth it for the breakfast and evening cocktail selection. TV quality was a little below the expectations but still fine for us. Room is big, great for travellers and families too. Loved the place overall

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Has changed in some ways
desc: I recently stayed in this hotel. This was our first visit to the hotel after the pandemic. As I have mentioned in my previous reviews the hotel is located in a very convenient location. It is practically in the center of the Orchard Shopping area, however, since it is located in a small sub road, it feels calm around the hotel. The hotel staff was friendly. The rooms were generally clean to satisfactory levels. Compared to my previous visits, I noticed some weaknesses in the hotel. Earlier, the hotel had buffet breakfast (not a big one but a small one with few items), which is now replaced by Ala Carte menu, a complimentary light dinner available before is now replaced by a cocktail, all day snack availability was there which included some cakes or something, which is now

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very comfortable
desc: Nice large room. We had a very comfortable stay here. Although everything worked, there were signs of being old. Breakfast and Canape food quality was excellent, although service was a little stretched. Front desk service was excellent and friendly.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: highly recommend hotel in Singapore
desc: Clean, great breakfast, awesome people and helpful. Will stay at this hotel again when I'm back to Singapore. staff at the receptionist assist me with early check in, since my schedule was very tight. well done and keep on the good work guys.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A Fabulous Find
desc: Quincy Hotel is a rare find - a spotlessly clean, exceedingly friendly, affordable hotel in the heart of Singapore. I have a hotel myself in Bali and know what to look out for! It's got great beds and it's quiet too. The breakfasts are generous, both Western and Asian, and there's a great choice of them. It's convenient - a short walk past Mount Elizabeth Hospital to Orchard Road with all its enormous shopping malls and restaurants. There's a good-sized pool and gym on the 12 floor - with nice views. There's also a sauna. What I really loved was the free wine and beer and canapes and cheese served from 6pm - 8 pm. There's really not much need to eat anything else! I stayed 6 days and was lucky to meet a lot of the staff, all of whom, without exception, went out of their

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Stay in Singapore
desc: Clean and well located hotel. Good breakfast. Yet room service is very poor (no mineral water, no bottle of wine). Information at reception desk insufficient (eg : availability of swimming pool) Email sent through Booking.com the day before were not known by the reception desk

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great place to stay in Singapore
desc: Great location close to MRT. Large rooms and bathrooms. Great breakfast. No on site restaurant in the evening, lots of places to eat or order from very close by. Top floor air conditioning quite noisy.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice place for staycation
desc: Room very clean and nice ,staff are very polite and helpful such nice city views and room amenities and complementary breakfast and drinks very excellent. Swimming pool open view to see city view and gym was awesome .

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Always Excellent
desc: This is our first time back to Quincy after the pandemic and the service is still excellent if not better than usual. We love our Evening Cocktail and yes our Breakfast. Highly rated for the Breakfast, time flexibility, and quality truly wonderful. Special mentioned for Nicholas and Hennessy which was very helpful. Definitely will be back when we have the opportunity and recommended staycation.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: We had a lovely stay
desc: Welcoming, friendly, nothing too much, staff were wonderful, hotel well placed to stroll to Orchard Road, lovely garden setting and comfortable hotel with free snacks Including ice cream, totally recommend for relaxing charming stay.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Outstanding service
desc: This hotel had the best customer service I have ever experienced in any hotel I have ever stayed in. Friendly, attentive and very efficient - we were made to feel most welcome and were well looked after. I will be booking again on my next stay In Singapore!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfortable and convenient
desc: Comforable room, clean, enjoyed complimentary full breakfast, friendly staff. The hotel is convenient to Orchard Rd, yet quiet and secure.I appreciated that there was a pool. Housekeeping staff were helpful. I would stay again if in Singapore.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Honeymoon stay!
desc: We spent 3 nights here for our honeymoon. We had a great stay. The staff were very friendly. We really like that breakfast was served until 3pm and you could get refreshments throughout the day. The infinity pool on the 12th floor was stunning and we loved the fact you could go to it at any time. The hotel is very close to Orchard Road. Thank you for a wonderful stay Quincy!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: good location and facilities
desc: only a few minutes walk to orchard road. Location of hotel nearby Paragon shopping mall which easy to get a food and groceries. walking or running to orchard road in the morning you can hear a bird sound which is unbelievable to hear it in the city center.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very good service
desc: Nice hotel to stay, will recommend to whoever travel to Singapore. Hotel service is excellent and clean. The staff are nice and polite and helpful. Next travel to Singapore, I will choose Quincy hotel again for sure.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very nice
desc: Great hotel. Comfortable beds & best blockout on windows ensured a great sleep. Rooms were a great size as we were travelling w a few pieces of very large luggage. Lovely staff at check in & check out. Breakfast let it down a bit, very strange poached eggs & turkey bacon wasn’t very nice.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: July Staycation With Brother
desc: Had 2 days 1 night staycation at Quincy Hotel. Overall a pleasant experience. But we had abit of an issue in the room. We were unable to connect our laptop to the room tv using our own hdmi and/or hotel hdmi cable. Evening cocktails and canapes were decent. Breakfast was very good!! Feel like giving 4.5/5 stars but no option here. So giving 4 stars instead. No umbrella in the hotel room as well.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent hotel
desc: Modern furnished, good location, within the walking distance to Ochard road adn Mount E. Hospital. Good breakfast with many set menus for choices. Light refeshment provided all day at the lobby but should have some drinking water in the room

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Singapore holiday
desc: Stayed at Quincy Singapore in July..was told the hotel only 500m away from MRT Orchard but it was like 1km with uphill slope on the way back to hotel and that proved to be difficult for my daughter with blister on the foot from all the walking in Singapore. Other than that, it was a nice hotel, the staffs were very courteous and friendly and helpful, to say the least. Quiet at night cos it was far from the noise in Orchard Road cos it was hidden in residential area. Room was well maintained. They had evening free cocktail and snacks at 6-8pm everyday and that was a plus point, and the breakfast was served til 3pm for those who preferred to sleep in. All night tea and coffee were available at the cafe with light snacks for those night owls. Overall it was a nice stay though the

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Birthday Stayca 9-10th Jul 2022
desc: The staff welcomed & greeted us with a smile the moment we enter the premise and gave us a very good vibes! Special mentions to Phin Xing for the cake arrangement knowing that it was my birthday! Thank you Phin Xing! Beer o clock and breakfast were included in the cost and it was awesome! The 24 hrs lounge in the lobby provides us with light snacks and drinks whichever we felt hungry at night. 11/10 for the experience! Will be back again if the opportunity arise.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: The Quincy Singapore
desc: Good hotel. We stayed here for 2 days. The staff welcomed us with smiling faces. I feel the breakfast options could include more variety. Otherwise, very good location & service . The staff were very friendly and helpful. The room was very spacious. Thank you

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Trendy hotel in brilliant but quiet location at Orchard.
desc: Not a huge hotel (a plus for me) but still has good facilities. Bedroom on the small side but that’s to be expected given prime location. Free happy hour of beer and canapés was a nice touch. Small pool but it does have a 12th floor location!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: 2nd Visit
desc: I've liked this hotel due to its location, cleanliness and amenities. Rooms are well appointed and the added benefits of snack, drinks etc throughout the day is an awesome plus. The staff here are great and tries their best but i think the hotel would benefit from having more wait staff during peak hours. The rollaway bed costs were a bit on the high side.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A Good Bonding and Relaxation time!
desc: I have a very good bonding, relaxation time, enjoying nice food and peaceful ambience with my elderly mother (89 years old) at Quincy Hotel, Singapore. We stayed 5 days and 4 nights. I am on wheelchair and my elderly mother walks with walking stick and we had a wheelchair friendly room reserved for us. The service staff gave us excellence service, especially, Ms. Kai Ting who went beyond her call of duties to make our stay a very happy one. You see, my elderly mum is vegetarian by religion and she does not enjoy the evening cocktail canapes as she preferred to eat rice. Ms. Kai Ting would on her own initiative purchase a packet of vegetarian rice for my mum each day. Thanks very much, Kai Ting! Well Done!!! In addition, we would like to thank Mr Mahen who served us

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Best full board hotel
desc: Quincy welcomed us with its hospitality and benefits which are amazing. Location itself is in the orchard area. The room is equipped with bathroom - tub and shower - which is hardly to find in Singapore with the price range like Quincy.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome place. Highly recommend.
