desc: Very friendly staff, great location, spacious room. The only setback was the bad wifi, but this was caused by upgrading the wifi. I assume that this works good. Provided this is the case, I highly recommend to stay here. I spent 5 nights and greatly enjoyed it.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Boutique hotel in quiet location near Orchard Road
desc: Hotel is near the end of a dead-end road so is quiet, but only 5 minutes walk from Orchard Road or Scotts Road. We enjoyed the peaceful atmosphere, the attentive staff, the generous breakfast/brunch (available till 3 pm) and the free snacks & drinks in the evening. We spent a very pleasant week at this hotel that was an ideal spot for a relaxing vacation.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Managing Director
desc: In the past, I have always stayed at the Four Seasons, but decided to give Quincy a try for it’s reasonably priced rooms and good location. I could not have been more impressed. The standouts for me were the beautiful gardens surrounding the building, an excellent and well maintained gym and above all, the incredibly helpful and friendly staff in all departments who went out of their way to make my story enjoyable.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: nice hotel
desc: This is good hotel and valueable the stuffs all are nice and kind. the room is clean and quiet The Breakfast are so many choice .I will recomment this hotet to my friend and family The loction is very nery the orchard road and is convenient to shopping and food.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great for business and shopping
desc: Second stay at the Quincy this year and impressed again with the hospitality and friendliness of this hotel and staff. Just a very good hotel for business or visiting the city for shopping. Orchard riad is around the corner. The only remark I can think of is that dinner options are limited in the direct vicinity.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Hotel
desc: This hotel was very nice the breakfast was very good and the snacks all day and drinks coffee were good when u were hungry. Mahen and Joy staff were very nice friendly looked after us. Pool was also good.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very nice convenient boutique hotel
desc: We stayed for three nights. The hotel has been designed very well with the lobby restaurant serving as a lounge with complimentary light snacks and non-alcoholic drinks available all day. There are also seats outside that can be used. We felt very comfortable during the stay and will return.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Outstanding staff
desc: It was Formula One week so hotels were either booked or very (!) expensive. The hotel and the personable staff were a very lucky find. Less than a 5 min walk to Orchard Rd, so the location was very convenient. Nice breakfast selections, evening happy hour and 24 hr. access to a small gym with a pool. Again - can't say enough about the kind, helpful staff. PS less than a 5 minute I would recommend the Alma restaurant in the Goodwood Park Hotel. Delicious 'upscale' dinning

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Staff
desc: I have no expectations when I check into any hotel because no matter how the reviews go, you never really know what your luck will be. As it turns out, this hotel over-delivered ONLY because of its staff. Yes, the hotel is clean and has good amenities (24/7 gym/pool access - love it), but the staff is what made the experience exceptional for me. The location isn't bad - behind Paragon Shopping Center. I noted their names - Mahen, Ying Zi, and Lina, who went above and beyond to ensure that my stay was comfortable. They all over-delivered on every request and went out of their way to see that I had what I needed at all times. When you travel far from the comforts of your own home, people like Mahen, Ying Zi, and Lina give us an experience because they are just genuine human

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: An excellent stay. Very friendly staff.
desc: The hotel was excellent as were the staff. They were extremely helpful and seemed very happy to make our stay as good as possible. The hotel itself is well situated just off of Orchard Road (one of the best shopping areas in Singapore). The room we in was on the ninth floor and was very well appointed. The bed was extremely comfortable and the shower and bathroom was a good size and everything was provided in the way of soaps shampoos etc. There is a gym and swimming pool on the 12th floor. Although we only stayed for one night, The hotel was more than happy to look after have bags for us while we ventured around Singapore waiting for our evening flight. Because it was the Singapore Grand Prix weekend the hotel was extremely kind and took us down into town so that we could do a

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good location, good environment, nice breakfast and staffs
desc: All staffs are very kind and helpful. I love it when walking out of hotel with trees around the sidewalk. It is near hospitals and shopping area, quiet and peaceful neighborhood. The room is not big enough for family with kids. Only recommend for couples, business and working trip.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Cool place with great staff
desc: Great room with an excellant outlook. Bathroom perfect. Great breakfast ( but missed my bacon and wholemeal bread!) The staff were amazing. Ill be back for sure. The location is also excellant so close to Orchard Road.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Brilliant staff service!
desc: Really appreciated the attentive staff from the moment I arrived through until departing! Rooms and location to great food and shopping were ideal. I will certainly be placing this location as a must return on my Singapore visits.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfortable stay, but breakfast needs improvement
desc: Welcoming staff. Room clean and comfortable. Location about 10 mins walk from metro, 5 mins walk from bus stop. Nice pool to relax in at end of day. The complimentary canapés were good. Breakfast was a bit of a disappointment: eggs were always slightly undercooked, smoked salmon fine - but avoid Turkey bacon and chicken ham. Yoghurt was in need of sweetening ( we used the provided jam, but had to ask for more.) The brioche with berries not much better - thick brioche not toasted enough, and not enough berries! Fine for a short stay.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: high hospitality
desc: Every staff is kind and full of hopitality. The location is very covenient. It is only 4 minuted walk to big shopping center but it is not easy to find way to it. Breakfast is not so bad. But staff were too busy to forget our order. It took 30 minutes for me to get ordered dishes.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent value at the Quincy
desc: We had a fantastic stay at the Quincy. Excellent location and great service made our stay extremely comfortable and happy. The breakfast and evening canapes are delicious. And all the staff are excellent.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: stopover
desc: WE were greeted upon arrival by reception staff, our check in was quick and efficiently processed. The staff asked if we had any plans for the next 3 days of our stay, that they would be more than happy to assist with good tips of the area. |The rooms are slightly small but comfortable.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Modern and accessible hotel
desc: Was 'upgraded' to the Quincy by our travel company. Overall a good move as this is a nice, modern hotel situated in leafy Elizabeth yet a short walk from the malls of Orchard Road. Service throughout was smooth with front desk able to resolve queries quickly. We were on bed and breakfast which was plentiful. Early evening tapas, and a couple of glasses of wine, were also included so check out this option if booking. Room was modern and spacious although I did notice a few areas where wallpaper was starting to part on ours, we were on 7th floor. Plentiful supplies for the bathroom with a good warm, shower. There's an outdoor pool adjacent to the gym just below our floor. We'll worth it as we were the only ones using it on our visit. Would definitely recommend although as

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Quite enjoyable
desc: Quiet and a good location and very helpful staff. Had an issue with the safe and was attended to immediately. The swimming pool was beautiful fantastic view on the 9th floor. The gym was very good also .

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very good service
desc: With relaxing cozy space to chill and unwind. Food is great with free mini bar, cocktail lounge and breakfast. Highly recommended! The staffs are very friendly and polite, no complains. Room is great, complete with bidet for the lady and bathtub for us.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A Quality Hotel in a Quality City
desc: The experience of staying at Quincy was welcoming and friendly The limited restaurant facilities were more than appropriate - noting the dining options in Singapore are plentiful and varied. The 24 hour availability of soft drinks and nibbles, in support of breakfast was appreciated and the canopes and drink(s) in early evening were unexpected and most welcome

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Quincy Hotel Staycation
desc: Pleasant stay with Quincy Hotel for my birthday staycation. Staff is friendly and sharp-eyed regarding my birthday. Amenities was plenty with pool, gym, and even a sauna (but the sauna did not turn on when we visit). Good walking distance to Paragon, and 24 hour refreshments is a good idea. Thank you!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fabulous Hotel and staff.
desc: Stayed at the Quincy Hotel from the 19th October - 27th October with my wife and sister-in-law. A very pleasant experience. Love to mention and thank Ms Freida Ng, she made it extra special. Always had a smile and ready to help. Highly recommend Quincy hotel to friends and family.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Quirky fun hotel .
desc: The staff were super friendly and accommodating, they went out of there way to make our stay memorable. The ice cream cookies were well worth trying in the afternoon and the canapes at night worth trying.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Would stay again
desc: Located in a quiet spot right around the streets of Orchard Road, the stay at Quincy Hotel was great. A good selection of breakfast items with attentive staff readily available. The well-equipped gym is located on the same floor as the pool overlooking the vicinity. Special mention to Freida for her assistance even before the stay at the hotel. Upon arrival, i was warmly greeted by Yingzi who shared good spots around the city to explore. I look forward to returning to this hotel!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Would stay again, can’t say any more
desc: The staff were excellent, Shah and Kurdan at breakfast were very nice boys. The options for breakfast were limited, could be improved by offering more options. Not everyone likes to eat a full meal in the morning.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay
desc: Great experience from check in to check out. Staff were very professional but friendly- nothing was too much trouble even my requests for vegetarian options were attended to quickly and efficiently. Lounge staff (who I had most interaction) were brilliant

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good experience
desc: Everything is good, room size is suitable, bathroom with tub, hotel staffs are friendly, breakfast is amazing! Only one thing, the aircon in my room is out of control, no matter what temperature I set, it's still cold, I think it really need to be improved.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: three day stay in Singapore
desc: I was at a business trip to our branch office in Singapore and stayed three nights at the Quincy Hotel. Some years before I used to tay at a hotel in Clarck Quay with Lounge amenties. But they sold the hotel and now tey do not offer business amenities as lounge and other things. So I went for the Quincy Hotel. Within 20 to 30 mins you are at BayFront (with Taxi or a quick walk and MRT) or at our office. Lots of shops in Orchard Street nearby. Staff ist friendly and gives ou a warm welcome. Lounge offers basic amenties (enough for me). pool, gym and dry sauna available. SG clean certified - and the hotel indeed was very clean. Nespresso machine at the room, soft drinks in the lounge available 24/7. Different set breakfast options; actually no buffet. But served with charme. ;-)

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: P Southgate
desc: Room is very comfortable and clean The staff are very helpful indeed and nothing is a problem for them to do for you The front desk is very helpful in arranging transportation as needed and made sure you get in the right taxi that was booked All in all a very pleasant stay and will be staying again soon hopefully

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hospitality
desc: The service rendered by the staff at the hotel is fantastic. Very friendly environment. Location is close to the main Orchard area (within 5 mins walk). Premier room is spacious and comfortable. Do indicate in advance if you prefer high floors. Premier room allows you to have an early check-in or late check-out (plus point here) Bonus - 24 hours lounge

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent value option
desc: Great option considering sky high prices in Singapore. Trade off is a not too bad walk to Orcard MRT. Free breakfast is also a massive plus in our opinion - a rare offer in Singapore. We would stay again based mainly on the value offered for what was recieved.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great customer service
desc: The team at the front desk and the dining area are always so helpful and accommodating. I just had my second visit and arrived in the wee hours of the morning where they were waiting for me with all paperwork and a room key ready.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesomeness
desc: The team at Quincy and the way they look after you is incredible. Our flight out was super late the night of check out and they looked after our bags and we were able to come back and use the facilities after a long day in the heat before our transfer to Airport. Breakfast was sensational every day.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good
desc: Pretty good place- the service is excellent and the location is absolutely exceptional. Room was very comfortable and the value for money reasonable especially considering it’s Singapore and the location. The hotel is not perfect (eg light malfunction in my room)…. But still pretty good

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great place at a not so high price !
desc: We had a blast staying at the Quincy ! We were at the beginning of our honeymoon and they covered us up with little and personalised presents. Room was clean and spacious (Premier King), modern and the breakfast, even though a little bit too generous for us, was great. The free treats and refreshments at the lobby are as well great to have. Truffle crisps are the best ! They accommodated us with a late check out at 3pm too since we had our flight late at night. Well situated near Orchard road in a quiet neighborhood. We don't usually visit same places twice but we would go back at this hotel if we were to come back ! Staff was very friendly, I believe this is common in Singapore but still great to mention.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great staycation
desc: It was a wonderful staycation experience! Staffs are very friendly, food was good, room was great too! Especially the pillow, the pillow was really comfortable :) Really enjoyed the whole staycation experience!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Cozy, comfortable, friendly
desc: Enjoyed a quick 2-night stay here. We'd had a disappointing and failed attempt at this hotel several years ago, but the management went out of their way this time to make up for it, even years after, which was very much appreciated. The staff were very friendly, the room was trim and clean, and my room was ready for me when I arrived from a long flight mid-morning. Breakfasts were delicious. Shopping is within walking distance, but still tucked away so you don't hear the traffic. The little garden area outside the dining room was a zen-like spot to enjoy the cooler mornings. Definitely recommend this hotel.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: 1st Singapore stay after reopening of Singapore
desc: It is always nice to stay at Quincy hotel. Super location and great accomodation, with good service and facilities. A quite oase of rest, with the best shopping are down the street, just a couple of minutes walk .

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A wonderful staycation at Quincy
desc: My hubby and I decided to try Quincy Hotel. It was our very first experience with this Hotel and the crews are as wonderful as our hotel stay. They are all friendly, patient and nice. We was happy with thier warm welcome which providing us the delicious ice cream in the hot weather after checked in at the counter (normally hotel just have welcome drink, but this is something different. I like it). In addition, the moment we walked into the room, they have prepared a welcome basket with variaties of snacks and drinks with lovely handwritten card. I felt like returning home as a VIP in this hotel. It really touched my heart. Furthermore, this hotel is unique and im impressed with thier hotel managing style like serving breakfast until 3pm, so that the guest dont have to wake up

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: not the old quincy
desc: note : the 3 stars are only there because the staff was AMAZING. this was our 3rd visit to the quincy, first one after covid, and most probably out last. the price of the hotel stayed more or less the same BUT all of the things that were included is now gone. breakfast is not buffet anymore, there is no dinner only a platter. nothing in the room bar fridge or drawer (like it used to be) “happy hour” is now only 2 beers before 8pm. the rooms are nice and clean but it is definitely not what it used to be.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Hotel
desc: Friendly, attentive and helpful staff. Good location, near to the shopping mile Orchard Road. Nice pool and the view as well. Good and hearty breakfast. Room was clean and nice view as well ( 9th floor ).

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very disappointing post-covid return visit!
desc: The Quincy used to be our favourite hotel in Singapore pre-covid. However, this visit really wasn’t the Quincy we remember! Half the usual service but twice the price! In 2019 we paid £180 for a room but this visit it was £310 and has lost a lot of its little perks that we lived. I was looking forward to some G&Ts at free cocktail hour, unfortunately nothing like pre-covid. Now only wine & beer (which I don’t drink) and capped at 2 drinks! Also the buffet light bites are now a very disappointing small plate of canapés for 2. Everything looked tired and the pool area is not looking great with age. Our flight was cancelled so we asked to stay another night and they had our room but wanted to charge us double again! I asked them to honour our original room rate but they said no.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic Hotel
desc: This hotel is one the best I have ever stayed. Breakfast excellent, staff very kind. Very good and comfortable room, good shower. Location in a very quiet and convenient location. I recommend the hotel for friends and will come back.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: a fabulous stay
desc: We only had 2 days in Singapore but it was fabulous and the hotel really made it lovely room and the staff were all lovely and friendly Watch out for the monkeys in the garden at the rear of the hotel!!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great place to stay
desc: Friendly and welcoming staff, room nicely appointed, conveniently located. Only consideration is breakfast options are limited, but plenty of cafes etc to enjoy within walking distance if you want more variety.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very good place to stay for business
desc: The quincy hotel adheres to its prase "feel at home at quincy". Nice rooms, personel friendly and obliging. If you like shopping the hotel is situated perfectly next to the Orchard. A really good place to stay for a business trip.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice stay
desc: Service staff made you feel at home. Food and bed very comfortable and air con very good! Ask for carpark coupon at the front office if you drive or ride. Pool and gym at the top floor very good view.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Oh so Quincy!
desc: The Quincy does not disappoint. The front office staff were friendly and helpful. The server staff at the lounge was fast in service and engaging. The room and bed were comfortable to have a good night's sleep. The Toiletries were branded and fragrant! Excellent for a long bath at the bathtub! As for the variety of option for breakfast- it had Asian and western choices, not to mention excellent canapés and wine which was included! Overall a very pleasant stay! Highly recommended for a relaxing staycation!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location
desc: This hotel is very close to the tube/train network also close to orchard Street. Lovely shops around there. There seems great samples in the room too. Like toothbrush and soaps. Nice freindly staff too .

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very good
desc: Great value for money Breakfast,all day coffee cool drinks, wine and beer plus canopies every night wonderful staff nothing too much trouble Room a little small bathroom not very clean mould on tiles in shower

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent hotel minus the travel
desc: The hotel staff were attentive and quick with their service. Their complimentary welcome snack was a pleasant surprise, after a long walk to the hotel (6 minutes from the nearest bus stop). The room is clean and spacious. No issues with the bathroom and toilet comes with built-in bidet (yay!). The beds as usual, made me oversleep, they were so comfortable.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Quincy
desc: A good budget option. The staff were friendly and helpful. The room was clean and a good size. The bed and pillows were v comfortable. Location is a bit far from the centre but a tourist pass for subway and buses is available which makes this okay.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good service and good location
desc: Breakfast and happy hour with canapés were excellent. Staff were friendly and helpful and went that extra distance to make my stay enjoyable giving good tips on things to do. Good location for shopping and tours.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: So friendly.
desc: One of the friendliest and most helpful hotels we’ve ever stayed in. Wonderful breakfasts and super evening canapés and drinks. Lovely swimming pool - had it to ourselves most times. A bit of a walk from the Orchard Road MRT, but in a lovely quiet area past the Mount Elizabeth medical centre. A really good position to explore Singapore. Thank you.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel
desc: Lovely hotel with good facilities and very conveniently situated. It was great having a pool on the 12th storey and the MRT was only a 5 minutes walk away which was great for travelling around. Great selection on offer for breakfast.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great coffee and comfortable room
desc: Quincy has changed since Covid. The evening canapes are not the good old light buffet of past years. It used to be good just staying at the hotel in the evening. The current limited canapes really means you have to go out for a light meal. I enjoyed my stay and the room was comfortable.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect
desc: We even could use snaks and drinks whole stay. A bit far from the gardens of the bay, but not far from Orchid road. Expensive hotel but nice . Pool could be warm up. Lift is freesing cold. Friendly personal

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: 4-night stay at Quincy
desc: Enjoyed the free breakfast which was quite filling and tasty, all-day free drinks (soda & coffee), and, free cocktails. although the canapes was light, food was tasty. special mention and thanks to camille, john, sunja & the servers (don't know their names) who assisted us during breakfast & cocktails. had minor issues though with the hot water which sometimes took awhile to reach the hot temperature; just had to wait. room was cozy, as well as, the lobby lounge where the breakfast & cocktails were served. A great hotel in the Orchard area - just 10 min walk to Orchard Road

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: The best New year stay in this hidden Gem hotel !!!
desc: First time to this hotel !!! Cannot believe there is still such a hidden gem near orchard area !!! The staffs there are all so friendly !! A very good vibes for the new year too !! There is a free flow of alcohol 4pm -9 pm !!! Unlimited drinks ! Bite size snacks !! Whats more they actually engage a DJ for the new year eve !! Bringing all the good vibes ! We can hear laughter every where ! From staff ,customer and us . We wan to thank Jim , Joey , Peggy and all … for giving us such a welcoming vibes !! We really enjoyed so much and definitely will be back soon !!!! We will give this hotel above 5 stars !! To all … room , cleanliness, service , food deliciousness!!! Good job team !!! We are so proud to have such a wonderful hotel in Singapore !!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Lovely hotel right in centre of Singapore
desc: A lovely clean hotel within walking distance of the main shopping centre of Singapore. The staff were very helpful and looked after us well the 5 days we were there. Breakfast really good. You had a choice of 5 unusual cooked breakfast apart from pastries and juice brought to our table. Breakfast staff very attentive. I was a bit phased with the clear glass between bathroom and bedroom but then found blind. Sometimes your partner is not looking their best on a morning.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Two night stay in Singapore.
desc: What an amazing stay at this hotel .Having arrived early after an overnight flight the reception staff were really helpful in arranging early access to our room . Good size room ,comfy beds and a pillow menu . Breakfast is included and served until 3 pm .It was substantial and delicious.The free evening drinks (2) and canapés were a lovely touch . A special mention must go to Assistant Manager Paola Perlada who ,with the entire team ,went above and beyond and looked after us ol dears so well .Thankyou .

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Short stay
desc: Our short stay in this hotel was amazing. Our room on the 10th floor was comfortable, all the staff made us feel very welcome and special. John and the girls on reception were so extremely helpful and understanding when our suitcases failed to be loaded onto the plane at Heathrow! The breakfasts are so delicious as were the complimentary drinks and canapés each evening. We would highly recommend The Quincy to anyone wishing to visit Singapore especially to see the wonderful Botanic Gardens and spectacular Orchid House.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: 4-day stay at Quincy Hotel Singapore
desc: Enjoyed our stay at the hotel. Excellent service from Camille, John and Sunja, and also from the servers during breakfast and evening cocktails! Enjoyed the free breakfast, all-day refreshments and evening cocktails. Suggest to add more snacks for the refreshments.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Boutique hotel near Orchard road
desc: Very nice friendly boutique hotel with an excellent breakfast and very nice staff. The location is perfect being close to Orchard Road. The swimming pool on the 12th floor invites you to relax. The rooms are nicely furnished and fully air-conditioned.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Qool stay at The Quincy
desc: Qool stay at The Quincy - check! We had a lovely couple stay at this hotel, just tucked behind Far East Plaza. The classy decor, as you step into the hotel, welcomes one into the Christmas festive season. Warmly greeted by the front desk and with our check-in done, we were off to our room right at the top 14th floor with a complimentary ice cream sandwich to start our stay. The room was spick and span and the large windows offers a wide view of Orchard Road and beyond - which we explored on our 2nd day as we strolled along the Orchard Road streets, Somerset Road, Oxley Road and Penang Lane. The bed was comfortable and pillows were soft. The bathroom comes equipped with a rain shower and bathtub and with Kevin Murphy bath products. What we love was the breakfast which was anytime

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A surprising find
desc: Found this hotel by accident since most hotels would have no rooms available during this peak period. Quincy delivered top-notch service and I won’t hesitate recommending this hotel to all. Definitely a come-back!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful stay this season
desc: Great stay by orchard road with Christmas light up and atmosphere. Super friendly staff. Generous supplies of snacks n drinks at 24-hour lounge. Highly recommended. If u don’t like a firm mattress like me, so ask the staff about it.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome Staycation
desc: Had an great staycation on the 18-19 dec for my birthday celebration. A complimentary bottle was given by surprise The Service was excellent, friend staffs they had The breakfast was good! Expecially the noodles! As for the room , it spacious, bright, comfortable & the best part is that have bathtub in the room!! Didn't forget to mention their Bed! It's very very comfortable as well. Will definitely come back for more staycation if I had the opportunity.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice, but still stuck in lockdown mode.
desc: Nice place, but seams still stuck in the lockdown era I would like to forget. Still no breakfast or evening buffets, still masks, still covid seal on the doors. Enough, lets move on. If it does it is a nice hotel, great staff and location.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great rooms
desc: Rooms are very well designed with a King-sized bed and still do not feel small. Very functional interior and bath room. Breakfast was free and included a great menu of meals. 24h reception with good service. Pool is relatively small but was a good refresh after a hot day.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Outstanding Service!
desc: My husband and I had a great time staying at Quincy. We were surprised with ice cream upon check in and was told that they served complimentary refreshments in the evening too. Got another pleasant surprise when we realized that breakfast serves till 3pm. Staff were warm and genuinely helpful. The room was well maintained with choices of pillows to select from. My favourite part of the hotel is the high floor sheltered swimming pool. I could continue to enjoy my swim despite the drizzling rain. Walking to Orchard main street was around 10min where we could enjoy the xmas lightings. I would definitely recommend Quincy to all my friends and family as we thoroughly enjoyed our stay there.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: The Quincy Hotel
desc: A perfect location, excellent staff, family friendly, just a lovely place to stay for your trip to the shopping capital of Asia. And get breakfast there too as there is a choice between cooked Euro or Asian and both good and a great start to the day.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic
desc: 4 nights in Singapore. Central hotel Great service Clean Friendly Ideal for pleasant stay Staff friendly - breakfast and happy hour all great. Pool and outside areas well maintained. Quiet and friendly throughout

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location. Amazing breakfasts.
desc: A great stay in a great hotel - and great to be back! 😊 Ok - it's maybe seven or eight years but thoroughly enjoyable. The hotel is in a good location just off Orchard Road (maybe 400m?). Some elements of the room show where things have been 'touched-up' but still nice and trendy rooms with a view down Mount Elizabeth. The swimming pool is pretty neat as well. Probably the highlight was/were the breakfasts. Firstly, it was wonderful that breakfast ran all the way until 15h. This was incredibly helpful for slightly jet-lagged travellers (and some adolescents in the group!). Meant there was no pressure to get down for breakfast by a certain time. Equally the breakfasts were really quite 'substantial' (ok, a posh word for big!). Really brunch-like and then set us up for the

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: The best and most helpful service
desc: We stayed here for three nights as part of a three-month world trip and it was probably the best hotel we stayed in in terms of service and thoughtfulness. Our room was on the top floor with great views and we so enjoyed the use of technology to operate the blinds and to provide a private en suite. We arrived late but were immediately given an ice cream sandwich, a drink from the bar, and five soft drinks for our room. All of these were free as were the evening drinks and canapes. Breakfasts were excellent each day. The glass-sided pool on the 12th floor was a luxury we had not expected. Staff at the hotel helped us book a PCR test, needed as we were going on to India, and to print all the documentation we had to take. They could not have been more helpful. We loved the

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: One of my best stay - ever!
desc: Great location, fantastic facilities, premium room inclusions were awesome and the best. Great staff and enjoyed my stay so much. I loved the way the breakfast was available till 3pm and literally unlimited snacks, coffee, refreshments.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Boutique hotel with extras!
desc: Wonderful hotel, rooms are spacious, bathtub is a plus, comfortable bed, breakfast had some unique offerings that were excellent. Canapés & drinks in the evening. Located on a quiet street a 10 min walk from Orchard Road. Staff was very helpful. Pool & gym a plus with liberal opening hours. I would definitely stay again!!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel
desc: Just left this lovely boutique , quirky in style hotel ! It has a great concept , where , you enjoy certain privileges on a da ily basis . We were warmly welcomed by Stephanie , who , very kindly allowed us to check in early after an overnight flight ( very welcomed ! ) we were given a list of drinks we could have for our in room fridge ( complimentary ) The room itself , was large , beautifully clean , huge bed , pillow menu , huge tv , great Nespresso machine , big bathroom , great rain shower and decent toiletries . In the evening , between 5-7 pm you had a choice of 2 drinks and a lovely tapas platter . For the Chinese New Year though , and the following day the drinks were complimentary between 4-9 pm !!! So , happy days !!!! Breakfast , was very substantial , but for me

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Quincy Hotel Singapore
desc: A smaller hotel with a boutique feel. Clean and well appointed with friendly and helpful staff. It is in an excellent location, a stone's throw from Orchard Road and it hustle an bustle but set in a quiet and peaceful location. We enjoyed our stay at the hotel

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Quincy Hotel
desc: Excellent experience. The staff were friendly and helpful. The hotel is well situated for access to Orchard road and the MRT is 10 minutes walk, giving quick and easy access to the rest of Singapore. Only marked it down on value because Singapore is an expensive city to visit.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good value hotel
desc: Very nice hotel, good rooms and breakfast Comfy bed, very clean everywhere Very pleasant staff Free drinks and canapés in the evening but no restaurant Only downside was 20 minute walk to Orchard raid metro but once you were there good easy access to city, gardens by the bay/marina and botanical garden Would stay again and suggest it to others as good value

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very nice and friendly staff in the hotel
desc: Everything is very good. Particularly the staff in the lounge, when I have a rest here or have the breakfast, they always provide excellent service with smile and patience. Also the staff in reception are nice, introduced the hotel service and always willing to answer my questions and helped me a lot. I love my days staying here, I can say it provided the best experience for me of the many hotels I have ever stayed in Singapore. The business culture is so vibrant which impressed me a lot, every staff here looks in a happy mood which let the atmosphere of the hotel very good, it relieved my stress when I under pressure to follow up my business. I can imagine your management team is very high-skilled and successful. All in all, it’s a nice experience, I will recommend your hotel

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: 5 star experience at Quincy with friendly staff and unique F&B provisions!
desc: Highly recommended place to stay in very conveniently located central Singapore! It is literally a short walk away from my workplace in Orchard, which is the main shopping and dining district in Singapore. Every single staff my wife and I encountered on our staycation were amazing and wonderfully friendly, with some of them especially going out their way to make this a birthday weekend to remember for my wife! Shoutout to Stephanie Turkey too 🙏🏻 The rooms were really lovely, clean, and comfortable with a nice view from our top 14th floor. The infinity swimming pool and gym were really well maintained. There were nice outdoor places to relax on the ground level outdoors too. What is so unique about this hotel is that hot breakfast and drinks can be served until 3pm, perfect for

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Hotel
desc: Fantastic start to our holiday. The staff couldn't be more accommodating. The welcome with ice-cream and complementary canapés and wine in the evening made this a lovely. My husband needs a gluten meal and they organised canapés and breakfast for him. Breakfast is very good and sets you up for the day. See the website for options. The beds were the most comfortable I've been in for a long time. I prefer a firm bed. There is a choice of pillows. The hotel is quiet as it is on a no through road so we slept well. We were close to Orchard Rd where it was easy to get the MRT/tube 10 mins away and took about 30 mins with 2 changes to get to the Gardens on the Bay. Shops very close, the Paragan mall, and a 7/11 on the way. Try the restaurants in the mall, very good food and

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay with great staff
desc: Stayed 4 days in Quincy, the breakfast options were great and I find the non-buffet style creates less food waste! The rooms were clean and the staff was super friendly and easy to approach on all levels! Will definitely come back. The cocktail and open coffee stations were the highlight for me. Allows freedom and flexibility to quickly get a snack and a nice after work aperitive before dinner, The only disappointing part was the swimming pool was not an infinity pool and it's quite shallow and short.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Another fantastic stay at The Quincy
desc: From the welcome ice-cream and friendly staff at check-in to the fantastic breakfast options and evening canapes our stay at The Quincy more than met our expectations. The staff are always happy to assist and go over and above to ensure that you have the best possible stay. The rooms are well equipped, clean and are very comfortable. A pillow menu is provided to make sure you are catered for. The evening canapes and happy hour are a must - its a lovely way to unwind from the adventures of the day. We utilised the pool which is on the 12 floor. Pool towels are provided for easy convenience. Being a short walk to Orchard Road and the MRT is fantastic as it made travel around Singapore nice and easy! All the staff are great and helpful however, notable staff members during our

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful trip
desc: it is first time to visit Singapore, thanks to Quincy hotel, I experienced the wonderful accomodation. Especially, Breakfast is very nice. If I go to trip to Singapore, I'm willing to visit Quincy hotel. Thank you.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Quincy Hotel, Excellent Service with Super Friendly and Helpfull staff
desc: Nice Hotel, strategic location (it only needs 5-10 minutes walk to Orchard). Super Friendly and Helpfull staff (Mr. Jim Khoo and Mr. Mahen you guys are the best), Good room, It's spacious, comfort and clean. Beyond expectation! Definitely will come back again.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: An excellent hotel
desc: A good location, near to Orchard Road shops and restaurants, 20 minute walk to Orchard MRT station. Staff were friendly and helpful, rooms large quiet and comfortable. Pool area was excellent, and a good relief from the heat of the day. Free drinks and canapes in the evening added to the overall good experience.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Superb service
desc: We were delighted with this hotel. The staff were very attentive and nothing was too much trouble. The room was spacious and comfortable and everything was available including tea and coffee. The breakfast menu catered for all tastes and was very enjoyable. The only negatives are that there is no restaurant and about 15 mins to the underground.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Stay
desc: The front staff were very helpful and friendly! The room was comfortable and had everything I needed. They do a free happy hour that was quite nice and relaxing outside by the water feature. Breakfast is a set menu, but they do have gluten-free bread available.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Best Hotel In Singapore
desc: My wife and I have stayed in many 5 star hotels in our years of travel. You need to know that our stay at the Quincy Hotel ranks as the BEST hotel experience we've ever had! It is said what people will always remember is how you make them feel. The staff at the Quincey made us feel very special. In fact, the staff made us feel like we were "Family". It began upon our entering the hotel lobby on arrival, right through our departure to the airport on our last day, with a personal send off and thank you from Jim Khoo, the Area General Manager. I know that great service at every level begins at the top of an organization and permeates down through the ranks to every level. The staff at this hotel always made us feel welcome and that they were there to serve us in any way that was

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A nice hotel in the center of the city
desc: We appreciate the design, the welcome and the free after hours drink and food. Not too much rooms that makes the hotel cosy. We took the breakfast on the terrace outside and it was nice. The swimming pool is very nice at the 12th level but a bit cold after the rain.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great service
desc: We had a wonderful experience at this hotel. We arrived at 1 am and the 24 hour concierge service was wonderful! Clean comfortable room and good location. Very good breakfast as well. I highly recommend this hotel!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very cosy boutique hotel
desc: Very cosy boutique hotel next to Orchard Road with excellent personal and great facilities. It's a compact hotel but we got a very nice room with a great view. They are quite resourceful to provide tasty food options in a smaller dining area (à la carte instead of buffet).

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Getaway break
desc: Hotel is very close to Orchard shopping centre. Easy to get Taxi or Grab. Good service and very nice, clean room. Good breakfast in the morning and drinks in the evening all inclusive. We had a peasant stay! Thank you.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice base in Singapore
desc: There are many things that made our stay very pleasant: convenient and quiet location, free access to drinks and snacks 24/7, pool and gym overlooking the skyline, and professional staff with smiles. I would stay here again.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Clean and comfortable
desc: Hotel facilities are clean and well-kept. Staff is generally polite and attentive. Varied selection for breakfast and the appetizers / happy hour are excellent! Nice gym and sauna, but the infinity pool (with a nice view) is unfortunately too cold...

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: The Liston's
desc: Great hotel and location. Lots of extras to make it a good value for your money. It was close to a large shopping mall. Singapore is an incredible city to visit. We had a wonderful time there. I would highly recommend a trip there.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect singapore
desc: Wonderful staff: any need is satisfied. Every thing is offered: you need a glass of wine? A coke? They are at your disposal. Location is perfect to go everywhere. There is also a nice garden where relaxing with a good beer

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent
desc: We stayed Quincy fot 2 days. They gave us thoughful consideration of our 40th wedding anniversary with a bottle of wine and upgraded room condition. Snack bar was so impressive. Many thanks for your hospitality.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Quirky Quincy
desc: There is a lot to like about this hotel. It is quirky for sure. Just 10 mins walk from Orchard Road, and the MRT, tucked away on a quite street, so good location. The room was big, large bed, auto blinds, large desk, wardrobe space. Bathroom had separate bath and shower, although shower had black mould which was unfortunate. On two mornings only tepid water came from the shower. The breakfasts were substantial, but a lack of fruit! When we arrived there was a large fruit bowl with apples and oranges, but this was removed on the 2nd day. The icecream machine didn't work for the duration of our stay. The evening canapes were brilliant, plentiful and delicious, with 2 glasses of complimentary wine, beer of cocktails. The whole 5 nights I was there, they had ran out of

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Short break at The Quincy
desc: Fantastic hotel - great location, comfy rooms - beds are so good, choice of pillows and power shower and big big bath. Pool and gym are great if you have time after a days sightseeing. After a long day, Happy hour between 6-8 every day including canopies and drinks. A big shout out to John and Issa on reception who helped us with airport to locate missing luggage from UK. In fact all staff greets you with a big smile anytime of day. Thanks for a great few days.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great place and very convenient access all within 10mins
desc: Great place to stay it is within walking distance to orchards shopping area try like Paragon, Takashimaya, orchard gateway, ion and MRT Orchard. You may also take Bus# 36 to Changi Airport from Tang bus stop

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good value
desc: I like the meals not only breakfast but night canapé. Room is great but the sockets is not fit for US type plug, sometimes cannot be used and cause my plug a little bit burn, but it does work when specific angle, it better use EU type plug to use.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent accommodations within a block of Orchard Road
desc: This is a well-appointed boutique hotel that's a very short walk from Orchard Road shopping and the Orchard Road MRT. The staff is friendly and helpful. There is a full-cooked breakfast and nightly cocktail hour included, and they're both delicious. The rooftop pool has a great view and is a nice play to relax at different times during the day. The rooms are a bit small, but that seems to be the Singapore norm. We'd definitely stay here agian.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Lovely stay at the Quincy Hotel
desc: What a great little hotel this is, stayed for 3 days, just off Orchard Rd about 10 mins walk to the MRT. Price includes a couple of free drinks in the evening with canapes. All the staff were wonderful breakfast is made for you. Free soft drinks and coffee/tea all day. Very quiet location and easy to navigate around Singapore from here.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Overall services is perfect
desc: very enjoy the stay with your service people there, their politeness, kindness, smiling and help in need. the only issue is the insulation of the room door and used to hear noises from the corridor and the lift lobby.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Needs more attention to detail
desc: We stayed 4 nights on our way back to London. Hotel location is excellent. Reception staff are excellent. Don't bother with breakfast and cocktail hour as it promises more than it delivers. There are plenty of other choices along Orchard Road. It would be better to not offer the poor selection of food/ drinks and reduce the room rate as the breakfast and 'cocktails' (there are no cocktails and even white wine was never available when we asked) add nothing to the package. Room cleanliness needs attention - our glass shelves were dusty. Room lighting is awkward as individual bulbs (bedside and study lights) are too bright and glaring. Our safe box was at floor level requiring a lot of bending down to retrieve items daily. Overall I would say it is a good hotel (it is not very

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Singapore stay
desc: Great location ( close proximity to Orchard Rd., train and bus stops), very clean, comfortable rooms. The staff was courteous and helpful (specially Paulo). The snacks (since they offer it) could have more variety.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Best
desc: We arrived at 6:00 am after 17 hours flight. John from the from desk let us in without any extra charges and gave us a long list of of thighs we can attend and use complimentary while our stay. Love the hotel. Love this people. Modern, clean, convenient location, great food.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Not recommend! Unless you don't mind loss more due to payment error
desc: FX can be costly for foreign trip. This hotel first reverted your payment and charge you 20 days later. I lose alsmot 40 gbp because of it. Not enough space for the details, unfortunately. And I lost my water bottle......

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good hotel with east location
desc: Agent booked us, staff excellent and very helpful. Room good with bed 7/10 but noisy air-con. Breakfast and two hours evening with two free drinks and canapés thrown in to your stay. Hotel in cul de sac so quiet.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A great boutique hotel with friendly staff and a reasonable tariff
desc: This hotel is recommended for short visits to Singapore. We stayed 4 nights. Inclusive breakfast, evening drinks and canapes are a great touch and the pool is great. The staff were friendly and gave great local advice.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great place, great staff that all try hard all the time
desc: The hotel tries very hard, and this is very important. Everyone who works there is accommodating. The rooms were outstanding, with excellent beds and deep bathtubs along with walk-in showers. The breakfast, served almost all day long, is excellent, especially the avocado and poached egg toast with smoked salmon. The coffee machine is on all day. There is a Happy Hour where they again try very hard, including bringing each guest a cute tray of snacks assembled bespoke. The grounds are lovely. I will absolutely stay here again my next visit to Singapore, so long as they stay reasonable with rates (the rates were fantastic this visit).

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good location hotel with amazingly clean and well thought out rooms
desc: This was the first hotel that we stayed in for our honeymoon trip, it felt very modern and the room was immaculate, the staff were welcoming and informative and lobby smelt very nice, it's a 10 minute walk from the MRT and 5 to the main orchard Street, the included breakfast was very nice with a large selection to choose from and the evening canopes were also very tasty, great way to start the evening, if we visit Singapore again we will certainly visit this hotel.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Brilliant stay, excellent service, great perks
desc: Planned a solo staycation to relax and Quincy was a great choice! Close enough to Orchard Road's main attractions (food+shopping) and yet not right smack in the hustle and bustle of it. Service was impeccable with friendly and attentive staff. Breakfast and evening canapes were 💯. Room was clean and the pillows and bed were comfy. One minor gripe is that some minor upkeep to the room would be good, as a socket was loose and the toilet bar was a bit rusty. But otherwise, incredibly happy with the hotel. Felt well-rested and wished my stay was longer.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Quincy Staycation Birthday Celebration
desc: Both my wife and I throughly enjoyed our staycation in Quincy. Staff were very friendly and courteous. We really like the concept of breakfast till 3pm, all day refreshment, and the evening drinks and canapés. We especially like to grab our drinks and popcorn at the lounge and head back to our room for in-house movies. The 24 Hour Gym and pool is also a great idea whereby we don’t need to worry about their closing time. Kudos the team for creating that wonderful experience for us. Thank you and pleasant thoughts from both of us.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great and nice!
desc: Quincy hotel made everything easy, great and positive. What we needed but always with an extra twist of positive experience. Very nice and helpful personel, great with the fresh avo-toast for breakfast and always accesible tea/coffee/softdrinks. Perfect rooms.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A great hotel in central Singapore
desc: We found ourselves at the Quincy after the hotel we had booked became unavailable. What a gem, clean hotel, amazing breakfast and evening drinks and canapés included. Location is great for exploring all that Singapore has to offer. This hotels real strength though is it’s staff who are without exception friendly, helpful and polite.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic place
desc: We enjoyed our stay in this fantastic hotel very much. The location is great, metro not far away. Breakfast very good with options. The people there are very nice and helpful, especially Jim, the manager at breakfast. One of the best experiences was to go to the pool early in the morning and have this fantastic view of the houses around and the rising sun. Very recommendable hotel!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful Hotel
desc: I am just completing a five day stay at the Quincy. I want to share with you how happy I am. The moment I walked into the lobby I was warmly welcomed by the staff. Check in was quick and easy. They even gave me snacks. My room is quite spacious. The window is an entire glass wall with a nice view. Breakfast is included and is delicious. The wall in the dining area is entirely glass with a wonderful park like view. And they have drinks and snacks available all day, which I was happy to make use of frequently. The hotel is an easy walk to major shopping. The staff is excellent. Every person here made me feel like I was welcome and my satisfaction is important. They even welcomed me back each night with a delicious ice cream snack. And the pool on the 12th floor has a great view.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent hotel
desc: Nice location, helpful and friendly staff, modern hotel, comfy bed... a very nice hotel to stay in Singapore at reasonable price. If you choose the premium room you will get free minibar items and other privileges.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel, friendly staff
desc: The hotel has a perfect location just a 10 min walk from Orchard MRT. The staff was extremely helpful and friendly. A very good breakfast was included. On our last day we could even use the shower well after checkout in the gym before we left for the airport. Just perfect!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent hotel stay
desc: This was an unplanned hotel stay and very short notice. The hotel was able to accommodate us at very short notice and catered to our requests in a prompt and lovely manner. Would definitely recommend booking your stay here

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Does what it says on the tin!
desc: Decided to book The Quincy as most others seemed full or really expensive. When you land in Singapore after a 12 hour flight from the UK all you really need is a couple of nights to sort the jet lag and get some decent quality sleep. The Quincy delivered 10/10 on quality of sleep. Big very comfortable King Bed, great linens and most importantly very quiet. Good area slightly off of busy roads and the late breakfast (until 2pm…) as well as free drinks and canapés in the evening. What’s not to like.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Business stay
desc: Great location - walking distance to Orchard Road (shopping centres) - and a good breakfast selection. The staff just showed me preparedness and kindness when I needed assistance. I definitely recommend this hotel to business travelers.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: The place to stay
desc: Our two nights stop over at The Quincy was certainly a most enjoyable experience. Great staff, fantastic service and beautiful amenities. Location is great with an awesome view from the infinity pool and gym. Drinks and canapes each night as part of the package was delightful. A special thank you to Stephanie for all her assistance and to Mahen, who was certainly Concierge of the year. Great work guys. A memorable stay and highly recommended.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Hip Vibe, Great Staff
desc: Only stayed for two nights. The hotel is very clean with nice amenities in the room. I was working on the trip and had good interest connections for my video calls. They offer an excellent breakfast which was included and also offer unlimited snack and non alcoholic beverages and snacks throughout the day. This is the only hotel I've sever stayed where they offered a backup wake up call. Excellent service. Close proximity to Orchard Road.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great place to stay when visiting Singapore!
desc: The Quincy was a great place for us to stay during out first visit to Singapore. We spent 7 nights at The Quincy. The staff were friendly and helpful. The location is central to the Orchard district and so easy to get to the rest of Singapore via MRT. Within walking distance to high market shopping also. The room was spacious and we had a great view of the city. Great to have breakfast and night canapés included plus access to cold drinks throughout the day. Would recommend when visiting Singapore.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great choice for those on a budget in Singapore
desc: We picked this hotel as it was within budget and in the right location, and we were very happy with our choice. The front desk staff could not be any more helpful or friendly--from check-in to ensuring we got a taxi, etc. My colleague and I reserved Premier rooms and availed of the additional amenities, which were a nice touch. Rooms were very clean, spacious and bright and included a good sized bathroom with a separate shower and bath. The gym was good and no one in it, as was the pool. Great to have and a beautiful view. We were checking out late so we had the use of the showers and changing rooms at the gym which was another plus. If I were to be picky, I would say that breakfast could be improved. Service seemed erratic at times and I wasn't a fan of the options or the

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfortable and the staff couldn’t have been more helpful.
desc: The location was a bit away from the main tourist spots, but I enjoy walking round a city. 30 minutes walk gets you to Fort Canning and about an hour to Raffles Hotel with another 35 minutes to the Gardens on the Bay. The room was spacious and it was the first room with a bath in a month of travelling. Lovely shower and a bidet toilet, (which was an experience). Check-out is 12:00, but my plane left after 23:00. They were happy to hold my bags securely for me, but as the weather was really wet and thundery, the staff said I could hang around in the public areas sorting my photos and writing reviews for my long trip. They even said I could use the pool and other facilities and have a shower before I travelled. That kindness alone made the experience really good. The

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Golden Surprise Find Minutes From Orchard Rd
desc: Our main priority for a hotel in SG was a bidet! Quincy was one of the rare few and not only that - it’s new, minimalist and really affordable, considering its walking proximity to Orchard Road, Newton Circus and all their connecting MRT lines! We really enjoyed the concept of a set breakfast each morning, and the complimentary evening canapés + wine every night. Sincerely, we were really impressed. No doubt this will be our chosen hotel for our next trip. 100% recommended.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation at Quincy Hotel
desc: It’s my first time staying here and the experience was fantastic with 24 hour lounge access and welcome drinks & snacks provided. I also enjoyed other facilities like the sauna too. The staff were also very friendly.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Felt like home!
desc: The rooms here as compared to most of the hotel are spacious enough. The staff was very warm and welcoming. The set breakfast meals were great. 24x7 coffee and snacks service was fantastic. Very well maintained hotel!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect Stay
desc: Excellent stay and the staff were very helpful. Great location and a special mention to Jim the GM and Sanju who were very accommodative to all our requests. We are Looking forward to our next visit. Thank you!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic hotel
desc: Customer service was consistently excellent every single day I was there. Staff were helpful, consistent and location a walking distance to Orchard road. Location was super convenient. Breakfast was great and I always looked forward to the nibble and dribbles from 6 to 8pm. Room was a good size and the bathroom was my favourite. I have recommended this hotel to colleagues heading to Singapore this year. I am also headed to Singapore later in the year so will be staying at The Quincy

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Not sure who is writing 5 star reviews ?!?!
desc: Shockingly underwhelming I am confused at who is writing 5 star reviews for this hotel The check in service was mediocre, yes you are offered ice cream but you carry your own cases from the taxi to your room…. Having stayed in many 5 star resorts, I have never ever encountered this before. The bellboy normally comes to the taxi, grabs your bags and takes them to your room for you! Same applied when we checked out. The evening canapés were good. But only beer and wine is included, you can tell these are of cheap quality from the taste. What I find strange is that it shows a cost of these at SGD 10, as well as cocktails showing the same prices, but cocktails are not included in the evening Canapé option?!! If they are the same price, then why not ?? There is no water available

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Expensive
desc: Hotel is well located off Orchard road, but a poor value for money. There are many 4/5 star hotels available. Reception and lounge areas are small and furnishings very basic. Lack of fruits and salads in breakfast is appalling. Room size ok but again very basic furnishing. Staff and service excellent and very caring. Place is not suitable for families. Single travellers may like it. Swimming pool on top floor is very nice. Located next to Vibe hotel of the same group it looks like a poor cousin.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Kind and Amazing staff
desc: The staff at Quincy are nothing but kind and amazing. They have been very helpful, always greeted with smile during my stay. I would recommend this to everyone visiting Singapore. and Yes the Ion Orchard is close too.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing experience, highly recommended!
desc: My stay here is amazing! I planned this staycation just to get away from the hustle and bustle of the city and take a break from my normal routine. The team here, special mention to Lina, is simply amazing. She is attentive, friendly and pays great attention to details. I requested for a room nearer to the lift and she was able to provide exactly what I requested. I came back into the room (after i went out for meal) and was pleasantly surprised to find a personalised note from them! Very thoughtful! I have stayed in many hotels locally in Sg and overseas and have experienced this amazing level of service for the first time. Great job and kudos to the team here at Quincy Hotel! Highly recommended!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Singapore getaway
desc: From the moment we walked in the door it felt like a home away from home. All staff from Management to room service were extremely helpful and courteous. We had a Premier room which was well appointed and Breakfast was provided. The Canapés and drinks at were an amazing conclusion to our days activities. Proximity to Scotts, Orchard Roads and MRT was great. Thoroughly recommend this hotel.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: 5 days in SG
desc: Great service from my check-in, breakfast until my check-out. Staff were excellent, very polite, attentive and accommodating. Rooms were kept clean also had a great view. Overall, I had a great stay during my 5 days in SG thanks to Quincy. :)

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A VERY PLEASANT HOTEL CLOSE TO ORCHARD RD SHOPPING
desc: In my opinion the Quincy Hotel offers outstanding value for money. The hotel is tastefully finished and very clean. The reception staff were very pleasant, always smiling and eager to help. Complimentary breakfast is cooked to order and there is also a good range of pastries, bread fruits etc. In the early evening the hotel provides complimentary canapes and drinks a lovely touch. There is a swimming pool and Gym. The Quincy offers everything most people require, nothing grand, but small and tasteful.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Hidden Gem
desc: Had stayed here for 2 nights. Quincy is truly a hidden gem, they got you all covered. My favourite place is their lounge. Breakfast till 3pm, evening happy hour from 6pm-8pm and all day light refreshments, they will never let you feel left out. Location is convenient as well, it’s only 5 minutes away from Orchard. Room cleanliness is top-notch, they even have a pillow menu. Facilities here are what you exactly need at a hotel, nothing less. Staff here are super friendly and welcoming, special mention to Mei Ying, Sharvin, Selena and Camille from the Reception: and Odil from the lounge. Will definitely be back!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A great choice in Singapore
desc: This was my first time here and I loved it. I slept really well with the gorgeous high thread count bedding, once I'd worked out how you close the blind (switch by bed). The room was smallish but everything I needed was there and I had an amazing view from the 11th floor. Breakfast was plentiful and much better than described in some of the previous reviews. I enjoyed it. When I saw there were evening canapes and wine included I wasn't expecting prosecco and I'd just imagined a couple of plates of nibbles on the bar so I was very happy with what was offered. Also having snacks on hand 24/7 was great. All in all I had a fabulous long weekend in Singapore and loved the hotel enough to stay there again.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Holiday in Singapore
desc: The Quincy is in a perfect location to Orchard Road and the MRT. The staff are friendly and most helpful. A highlight of our stay was the nightly all inclusive canapés and wine/beer. The Quincy is certainly value for money.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Highly recommended staycation in town
desc: It’s rare to find a place where you can truly be yourself. I am glad I found Quincy. You can walk around in your bathrobe with no one judging you. You can ask for more red wine and they will gladly serve you. You can ask for seconds and they actually bring you more than one serving of canapé. Breakfast till 3pm, what’s not to love? I love the food and the booze, I could do this all day and all night. I highly recommend Quincy if you are looking to get away from work, get away from family and spend some time alone with your loved one. It’s convenient, it’s chill. You get to relax and they literally feed you 24/7 because the bar is open 24/7.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent combination for good facilities, nice staff and tasty breakfast at affordable prices.
desc: The facilties are nice, they are clean and comfortable. The best part is the staff as they are very nice and helpful. I received a lot of support of each member I asked supsport from. They help us with an early check in and the breakfast they provide is very good!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A great hotel stay
desc: Seven nights at this lovely hotel. Both reception staff and restaurant staff were exceptional. Breakfasts were quickly and efficiently served by smiling and helpful wait staff. Canapes and drinks at night were very enjoyable. Our rooms were very clean and well presented and the pool was the cleanest hotel pool we have ever stayed at. Totally recommend and would return without hesitation,.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent hotel
desc: Stayed for 2 nights and was very happy and satisfied with everything. The hotel is conveniently located in a quiet residential area but near to Orchard Road and MRT station. The hotel provides complimentary drinks and canapés in the evenings too.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Without doubt we'll book The Quincy next visit. Excellent all round.
desc: This was our fourth visit to Singapore in 20 years and as always the problem is where to stay. There is such a large choice of hotels and in the past we've stayed at Raffles and Shangri-La (both excellent). We booked one hotel and then had a change of plan and booked 4 nights at The Quincy. What an excellent choice it turned out to be. After a 13 hour flight and arriving early morning we were delighted to be give an early check in by Stephanie, who was very efficient and friendly. Our room 1309 was on the 13th floor and was spacious and clean, the bed comfortable and the room had a full blackout roller shutter. The bathroom had a hot and powerful rain shower and a separate, sizeable bath. We were offered a selection of 5 mini bar items and this was the start of where The Quincy

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Hotel OK but poor Benefits
desc: Lots of Benefits from the past times were canceled. I think I want stay there again. No free laundry more, no Lunch and dinner in Buffet Form, no Airport Lounge Voucher, no Transfer ( Voucher and Transfer were offered sometimes ), No Soft Ice machine, Evening cocktails limited by 3 small cans of Beer, No refill of Mini Bar. All this were a main reason for me to stay. Hotel staff very friendly and helpfull as usual.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: My Stay
desc: Stayed for 7 days and the checking in was a breeze, that it took 15 minutes for the checking in process. Also, I was able to have an early check in and were offered snacks and drinks while waiting for my room to be ready. The Staff are very attentive and the hotel is very clean and modern. Breakfast was good and there are canapes and cocktails/wines offered every night

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Relaxation at its finest.
desc: What a wonderful place to stay if you want a hotel that not only meets your every needs but gives you privacy & attention without being evasive at the same time - the breakfast until 3 pm was such a bonus as you could ease into the morning by having a swim without rushing to meet breakfast times/ the all day snacks & drinks was also an amazing touch as well as cocktail hour- you really didn’t need to leave the hotel at all- the products in the bathroom were amazing - a short stroll to orchard rd -shops, train & buses/ Newton hawker centre made it convenient - have already recommended to everyone & would stay again!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: All the staff were very kind.
desc: It was my first trip to Singapore. All staff were very helpful. You can choose 1 out of 7 types of breakfast every day. I chose "waffle" and "Asian Rice Porridge" during my stay, and both were delicious. There is also a lounge, gym, and pool that can be used 24 hours a day, which I enjoyed even on rainy days. Thanks to everyone, it was a wonderful trip.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: It all works
desc: The 2 of us stayed in a Premier room on the 6th floor. My third visit to the hotel. Everything worked well with an excellant very late check in, a late cooked breakfast which was delicious, and help for us getting to the airport with a late checkout. Perfect stopover on our way home to Perth from Europe. Will stay longer next time.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Best hotel
desc: Great hotel convenient to shops and restaurants. Excellent staff very friendly and couldn't do enough to help you. Lovely spacious room clean and comfortable . Breakfast good choices and two free drinks in the evening. In all an excellent hotel to spend your holiday in Singapore.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A great stay!
desc: Really friendly folks at the front desk and the free breakfast that was offered was great. The coffee was amazing!!! Also loved being able to sit outside by your running landscape fountain garden. Great pool experience.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Exceptional staff and hotel
desc: Stayed for 2 days to break up trip home to Australia from Europe. The hotel is well positioned just a short walk to Orchard Road. The staff, rooms, and services provided is 1st class and definitely recommend a stay at this hotel.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent stay
desc: the hotel is a short work from orchard road, behind paragon mall, close enough to everything, but far enough away that it's fairly quiet. the staff were friendly and very, very helpful and accommodating of my request of a late check-out/luggage storage/use of gym shower upon return before my long haul flight. Bed was comfy, the electric blinds were a touch of luxury, and the breakfast was decent. My only complaint (although trivial) is that there was a religious prayer in the room, printed on a small slip of paper on the bedside table.
