It's a non-issue really, but i'm not religious so found it slightly odd. otherwise, everything was excellent.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: 100% absolutely, do it.
desc: We spent 3 nights here as part of a 2 week trip up the coast of Asia for which we had booked a Deluxe room. We queried a room upgrade, which was simply a bigger space and a Nespresso machine, neither of which we would have ended up using for the S$25 per night (ish). We were greeted at reception with an ice cream cookie choice, and a very swift check in process. Everything was explained well, and when we asked for directions locally, they came outside and showed us where to go. There’s two MRT stations about 15 minutes walk away (Orchard and Newton), a 7 Eleven about 5-10 minutes walk, and two local food courts around 15 minutes walk (Food Republic at Shaw Centre, in the basement and at Wisma Atria, on 3rd or 4th floor) Let’s talk about the canopies/happy hour in the evening.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay, with nice trimmings
desc: For us, the bed was a bit hard and the pool was a couple of degrees too cold. On the positive side, staff were excellent - from front desk to housekeeping to dining area, we didn’t encounter a bad one. Breakfast good. Drinks and canapés at night were a huge bonus….got our evenings off to a nice start. Overall, a very satisfying experience.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Curated, premium and relaxed experience
desc: The staff here operates with an efficiency and sincerity that is greatly appreciated!  I’m impressed with how well the first floor staff is trained and the housekeeping team is accommodating for odd schedules. *The espresso machine was appreciated.  Often with the time change I am up 3-4am and doing work.  It was very nice to that upscale coffee available before the kitchen opens at 7 *Much about the Quincy feels very thought though and curated.  My answer to the Dell staff when asking about where I was staying was that the Quincy has thought through everything I need and the quality of it and has removed a lot of the noise of things I don’t want or need.  Anything that I find myself missing, a quick request of the front desk staff is always efficiently received and responded

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Tired and old
desc: Refurbishment required though the staff can't do enough to assist. Friendly and courteous. But building is old and tired. Needs a good luck of paint. Airconditioning was terrible. Can't turn the fan down or adjust the temp.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice place, highly recommended
desc: I recommend this hotel for many reasons, some of which: Excellent service, great happy hour, good breakfast, Good location, perfect cleaning, friendly staff and many other. I hope to come back early. thanks

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Poor Breakfast and hard beds.
desc: Overall experience good however breakfast not up to standard and beds too firm. Staff overall very good. We stayed for 3 nights and we only had breakfast at hotel once so the stay ended up costing me more !! You are paying for location.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Misleading and very poor F&B quality
desc: I booked the Quincy Hotel because it mentioned that breakfast, 24 h refreshment and evening cocktails were included in the price - which wasn't cheap! Had I known what i know now, I would have stuck to the Marriott that I normally book. Positive - the location and the staff Upon check in, I was asked to choose my 5 mini bar items from a list. I told them that when I booked the room, I had already done it via a link that was sent to me. I was then asked to show them confirmation - This wasn't my job to prove to them I had done it fi their process doesn't work. Then I was told that for the 'Evening Cocktail I was only allowed 2 beers and 2 glasses of wine" and that they only served Mocktails, not cocktails. I challenged this saying that on the website there's no mention of

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice spacious and trendy hotel with friendly customer service
desc: Hotel is surprisingly very new and located very closely to Orchard Road. We encountered some problems upon check in with our booking room type through Agoda but the team at Quincy was just superb. They handled the problem and the manager himself was hands on in resolving the problem. Interestingly, the hotel also provided Happy hour, and breakfast last till 3p.m. On our first stay, we encountered a problem that it took us 45 minutes to get our Happy hours orders out. We talked with the front desk about it, and found out that it was because of the arrival of the new kitchen staffs. Luckily for the next few days that we stayed there, we dont have to wait that long for food to be served, and it was actually pretty good. Good option for those needing spacious & clean room to

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A great base to explore Singapore.
desc: My husband, son and I spent 7 nights at The Quincy which was a great little boutique hotel a short walk from Orchard Road and the MRT station. Very clean with friendly staff, there was a good choice for breakfast although a choice of fruit other than melon would have been good. Happy Hour was a lovely touch, with free canapes and wine/beer served in the lounge/breakfast area from 6-8pm. Free snacks and soft drinks were also available throughout the day which my husband and son appreciated after our days out exploring. The pool area was very clean, with fresh pool towels available.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great
desc: Best stay around Orchard with amazing brunch. Their complimentary night canape & drinks also really good. 24 hrs refreshment also available at their lobby. Nice ambience overall Thanks for the lovely service Ms. Amena & Mr. Soban. Always give their best from morning till late.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great and clean
desc: Pros: Gorgeous panoramaview, nice swimming pool, great breakfast and café, next to the MRT. Contras: I have not experienced this I highly recommend this hotel for a short trip to Singapore. Thanks a lot!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Lovely comfortable boutique hotel in good location
desc: Lovely comfortable boutique hotel, All staff very friendly and helpful. Hotel location in a quiet neighbourhood but within walking distance to bus stops and MRT (metro system|). Nice relaxing pool on the 12th floor next to the gym. Our room had a great view with huge windows, bed was comfortable and all amenities were good. Complimentary fizzy drinks and flavoured pop corn available from the downstairs bar/reception. Really enjoyed our stay here. Thank you Quincy staff - John and Hazel

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: PERFECT STAY IN SINGAPORE
desc: I found all perfect. Gym and swimming-pool open 24 hours, breakfast until 2.30 pm....staff wonderful and professional. More than my expectations. For sure an hotel to recommend and where I will book again next visit.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Friendly staff, cute hotel, clean and comfortable
desc: We enjoyed our stay at Quincy. It is located close to Orchard Rd MRT, comfortable room and staff very friendly and helpful. Breakfast included, wifi good and plenty of space around the hotel to relax, outside of your bedroom.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great base to visit Singapore
desc: The Quincy staff were fantastic! It was our 30th wedding anniversary and they decorated our room, let us check in early and gave us a free coffee & pastry. Great location to walk to all areas you might want to visit. Thanks for the brolly loan. Free snacks, canapes and drinks - great idea, thanks. Only reason for 4 rather than 5 on our score is that our room needed a spruce up.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Family Staycation
desc: Great location as the orchard road shopping belt is just around the corner and it’s convenient without the hassle of driving. The serene location is away from the bustle of town and great for chilling out after a hard day of shopping and eating

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good Experience
desc: The checkin staff is very friendly and helpful in helping us with the awesome checkin process, and give us a very good day to begin with. Really appreciate! Good breakfast. Close to Orchard Rd MRT, but need to walk around 10min.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Booking by travel agency or by direct?
desc: Booking through travel agent is better than direct booking. I needed to extend the stay one day longer, and asked the reception for the best rate, then the answer was much expensive than internet booking by Agora.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Holiday
desc: We experienced great service at the Quincy!! The team were super helpful, giving us tips on using the transport system and also direction us to the local Hawker centre(The Newton Hawker Centre). The food was great, the view was good but the service was exceptional.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great place to stay
desc: We enjoyed our stay here. Our room was a good size and was well equipped. The shower was excellent. We found the staff friendly and helpful. The breakfast was good though not a big range of food. Having tea, coffee and snacks available all day plus cocktail hour was very nice. The hotel is a 10 minute walk to Orchard Rd and the mrt station.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A Gem in the middle of town
desc: Was in town for a school reunion. Off beat hotel with a few quirky features. like mens and women's restrooms are all together, (not my fave part). We had a great stay - the hotel is very central and cool The rooms are comfortable with blackout blinds. We had a laugh at the window between the bathroom and the bedroom and were relieved to find the blind! as we were friends sharing. I loved that there were no children and the all day drinks and coffee was a bonus. Breakfast included is a wonderful treat also. The staff work very hard to ensure guests are comfortable. Canapes and drinks in the evening was also a pleasant surprise as the canapes on offer were mostly very good and the variety astonishing. I would stay there again definitely. The pool is functional , serves

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Qunicy Hotel- great location, nice Q00l team!
desc: We enjoyed our month long stay at the Qunicy hotel in Singapore. Though all the staff was nice and helpful, there was a group that really went out of their way to make us feel comfortable; thanks to Mahen, Yuki, Nantha, Amena, and Soli.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Location & Great Experience
desc: We enjoyed our stay, this is gonna be another Far east Hotel under our favorites hotel. We enjoyed our stay and had a memorable birthday experience. Thank you for the birthday hotel souvenirs. We really appreciate it.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice hotel, great staff
desc: Spent 1 month at Quincy, Aug.2023. Rooms were clean, location was good, staff was very helpful and friendly. All staff went above and beyond - especially want to thank Mahen, Yuki, Nantha, Amena,&Soli

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Bad service
desc: Due to a canceled flight we were not able to sleep in the hotel. Unfortunately we did have to pay for this night. very bad service. In addition, no one was available in the evening to pass this on. the reason we have to pay for the night is because we arrived in the morning and were already allowed in the room then. so we paid more than € 200 for that. ridiculous

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Best hotel staff in Singapore
desc: Thanks for creating a friendly, attentive and modern environment in the heart of Orchard. Priced well and just the right level of amenities and services. I have stayed in many hotels in Singapore over 25yrs and The Quincy has left the most positive impression so far. See you next time.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Quirky Quincy made my birthday!
desc: Had a good staycay for my birthday in Premier Room (corner room 32m2 with huge bathroom). The F&B selection at breakfast with choice of hot mains and semi-buffet, the big tray of quality canapés and cheese served free at Happy Hour and the nice snacks and hot beverages and chilled soft drinks provided 24 hrs in the lounge were great. An unexpected nice touch were the Polaroid shot and complimentary lemon meringue tart with lit candle offered for my birthday surprise when I was sipping on free booze during Happy Hour at the lounge. I wonder how they knew I was there ! ;) Assistant Manager Lina Safie was cheerful, professional and welcoming at check-in and she organised my birthday surprise. A smiley Camille handed out ice cream sandwiches to ease the waiting during the

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Singapore stopover
desc: From the moment we got out of the taxi until the moment we left,the staff were wonderful. Nothing was too much trouble for them. We were there for Singapore Day and hotel put on an evening to celebrate there food and culture, Rooms very good . Would highly recommend The Quincy Hotel

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Came here to celebrate my anniversary with my girlfriend and was not disappointed.
desc: Came here to celebrate my anniversary with my girlfriend and I was not disappointed. The hospitality displayed by the front office team was amazing. They surprised me with a tart, balloons, drinks and snacks as well as a card wishing us. They took a polaroid for us to commemorate as well! I loved the initiative by the team to surprise us! Shout-out to Lina for the amazing hospitality! Only downside is the huge climb up the road to the hotel but it was absolutely worth it. Will definitely recommend!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Average Hotel
desc: I have stayed here 3 times before and unfortunately things have changed. The location is excellent but the lounge area/breakfast area is not as good as before. Wait staff need more training. Some drinks were not available.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Look No Further in Singapore!
desc: Look No Further! We had previously stayed at this hotel prior to Covid, and had fond memories of our stay here. The entire experience from booking to actual stay was exceptional, and by comparison the standards, all around, where what others can only aspire to. The inclusive package that we selected together was the premier room can be recommended. The breakfast was outstanding, and above all was available daily until 3 PM. The staff went out of their way to assist in every possible manner. Before arrival we already had the name of a contact person,Jin Hao, and believe it or not, he made the effort to come and visit us and bring a little gift along with him. The king size bed was comfortable, and access to plugs and chargers were well thought out. There was nothing we could

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic and Excellent Hotel
desc: In many years travelling around the word we have never seen a service like in this hotel. Bravo for Nantha Kumar, great professional, always helping and giving his best to the clients, the service is of 5*, also for Agnes, incredible professional. Both always with a big and nice smile. If you are going to visit Singapore, we recommend the hotel, without any doubt.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: QUINCY IS A MAYBE EXPERIENCE
desc: The Quincy hotel is quite a hike from Orchard Road and the MRT. If you don't mind getting your steps in and a hill every time you come and go from this hotel, it maybe for you. Pros comfortable room - bed and pillows great and bathroom facilities great, excellent staff that were always available to see to any needs. Cons would be the distance from any restaurants and shopping and MRT, together with poor selection for breakfast.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: All good :)
desc: Since we checked in can feel that how cozy this hotel, staff are friendly, room is clean and comfortable with fully complementary, 24hrs for soft drink coffee tea and snacks, we will come back for next time

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: 4-day stay at Quincy not enough -- thanks to excellent service and good food!
desc: We loved the breakfast food and the excellent service. For the food - we really liked the prawn noodle soup -- such that even before we checked out, our group still managed to eat it before we left for the airport. Special mention to Mr. Nantha Kumar for the very warm welcome and for taking care of our group. He even went the extra mile by getting us ice cream after one of my companions asked about the ice cream machine she saw in the hotel AVP being played in the lobby. I also loved the room -- creative use of limited space (but to be honest, I only found the closet after I used the bathroom), very comfy bed and pillows, and good shampoo and body wash.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel
desc: The Quincy was a great hotel to stay at for a couple days on my solo travel adventure. I would recommend it to most anyone. The gym and pool were convenient and the breakfast was delicious. I would surely stay there again.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice hotel stay
desc: Quiet and clean hotel. Bath tub is clean. Very happy to have 24 hours access to refreshment at lounge at level 1. The only drawback i want to highlight, is if you have heavy luggage and need to take public transport, then it may not the most convenient place to stay. Not a problem for me for 1 night staycation though.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A good quality service hotel and friendly staff!
desc: Quincy hotel _ Clean room, good location, not far from bus and MRT stations, near restaurants and shopping places. The staff are nice and friendly. My husband and I enjoy amenities like gymn, pool, nice garden, etc. A good selection on breakfast.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great front desk staff personnel
desc: Nandha the front desk person was someone really that should be very well appreciated. The customer service was really good from him, his communication skills was one of the best I've seen. Been to many hotels over 30 hotels including atleast 10 or more 5 star rated hotels and resorts, this one has really grabbed my attention as he was really friendly, communication skills is great and honestly when I come back I would really want him to be the one to welcome us again. Will definitely come back just to stay there and speak with him during cocktail hours and dinner. Did not get to thank him before checking out but I hope this message goes to him, thank you Nandha for you great hospitality and would come back to see you in the near future. And also when checking out there was a

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Hidden gem stay in Buzzling Orchard
desc: Located in buzzling Orchard and yet away from all the noise and shopping crowds, providing a quiet, peaceful stay perfect for couples staycation. Even though there wasn't any breakfast buffet, the all day refreshments, breakfast sets and evening canapes more than make up for it. Excellent service from all the staff there, hotel was also really clean. Will definitely come back again.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: We loved this hotel!
desc: A great boutique hotel in a great location. Staff were fantastic, from the moment we arrived and were offered a beautiful icecream and given a basket of mini bar items. The room was lovely and very clean. Tea and coffee and snacks always available. The complimentary evening drinks and canapes were very much appreciated. It is a great idea to have breakfast till 3pm. We were touched by the bottle of wine left in our room to celebrate a birthday. Our first time in Singapore and such a great experience. Thank you. Anne and Steve

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderfu Staycation without the noisiness of children! :D
desc: The pool was well maintained, and clean! Rooms were clean and tidy and the water pressure was amazing! Loved the tub! Bed was comfortable, a lot of channels on tv! Friendly staffs! We booked this hotel again to enjoy our staycation in in 3 months time!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Singapore Stopover
desc: Excellent facilities and very friendly and helpful staff Location was reasonable and the pool and gym excellent The rooms are of good size and the bathrooms well maintained and comfortable The bed was just right for a good night sleep Good value for money

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Funky Boutique Hotel
desc: Great location, generally fab staff, lovely pool which is open all hours. Checkin very easy. breakfasts available all day and v generous. Evening drinks very pleasant. Nice boutique hotel, just moments from Orchard Rd.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Location
desc: This hotel is very close to Orchard Road and shops. A 10 minute walk to Metro - Orchard. Rooms were clean, good size with comfortable bed. All amenities were there. Complientary evening drinks and Canapes were amazing and the availability of coffee and cold drinks during the day was welcome. Breakfast good amd available until 3.30pm! Reception staff were very helpful. Although no restaurant for evening meal you can go to their other hotel Vibe for a meal. There are plenty of places to eat nearby. Almost across the road from Mount Elizabeth hospital should one be necessary!! Only negative was the air conditioning in our room was very loud!!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Definitely coming back again!
desc: Swift check-in process when I arrived at the front desk. The team was very professional and friendly at all times. They even went above and beyond to make my stay comfortable and memorable. Thank you Yingzi, Agnes, and Fatin!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: There isn't a need to go out at all.
desc: This is the best hotel I’ve stayed. You don’t need to leave the premises at all! Food is served all day. You can eat/drink the snacks in the room! Love this so much. There are activities to participate in. Service by the staff was good too. A staycation before our baby was out. We really enjoyed this couple time together. The staff was really kind to us too. Hotel room is clean and spacious. Comfy bed, clean towels. 5 stars for having everything provided!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice vacation
desc: Staff was very helpful, receptive and proactive. Rooms are confortabile, food are diversified, is international food. Is located close to Orchid Road, at a very quiet street, at 5 minutes by walk. Is a great place for a family or couples.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Best place for staycation
desc: It's a quiet hotel and i had a great staycation which was what i needed. they allowed us to check in early and had a great free flow of food. the staff are friendly. the place is near to orchard where the busy streets are. the room was big and nice with great views. love the stay where i could finally rest my mind.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Lovely ambience and excellent service
desc: This review is long overdue. When we went to Singapore, we randomly booked Quincy for 4 nights as well as Sofitel at Sentosa for the rest of the week. Honestly the staff and amenities given at Quincy was amazing. It's a perfect getaway place for a couple. Not sure if it's for a family with kids. We had such a good time. The room was just perfect! We even ordered in from their restaurant for dinner on the first day. The pizza and noodles was sooo good that we decided to order again the next day. I wish we had just stayed there the entire week. I didn't want to leave! One of the best hotels we've been to!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good location and service!
desc: Went for my birthday celebration and was happy with the hospitality of the staff working there. Enjoyed the complimentary baking class that was conducted. The hi-tea corner was yummy and gotten a complimentary birthday cake slice as well. The hotel uses lush products which were environmentally friendly which also a bonus point and nice to have. Room is clean and spacious with a nice view.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Solid Business Hotel with a quirky boutique vibe
desc: Staff very friendly, efficient and accommodating. Rooms clean and well-appointed. Hotel offers a breakfast buffet that opens relatively early for Singapore and a 'happy hour' drink and snack service late afternoons. Good location in the Orchard Road area. A great extra was the free one-garment-per-day laundry service: a real life-saver for the business traveler.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Lovely stay!
desc: Had a great stay at the hotel! The rooms were big and very luxurious! The breakfast was also quite pleasant and fresh! The location was quite close to orchard road! We went as a family and we had no complaints :)

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great staycation
desc: Had a staycation here and it was a wonderful experience with the additional activities at the hotel. Fantastic rooms and open bar in the evening. Only complaint I had was one of the complimentary main courses which I felt was very average. I would score it 4.5/5 and decided to round up the score :)

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: The Quincy Hotel in Singapore
desc: This lovely little boutique hotel in the centre of Singapore, 150 metres from Orchid Road, a wonderful establishment great service, all inclusive, meals are not large but adequate. 2 Pieces of laundry per room every day included, staff are extremely helpful and happy to please. We have stayed 3 times now and I do not look any further than this hotel

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Worth every penny!!
desc: Stayed at The Quincy Hotel on my birthday with my family for 3 nights, and it has come to be one my favourite hotels! Unlike other exorbitantly priced hotels on Orchard Road (city centre), Quincy is definitely a value for money hotel! It’s modern, clean, well-maintained, and offers unlimited snacks and drinks throughout the day. It’s located just a few minutes walk to Orchard, and after reading such great reviews, I decided to book 3 rooms for 3 nights at this hotel. And we weren’t disappointed! Had an amazing stay at The Quincy and will definitely recommend it!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: one of my favourite hotel in Singapore
desc: stayed here for 3-4 times for business... never failed! love the hotel ambiance, the breakfast buffet, the evening cocktail hour, room is spacious and comfortable.Only 5-10 mins walking to Orchard road, they offer free minibar wohoooo!!! Great value of money :)

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fabulous Stay
desc: Such a fabulous small hotel. Quiet but excellent location near Orchard Street. Service and staff were outstanding. Great value with some meals, snacks and drinks/alcohol included. Would not hesitate staying here again. Excellent for couples, friends or business travel.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: True Business Hotel
desc: Right location , Right People and Rightly customized package for an Business Traveler . I stayed 3-4 times at this place in last 1 year and always found this place ticking on all the services expected on my checklist. From Complimentary shuttle from Airport to Hotel , to In - room Complimentary bar , 2 pcs laundary , full day light snacks in lobby to unlimited drinks/snacks at evening 6:30- 8:30 , Kiosk to book cab , 5 min walk to Shopper heaven Orchard Street and 7 min walk to MRT station . Rooms are spacious and classy offering view of the Singapore skyline . Infinity pool , Gym and sauna on rooftop are 24*7 available . Colors and interiors are vibrant . Suitable for Business Travelers , Family travelers can avoid due to lack of in - house entertainment and baby -

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Loved It!
desc: Great friendly staff, wonderful inclusions- the free mini bar, breakfast, snacks all day & iPhone! Made dropping back into the hotel for a rest so enjoyable. Very very clean! Explored Singapore after breakfast, came back for afternoon swim & drinks and then out again.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great for business or short stay
desc: Ideal hotel for a quick business stop or stopover. In the heart of town, minibar and small buffet included. Easy walk to Orchard Road and shops. I was there 7 days for business, easy walk to Newton Circus. Very clean with nice pool and gym facilities. Not the best in Singapore for a holiday with family but great for business or stopover. Friendly staff. Nice bar/ beer garden to have a beer and unwind at the end of the day.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: loved it!
desc: i took a short staycation to rest my tired soul. realised the hotel didn't have bath salt, their front desk actually went thru the extra mile and bought me some, on the house. the room was great, i loved the spacious bathroom and the rain shower. the cherry on top would be complimentary meals all day. from breakfast till dinner. the coffee machine is still available even at 2am in the morning.hotel is in the heart of orchard too. it is overly value for money. i would visit again! thank you so much for the great hospitality!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Love the Quirky Animals in Foyer
desc: Nice friendly hotel wth cute stuffed animals to make you smile as you enter. Good cleaning staff and complimentary drinks and light meal early evening and snacks throughout the day. Location good and hotel very quiet when we stayed there. Reception staff efficient and helpful. Forgot to let on that it was my birthday when I stayed there as I see others got treats! All in all would recommend.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Interesting stay
desc: Loved the urban modern design of this hotel. A nice place to relax. Quick check in and out. Pros: -Dinner free buffet but with very limited selections. -modern design. Nothing is old fashion about this hotel Cons: -my only complaint is that the water was very slow to come out in the bathroom sink.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome stay at the Quincy Hotel
desc: We had a great stay here while in Singapore. Modern and clean facilities. Very good value on the reservation with breakfast, mini bar, refreshments, snacks, dinner and drinks. Friendly and attentive staff that make the stay enjoyable. Excellent location!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent hotel, probably the best in Singapore.
desc: This is an excellent hotel and probably the best in Singapore and its based on every aspect that I Judge a hotel on. Hotel is in right next to the shopping & food paradise that is orchard road and is not very far away from main Singapore attractions like Marina bay and Singapore flyer; Reaching anywhere from the hotel will cost you around 6-7 SGD, which is very nominal. Excellent Rooms, clean and tidy pool, good gym and best of all the hospitality of people running this place. I mean, I have been in so many hotels and have never seen people going above n beyond to serve you. The best part about this hotel is Food. Breakfast, Drinks, Dinner, everything was just so good. Anyone having doubts about staying here, should just book the hotel and enjoy it.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A very happy "accidental" booking
desc: We had made a three day booking at another hotel in Orchard Road and then discovered that we would be arriving a day earlier than our original booking. Rather than extend our stay at the other hotel we decided to stay close by and as a result of this we ended up staying at the Quincy for one, very nice, night. We were greeted by Madeleine who checked us in and explained the all inclusive food and beverage. We stayed in an executive room which was spacious and beautifully appointed. The rooms was very quiet even though we faced the road. The pool is small but very attractive and the gym, steam room and sauna are excellent. We thoroughly enjoyed the evening drinks and food and found the selections very adequate. We sat outside in the lovely garden and this just added to the

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A great place to stay
desc: My sister and I were here to enjoy the sights and experiences of Singapore. We found it relatively easy to travel by train or bus from here. We used the handy phone to book tickets and get directions. It was quite useful. We enjoyed the facilities at this hotel immensely.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Loved it!!
desc: Other than the lack of variety for food, I loved everything about the hotel. From service to quality of the room, to how quiet it is even though it is located at the heart of orchard road. The bathroom was a good size too!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: The best hotel at the world!
desc: The hotel has left a pleasant impression of Singapore. Service, room, swimming pool, gym were amazing... We really enjoyed the dinners with cocktails... Laundry service (2 pieces per day). Good location and pleasant staff

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Really good
desc: We found everything about this hotel to be good. Staff were attentive and knowledgable. The pool was fabulous after a day out to refresh ourselves. Room and amenities were also good standard. Various food and drink offerings throughout the day were all included in the price, so no real need to leave the hotel. We recommend to stay here and happy to return to same hotel.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful staff, lots of extras
desc: Had a very 3-night pleasant stay at the Quincy. Staff were extremely helpful, friendly, and polite. Enjoyed the breakfast buffet (not huge but enough variety every day), happy hour, light snacks throughout the day, and the soft-serve machine (so welcome in Singapore's heat). We didn't partake in the movie screening evening but did enjoy the glass-bottom pool (in one area you can see right down to the ground). We loved the two-piece/day laundry service, and when we wanted to do more laundry ourselves, the desk arranged for us to use the machines at the sister hotel next door. Room itself was big enough and great to have the local mobile phone available. The freebies in the room were great - well stocked with drinks, water, and snacks replenished daily. The air-conditioner was a

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: 987marcg
desc: Had recent stay at Quincy with friends What a find great location for getting about and quiet at night.Hotel staff very friendly and always there to help.Breakfast choices very good with something for every one .Afternoon happy hour a very welcoming bonus with a selection of cakes and lite bites.Rooms very clean and mini bar stocked with couple of beers and soft drinks.Recommend getting Grab ap for booking transport go premium for a couple of extra dollars it was worth it .Well done Quincy you got it Wright.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: First time in Singapore.
desc: An amazing city and yhe Quincy a perfect place to stay for our few nights. Reception and staff made us feel as if nothing too much trouble. Room with a view and it was clean and tidy. Breakfast each morning perfect to start the day. We hope to return.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very good hotel, small but with services of a 5 star one
desc: Small hotel but with services and qualities of a 5 star. To highlight the friendliness of the staff and the cocktail they offer completely free of charge. Totally recommendable Muy buen hotel. Cerca de la animada zona de Orchard. El personal muy amable. Ofrecen un cocktail y la merienda de forma totalmente gratuita. La piscina en la planta 12 una maravilla. Muy recomendable

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: What A Gem!
desc: Our short stay in Singapore was greatly enhanced by our stay at the Quincy. What a great find and it’s all gratitude once again to the Trip Advisor review community for endorsing a less obvious choice, with so many positive reviews we felt confident in booking boutique rather than a chain name. And we were so glad we did...the hotel was classy, ultra modern and super clean. The staff are mega helpful and friendly, serving breakfast and a light supper, with coffee and cake available throughout the day. In the evening from 6 - 8.30 a good selection drinks are (very generously) served and amazingly this was all included in the price of of our stay. I’d return in a heartbeat!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Happy and enjoyed everything on offer at the hotel
desc: Room was great size and well presented. If we ever needed help with anything hotel staff were happy to help quickly and promptly. Food was great value for money, nothing over the top but just enough. 24hr reception which is always handy. Good in room inclusions with bottled water, soft drinks filled daily and small snacks. Would certainly stay here again if we visit Singapore in the future.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Beautiful
desc: Absolutely loved this boutique hotel. Rooms were lovely, very quiet and breakfast was included. Not much choice for vegans unfortunately but looked like other people had good choices. They had some cute items for sale in lobby area. 20 mins from airport and ferry-would definitely stay again

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Made my busienss trip a little easier.
desc: My short stay at The Quincy Hotel made my business trip a little bit easier. Location is excellent, rooms are well presented and comfortable Breakfast variety was good and the staf were all very friendly and helpful.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great amenities, design, service!
desc: 10 minute walk from Orchard MRT, 5 min walk from Paragon. You will never want to step out of the room unless you plan to shop or watch a midnight movie. Great for a romantic staycation with your significant other. Chill, hip and cool vibe from the outside in, and inside out. Worth the price for the weekend stay. Will recommend and be a return guest! :)

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Cosy Place
desc: My wife surprised me at this Quincy Hotel. Was a cosy place. Room was spacious enough with a bathtub. It includes free breakfast, tea break and even dinner! It is suitable for couple to relax here. On the weekend there’s movie at the pool too! This is one interesting thing that attracts people. You can watch movie in the pool.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Quincy was excellent value.
desc: The Quincy appeared to be excellent value from its internet reviews and more than lived up to the promise. The benefits offered were excellent. We were very happy with all aspects of the Quincy and recommend it to anyone visiting Singapore.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing hotel!
desc: Great hotel, super hospitality, lots of extra benefits included in price, such as: laundry service, free refreshments, taxi's bills refunds, voucher for airport lounge and etc. That is much more than you can expect from the hotel. Beside this: big, clean, comfortable rooms, great and helpful staff!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Hidden Gem
desc: A few mins from north orchard (near MRT) this place was fantastic with food/drink offer, spacious room, nespresso coffee pods, awesome staff. It's a hard place to fault! The mattress was our only dislike - given there's plenty of ways to exhaust yourself in Singapore it wasnt a big deal

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great venue with wonderfull staff
desc: The Quincy hotel was a last stop at the end of a long holiday. They accommodated an early smooth check in. The staff were lovely and very helpful and friendly throughout our stay. We were given a great welcome present of a world map with marking pins, bath soaps and a few other thoughful and surprising gifts. The mini bar was replenished free everyday and the snacks, drinks and food were also complimentary and of good quality. The hotel is not set up and clealy states the fact that they do not reccommend children under the age of 12 so that is also a bonus if you are looking for a child free hotel (no offence to the kids out there). The hotel is in a good location just a short walk back from Orchard Road and near a metro stop. It would be great if the pool was bigger and had a

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Stay
desc: We enjoyed the hotel, the happy hour was excellent and saved us money , staff were always friendly and helpful. We liked the fact that there were food services on site that provided a variety of options. Some days the variety was better than others. I liked that the happy hour alcohol was free and allowed us to have a nice glass of wine every day.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good service, good location, good value
desc: Great size room, lovely pool area to cool off in. It is just off Orchard Road, so close enough to carry shopping back but quiet enough to sit outside on the deck in the evening. The food is varied and good quality, with breakfast, light lunch and dinner options all included in the hotel rate which makes it very good value for money.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic stay at The Quincy!
desc: Our stay at the Quincy was absolutely wonderful! My niece and I were celebrating her college graduation and we stayed for three nights before we departed on a cruise. The staff are absolutely fantastic and extremely accommodating! The rooms are well appointed and the beds are very comfortable.The bathrooms are modern and the shower excellent. The buffet that they provide for breakfast, lunch and dinner including cocktails in the evening is great! Would absolutely stay here again!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Hospitality aplenty at The Quincy
desc: The Quincy Hotel is a funky little hotel in the heart of Singapore, perfectly located for access to Orchard Road, and only a short cab ride to everywhere else. The MRT was appparently quite close too, but we didn't use it. The best part is that everything is included, breakfast, lunch, dinner, and evening drinks. You also have access to tea and coffee all day and a mini bar that is replenished daily. They also wash two pieces of washing per room per day, which was very handy. The rooms are fine, clean, and have everything you need. The staff are wonderful. They were very helpful and efficient and the food and beverage guys Richard and Kushan looked after us and out little boy so well.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome place to stay in Singapore
desc: Nice place with great food options. Close to Orchard road and shopping arena's. Clean rooms and friendly staff. Staff was very helpful and helped in all possible ways to make my trip a memorable one. I would highly recommend this hotel as this is total value for money

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: What's not to like
desc: What a great hotel. Not only is it clean, modern, funky, quiet and comfortable but the service is also thoughtful and professional with a real personal touch. It's very close to orchard road and the mrt and buses. Taxis are easily accessible and cheap. Finally this place is inexpensive with so many extras. Full breakfast every morning Free cocktails and drinks at night Free light refreshments all day Honestly you could eat free all day Free laundry Free minibar I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone Love this place

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Even better the second time
desc: This was a second stay at this hotel (we previously stayed 2-3 years ago) and I can honestly say that we were very surprised at how they have improved (not that it wasn't already very good previously). During this visit, there were quite a lot of complimentary treats/perks the hotel provided during our stay (I suspect this was to all guests ... not just us!) that made our stay/visit to Singapore most enjoyable. We will be back!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very good and fair enough
desc: Excellent location 5 min walk to orchard road. Free aminities are add up up values like the handy mobile and luandry. House cleaning services needs more efforts. Variety of food for breakfast needs to be checked again. Overall fair enough place to stay to visit Singapore and visit all its attractions.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A brilliant hotel!
desc: The Quincy is an outstanding place to stay. It’s slightly off the beaten track away from the bustle of Orchard Road, about ten minutes’ walk from Orchard metro station, up a moderately steep hill. Despite this, it’s well worth the effort of getting there even on a sultry Singapore day. All members of staff are unfailingly happy, helpful and polite. Our room was spotlessly clean, of a good size, well insulated from noise and the beds were large and comfortable. Air con and retractable sun blinds were a useful feature too. One very pleasant surprise for us was the complimentary food (both sweet and savoury) and drink offered in the early evening. This was delicious and the servings generous. If we were staying in Singapore on another occasion we would definitely stay at the

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Boutique Hotel
desc: Lovely staff and beautiful rooms . Very spacious and very clean. The hotel had added offers which we fabulous such as laundry deals and light refreshments offered all day . Situated in a quite spot of Singapore but not far from shops.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good service
desc: Staff and service good. But breakfast and dinner should add more items. bed is very comfortable.location is in the center but have to walk around 5 min to reached the main rd. one more thing i like tis hotel is they give 2 hours lounge at Changi airport for free. so in sumarry is good . recommend to stay at this hotel.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect!!
desc: Every service was so excellent. I was more than satisfied with my stay. Even after checking out, you were very helpful. Lastly, thank you for celebrating my birthday. I was soooooooo happy! I'll come back again.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great staff, good concept
desc: Location wise this hotel is good, up a slight hill so elderly may struggle, rooms are of decent size and I did like the concept of the free mini bar, bed was a little hard but I've come to accept this as normal in Asia. Staff were good, first night though I went down for the included cocktails and food and never got my drink despite asking 3 different staff, sure it was 8.10pm and near the end of their happy 2.5hr service time but I felt this let the hotel down. Pool was nice but water was very chilly, even Singapore gets chilly at times especially when the rain rolls in, Overall a very good property and will be back next time in Singapore

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Location
desc: This hotel is in a great location and the staff are excellent. the service was excellent throughout my 7 day stay. This was curing my stay a full board package with all meals provided, the food was generally very good and dinner included alcoholic beverages, wine beer and cocktails..

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay
desc: Was on a business trip so had no time to try the amenities of the hotel. Will come back to enjoy the breakfast, cocktails and light dinner provided. Love the room! There was enough space to be comfortable and the appointments were very nice. Will definitely be a repeat customer.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing accommodation
desc: Everyone must try this accommodation cannot believe all the extras you get , we arrived on a late flight our bags got taken to our room and we went to dinner which was free also had my first Singapore Sling which was free also , happy hour everyday 6-830 .phone calls back home were taken care of , nothing was to much trouble cannot thank the Quincy enough for looking after us

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: An absolute gem!
desc: I won’t be staying anywhere else. This will be my home away from Home in Singapore. Little things like the proper fluffy bath mat and laundry service. All inclusive stay is perfect for work, minimised itemised expenses submission. Very attentive staff.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic stay
desc: Fantastic stay at the hotel. We were given free room upgrade upon checking in. Very value for money, Everything that you need was complimentary. Food was provided throughout the day so there’s no need for you to step out of the hotel. Room was clean and spacious. Will definitely come back for another stay.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Funky Functional Boutique Hotel
desc: No flounce but delivered with a bounce! The Quincy gets the functionality of your stay-over very well, ensuring you can have access to good purposeful design, making it uncomplicated in delivery eg restaurant is with an open kitchen, with a preset good menu laid on very well - and each bedroom has a great window seat. Bring my team here with me regularly.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Looking Forward To My September Visit
desc: What’s not to like about this quirky little oasis perched on Mount Elizabeth and an easy stretch to Orchard Rd shopping and MRT. This will be my 8th stay at the Quincy in 3 years and it won’t be the last. This hotel is a cut above any other hotel I have stayed for personalised service and professional staff who still have a sense of fun and are not the corporate robots employed in the larger 5 star chains. The value adds with free mini bar, handy phone, continuous food, free happy hour drinks and the laundry deal cements the deal for me. Great facilities including the pool gym and sauna coupled with modern well designed rooms you will find it difficult to find a better hotel deal in Singapore. See you guys soon....

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Escape winter
desc: This was our second stay here and would come back again. Attentive staff, great location and lots of extras like food, minibar and phone. Would highly recommend to anyone looking for a great place in Singapore

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect stay for business
desc: nice and clean rooms 24/24 opening time for the swimming pool very convenient, especially with you are jet lagged breakfast ,drinks and quick dinner included Ideally, the quality of juices could be improved for the breakfast

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Highly recommend!
desc: Stayed here for 2 nights last week and loved the hotel. The welcome was fantastic and thorough. I love that every guest gets a free minibar and free afternoon tea. Such a lovely touch Beautiful rooftop pool looking over Singapore although could have more sun loungers as they were only 3 and all occupied so had to sit in a chair instead of being able to lay down Rooms are fairly spacious for Singapore. A few too many mirrors for my liking. No matter where you are in the room you can always see yourself in at least 2 mirrors or shiny polished surfaces (including sat on the loo) Would definitely stay here again

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Overrated and disappointing
desc: We stayed for one night in a Studio Deluxe room. Prior to our stay, we had read many positive reviews about this hotel. However, our stay here was disapoktomt due to several factors, with the major one being the food served here. Firstly, the infinity pool is very small, measuring only 14 m by 5 m. The water is also EXTREMELY cold, and it's so ridiculous because this was supposed to be one of the highlights of our hotel stay. After a 10 minute swim, we couldn't endure the cold anymore and had to retreat to the warmth of our hotel room. To be fair, we did have fun at the pool as there were 2 big pool floats available, as shown in the second picture. A refrigerator of complimentary bottled mineral water and H20 isotonic drinks are also available for guests. Secondly, we went

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Everything included
desc: I stayed a the Quincy for 6 nights with a group I was escorting. First of all the location is fantastic Tucked up away from the hustle and bustle of Orchard Road, it was only a short walk to get there and to the MRT station and bus stops. The inclusions were amazing, 2 laundry pieces a day, breakfast, light refreshments all day ( including a self serve soft serve ice cream machine ), free drinks ( alcoholic ) from 6.30pm until 8.30pm every day, complimentary mini bar, we were all very impressed with all of these things. The pool is great and the gym, steam room and sauna were all clean and easy to use. The rooms were spacious ( I was in a room on my own though ) the beds and pillows were extremely comfortable, I slept so well. The shower was great and the bathroom amenities

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing experience
desc: My boyfriend and I had an amazing stay here at Quincy hotel. No regrets at all! The staff here.. Mohammad and hafiz are just wonderful.. always smiling and greeting us whenever they see us. Thank you Quincy for everything.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Friendly staff, good amentities
desc: Staff proactive n friendly. Surprised us with b'day cake n handmade card. Room overall very clean, but can be improved. All day snacks and drinks is good and convenient. Location is convenient (town area).

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect Quincy
desc: !00% perfect Recommend in every way. Excellent staff great position with wonderful amenities. I will be returning. Food was good exceptional service in the restaurant. Felt safe and secure with the card system to enter hotel and lifts.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Value for money
desc: The hotel is very near orchard road. With convenience store just one block away from the hotel. Right behind paragon so access to shopping is quite easy. The rooms are neat and clean. The best part is, there is free food and drinks all the time starting from breakfast to cocktails!!! Indeed a good value for your money!!! The staff are super nice and accomodating.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fabulous Stay
desc: I couldn't have asked for more from my stay. Staff were all very friendly and efficient, even remembering favourite beverages. With all inclusive breakfast, all day refreshments, light dinner, wi-fi, laundry, evening cocktails, limited in-room mini bar and complimentary phone calls the hotel is value for money. The location, five minutes from Orchard Road, its MRT Station and shops is excellent.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good value
desc: Stayed with a girlfriend at this quirky hotel. Great location and lots of extras such as complimentary laundry, drinks and minibar. Great art and friendly staff. Food was a bit cafeteria like and fairly ordinary for Singapore.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Best Stay
desc: One of the best hotels we have stayed in. Great location off Orchard Road, very friendly staff and was certainly value for money. The rooms were clean and well maintained. Have stayed here twice now and would certainly go back again.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: mag
desc: perfect service, friendly and very helpful staff, nice additions like coctails and snacks, good locations and convenient taxi system. Good thing is that hotel is relatively small so you feel comfortable there

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: The best Hotel in Singapore
desc: Couldn't ask for anything better. The rooms clean. Value for money absolutely the best. Service and friendlyness of all the staff. I cannot wait to go back next year but a must is to stay longer. The food was fresh and plentiful

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Sensational Hotel to stay at.
desc: The Quincy Hotel was amazing place to stay. This is the place to stay while you are in Singapore. Staff, Service, rooms, pool, breakfast, food, bar and the list goes on was Sensational. Cannot wait to come back.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Service
desc: Very good property and location. Very good amenities. Best: The staff;. complementary food. Complementary drinks in your room fridge; complimentary drinks at the two and a half hour Happy Hour each evening.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Everything is just right.
desc: I got room no. 1405. The room is well designed and practical. Just make sure that you check all features available in the room like sliding-door closet, hidden ironing board and electronic curtain to me sure you are well in your room. I booked the standard room and was entitled to all day refreshment as well as evening cocktail and light dinner (to me the light dinner may be considered as full dinner) The breakfast was great and everything in the mini bar is complimentary!!!! Will definitely return to this hotel again in the future.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: The Quincy Hotel Singapore
desc: Very happy with our 1st stay at Quincy. Free minibar and our kids are more excited with the breakfast, afternoon tea break and light dinner. Only the swimming pool is not really kids friendly. Staffs are friendly and added special touch for our wedding anniversary on our check-out.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful hotel in a great spot
desc: Loved our stay here! Trendy modern decor, well equipped rooms, friendly staff, nice pool area, fantastic location just 10 mins walk to Orchard Road mrt. Buffet breakfast included was fantastic, and the happy hour drinks and refreshments were amazing.. all included in your stay! Would stay here again in a heartbeat. The only thing I didn’t like was the bathroom had glass walls- zero privacy. Not a fan of that at all. Otherwise fabulous!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Quincy Hotel Singapore
desc: My wife and arrived at 1.30am for a four day stay and were greeted by the friendly staff. Check in was easy and the room was clean and well appointed. We were impressed with the complentary mini bar, with snacks and refreshments provided in the restaurant through the day, The Quincy is close to Orchard Road and subway. We both found the Quincy to be a relaxing and friendly place to stay.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Full board hotel
desc: I booked through their hotel site online when they’re having mid year sale. Room size is decent around 25m2. The decor is minimalist and efficient. My room feels a bit damp though, i dont know why. Breakfast, light lunch and dinner are included. Although not many of choices but it all taste good. Mini bar is free and replenish everyday. Daily laundry ( 2 pieces) is also free. Also they have a nice small gym and swimming pool. Strategic location near to Mt. Elizabeth hospital and Orchard road. Overall Quincy hotel provided everything that i need. Definitely will be back.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent staff and great facilities
desc: I stayed here few time in the past few months with my family. Their service is excellent and the staff is very helpful too. They have small dinner buffets as well (which is a strange concept to many hotels). This is not a big fancy dinner, but a small light dinner with few food items. However, after a busy day, this light dinner is excellent. Food tastes really good too. The Hotel room offers a many facilities as well. They provide standard items and some non standard items (e.g. smart phone to be used in Singapore) etc. The hotel rooms are very good in condition as well. The only negative thing about this hotel is the space. The hotel lacks space, however, considering all the good services they provide, lack of space is not a big issue.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A stylish, modern and young hotel with character.
desc: Stylish because of the unique architectural and chic interior design featuring bold red, white and black colour themes. Modern because at least the docking station works unlike other hotels. Character because they bothered to have an activity line-up and complimentary food provided to keep the guests occupied. (Note:the food selection is limited, okay I'm not complaining because its free food. Just so to manage expectations) Young because its newly opened. Its situated around Mt E Hospital and takes some time to walk down to orchard or to nearest food places and convenience stores etc.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Hotel and Location
desc: First time staying in this area. Very close to Orchard Rd and easy walk to Clarke and Robertson Quay areas. Brilliant set up with fee drinks 6 - 8.30pm, nice enough breakfast variety and daily light lunch, cakes etc for afternoon tea. Pool area and gym is OK, water temp was a bit cold in pool, refreshing after my daily 12 - 25km walks. Bedrooms were well appointed and generally a very clean place. Staff extremely friendly and informative. Will definitely stay there again. Richard in the bar and restaurant was great and very knowledgeable on recommending places to eat around Singapore

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A most excellent hotel.
desc: You cannot fault this place. From the staff to the complimentary food and drinks. We have stayed here three times now. Will definitely stay again. And again. The Staff are wonderful, the hotel clean, bright and modern.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Definitely would return
desc: Very enjoyable visit to The Quincy. It was well located but it’s greatest assets by far is it’s staff who go out of their way to be extra helpful. I booked when it was discounted and then joined their club with an additional discount. We enjoyed the free refreshment and particularly the evening drinks. We also used the free laundry of 2 pieces of clothing and the late check out.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location
desc: This hotel was recommended by our travel agent and so pleased it was! Only a short walk to Orchard Road and MRT station which we used to get around. Front of house staff were very good and very helpful. Hotel room spacious, good sized bathroom with shower and bath. Complimentary mini bar, breakfast, snacks during day, cocktails, plus early evening buffet made it a great choice, as Singapore can be expensive when eating out. Air conditioning was first class as it need to be in hot, and humid Singapore. Would highly recommend.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Location not good
desc: comfort room with free snacks and mini bar, but location was far from the orchard mrt station. walking distance was take about 20mins and you need to carry all your luggage walk along the road up to the hill

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing hotel
desc: After looking at many hotel in Singapore we chose the Quincy. We have been so pleased to made that choice! Everything is perfect. Location is 10mm walk to Orchard MRT. Room is great, clean,comfy bed. The light buffet from 6 to 8 is just perfect for a light lunch and menu is different every day. Laundry included for 2 pieces. So looking at all you get this is the perfect value for money place. And last but not least amazing staff. I will highly recommend!!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: It was a pleasure.
desc: I was having a good time staying in the Quincy hotel. The location was not near the Orchard Rd. but the service was really great. They give us free meals and complimentary. The view of swimming pool was great which was on the 12th floor. Thank you for everything.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: So good we didn't leave the hotel at all!
desc: The TV channels were a little blur. It was good that the hotel provided cots but the cot provided was not adjustable so we could not use it for our newborn baby as it is too low. We were not able to put her in and pick her up easily. Its a pity also that the cakes and kuehs for dinner were not refillable. It ran out pretty quickly and I waited for a quite thinking it would be refilled. Had I known earlier, I would've saved some first as they looked so good! Also, it'll be good to provide the movie screening by the pool information at the counter or at the poolside so we know what time it is and what movie will be screened. It would be so helpful if the information was accessible via their website/FB so guests like me can plan our stay (whether to stay in and watch or head

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay in the Quincy hotel
desc: These are my comments following my first time stay in Singapore:- Pre-mails before arrival, excellent (asked for upper floor room and transport from airport all completed) Check in at a late time, 12pm, was fast and efficient and staff were excellent Room had everything we wanted and was clean, free mini bar plus a great view, Staff through out our stay from the desk to the waiters were extremely helpful and courteous. Location was very good, not too far from metro and all the shops, and the area seemed very safe. Breakfast was excellent with good variation each day Bonus was the all day soft drinks and for a certain time every night canapés and cocktails Check out very efficient. This was our first time we have stayed in Singapore and I did extensive research on the

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice hotel BUT they are sneaky
desc: stayed here for 2 nights and everything is great there, BUT I had free late checkout and 2hrs airport lounge service from a promotion off their own website and twice they tried to deny me those benefits. Couldn't recommend this hotel as I just don't trust them

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Loved our stay 😊
desc: Really awesome service! Loved the stay, the service, the rooms, the facilities and best of all, the all day free refreshments! The food is really awesome too. The lounge and area around the hotel were really nice and cosy, and good got photos. Overall, would love to go back again :)

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay
desc: Our experience was overall really, really good. The service from the all the staff was excellent, the only negative thing was the air conditioner was a little noisy which kept us awake. The food was good, the room was clean.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great choice in singapore
desc: A great hotel in a great city. Only a short walk to the orchard road MRT station made it easy to get around town. The hotel itself is great - large comfy bed, great sized room and great amenities. The free cocktails and light dinner in the evening was wonderful, particularly when I arrived at 8pm after a delayed flight. Breakfast was a good spread with some variety from day to day. The pool was a wonderful place to cool off and relax.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Not impressed
desc: Not happy with this hotel considering the price. Definately not 41/2 star. Buffet breakfast had no variety. Very small pool. Bathroom and air conditioner had mould on it. Not told about any guest services like closest supermarket. Walk up hill not great either after a long day sight seeing having a small shuttle bus would have been good.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Surprising experience!
desc: My boyfriend and I stayed in this hotel for one night because our original hotel was overbooked. The Quincy hotel was amazing! They provided us with free breakfast, drinks for happy our, and dinner! Plus everything in the refrigerator was complimentary too! The pool, sauna, and steam room were an added bonus. They were located a short walk right behind pardagon mall and the main shopping area. The hotel staff were lovely.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent hotel with outstanding staff and service
desc: From arrival to departure the service from the staff was excellent. Nothing was an issue and they were more than happy to assist with any need. Breakfast was simple but adequate and the all day snacks a bonus as was the light evening meals with drinks included.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great value and friendly atmosphere.
desc: Quiet and relaxing rooms. Friendly and helpful staff. A lovely selection of cake and finger foods to nibble on during the day. Location is great and able to easily walk to the main shopping areas. Enjoyed our stay and would definitely stay again if visiting Singapore.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: The best all round accommodation in Singapore
desc: Engage with the staff and they in turn get to know you as well. The owners of this Hotel are very lucky indeed to have such quality staff. In any business or organisation staff are a firms greatest asset and indeed Quincy Hotel owners should be proud of theirs. Whilst i am a pensioner i shall start in two days time to start saving and stay at Quincy for a longer period (two weeks) next year. A big well done to Far East Hospitality from a grateful Aussie.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Stay at the Quincy
desc: A very good hotel with good facilities, service and location. The complimentary breakfast, lunch refreshment, dinner / cocktail and in room refreshments is a very nice touch that stands out from other hotels. I would definitely recommend the Quincy Hotel to others.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good experience
desc: A very pleasant stay, as usual. The hotel is conveniently located, within short walking distance to the heart of Singapore. The staff are always helpful. It would be great if an HDMI cable is available in the room for me to connect my laptop to the TV.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Choice
desc: We had two nights in Singapore on our way to Australia and after a bit of research decided on the Quincy. The location, was ideal for us - far enough off Orchard Road, to be away from all the bustle, but within a short walk of the MRT, When we arrived in the evening, after a long flight, we were pointed to the cocktails and snacks available, which did the job. The food and drinks on offer, from the free mini bar to the breakfast to the all day snacks far exceeded our expectations.Service was friendly, relaxed and efficient throughout. The complimentary laundry service was another unexpected bonus. The pool is quite small but its 12th floor location was great and my 4am swim was an ideal way to tackle the jet lag! The only downside for us was that we were only there for two

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Place !
desc: Can only recommend to stay here while you are in Singapore :-) This is a great place to visit the nearby Orchard Road Shopping Mall's and Restaurants or take a Taxi to any location to Singapore in max. 30-45min drive.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: nice place to stay
desc: enjoy the quiet, comfortable room and pool., and freely available allday and evening snacks and coffee downstairs in dining area,anytime, gratis. this service really makes the difference. This hotel doesn't cater to the rowdy bus/tour group crowd so individual service is promt and kindly given

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful Stay!!
desc: really loved the service by quincy staff. prior to us checking in to the hotel, staff actually emailed to check in and shared of possible bday room deco for my husband. on the day of stay, staff prepared a cake for my husband while we were having din and took a polaroid for us. thank you for the attentive service!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent hotell, Incredible staff and service
desc: We stayed here end of August/beginning of September 2018. We were in Singapore due to my wife having knee surgery and stayed at the hotel for the week after surgery. This is a nice and clean hotel making for a comfortable stay, what really stands out is the staff. They were very friendly, always with a smile and with a great sense of service making us feel very welcome. Everybody went out of their way to make sure we were comfortable. Great value for money, loved the snacks and cocktails as well as the free minibar. The Quincy Hotel - You are doing an amazing job! We will definitely recommend you to our friends and we will stay with you again. Christine and Anders

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: LOVED THE QUINCY!
desc: Stayed here for a 3 night stopover with some friends and absolutely loved this property. The service was excellent in every area of the hotel, the staff really go out of their way to ensure you have everything you need. The beds were very comfortable, aircon worked well, and the bathroom had all the necessities. Great shower pressure, always a plus if you ask me! The breakfast was always fresh and we found there to be plenty of offerings to suit all tastes. We enjoyed our evening cocktails and snacks... there was genuinely plenty to eat and we found ourselves not even needing dinner. Everything was delicious and the hot dishes were always topped up regularly and remained hot. Not to mention soft serve icecream machine whereby you can help yourself any time of day (how can you

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Coffee is available for free for 24 hours!
desc: I stayed there in August for three days. Upon my arrival, I was greeted with a smile. The hotel is relatively small, and it was very easy to get around in the hotel. The explanation of the check out regulation was very clear. And all of the staff was very helpful. The room rate includes a small breakfast buffet. I like the fact that coffee was available all the time. So coming from NYC, I had to look for Starbucks Coffee before I get back to the hotel to make sure I have enough coffee for the day. I liked the fact that any two items are free to send to the laundry. It saved my time and $$. The only con about this hotel is that the hotel is located at the top of the hill. And it will take about ten minutes to walk to get to the nearest MRT. Therefore, if you are not

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location , close to Orchard Road
desc: We stayed for 3 nights . Rooms were available immediately . Hotel offers complimentary mini bar . Also restaurant has snacks and appetizers throughout the day . Offers a complimentary light dinner with wine/beer.Complimentary use of cell phone and was offered a late check out at 6pm . We did not need this as we checked out early as we had a morning flight . Staff were friendly and gave us tips on what to see and do. Had a great time in Singapore . The gardens on the bay is amazing and the chili crab at the hawkers centre by the bay is really mouth watering. The hotel is very convenient and getting around is easy

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Experience
desc: Very pleased with the stay in terms of value, quality etc. Staff service is excellent and in the nutshell, impressed by the whole experience that Far East Hospitality provided. Would recommend to friends and business partners.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A little gem
desc: I stayed in The Quincy Hotel for 6 nights and thought the whole concept of the hotel was amazing. Travelling alone, I was impressed with how friendly all the staff were - nothing was too much trouble be it needing directions, ordering a taxi or having a quick refill of the lovely cocktails. The location is amazing, being tucked away from the hustle and bustle of Orchard Road but only a 5 min walk away, it feels like you are reaching a little safe haven when you get back. I especially liked being able to get clothes cleaned - something that you really appreciate after being out in the humid heat - which meant I could pack lighter - always a great thing. I would say that the only thing that was a very minor negative is being able to locate the safe and iron - it is in

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
