title: BEST-IN-SINGAPORE!!
desc: Just completed a x7 night stay at The Quincy - and I cannot stop telling others about the experience. With jaw-dropping hotel room prices in the great city of Singapore, The Quincy does everything right - starting with the price point. Taking into account everything that is included with the price of the room, you cannot beat The Quincy. Free mini-bar, food and beverages nearly all day, a hot breakfast buffet, free wifi, free mobile phone, x2 pieces of laundry — all of this plus a perfect room and a professional staff. Now, of course, the earlier you commit to your room/reservation, the cheaper the cost.....so, book early!!! ROOMS: I was solo - so I had plenty of room in a King Studio. I was on the 13th floor - and the view was incredible. Everything in

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice stay
desc: Very friendly and helpful staffs. Comfortable but small room for what was stated as ‘Studio’ when booked online. Nice breakfast. Far from Orchard MRT. Wasted much time trying to find the hotel. Minibar is complimentary.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Superb location!
desc: This hotel is located in just 10 mins walking distance from orchard road which is the shopping destination of Singapore. The rooms are big and very well maintained. Room service is prompt. Breakfast buffet spread is limited and has less vegetarian options, it’s good for people who eat non veg. Bit on the expensive side but overall worth the price !!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Loved it
desc: Wonderful hotel and lovely rooms. Amazing that there is so much food and drinks included in the price. Very Central location which makes it easy to get around Singapore. Good service and super friendly staff.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Will stay again!
desc: This hotel has the best of everything. This is our second stay and we'll be back! Nothing to fault, everything to love. Highly recommend! So many extras at such great value, you can't go wrong. Enjoy!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Enjoyed my stay
desc: The Quincy is different from the choices of hotels in Singapore. It has a very friendly staff, good location, wonderful selection of food and drink. Not much to want for here. Just a very well run hotel. I enjoyed it very much.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Hotel
desc: Best hotel I have ever stayed in. Room was great, special free add ons excellent, great location within walking distance of Orchard Rd, service was prompt and willing. Meals were great. Cannot speak highly enough of this hotel.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: I Love This Place
desc: This was my fourth visit to the Quincy but my first for a personal trip with the family. I have never written a review after previous visits which is pretty poor of me but I absolutely love this hotel. The staff are incredibly welcoming and nothing is too much trouble. The rooms are modern, clean and very chic. The food and drink system promotes a friendly club like atmosphere and can save a lot of money in a City which can be expensive. There isn’t masses of choice from a dinner perspective but then the hotel doesn’t promote dinner on this basis. The location is very good and the hotel is 10 minutes walk from Orchard Road and the local MRT. Some reviews I have read point to the need for some kind of shuttle bus but really....it is 10 minutes walk!! We travelled with a 13

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: nice room except for the noisy aircon, good location near Orchard Road...
desc: This hotel gives out lots of "freebies" - so if you like mostly western style food and free drinks, you will like this hotel. Our corner room was very pleasant and comfortable, and the bath was a nice surprise. Staff we met were friendly and welcoming. Easy walk to Orchard Road, if you don't mind walking uphill to get back to the hotel. We also used the complementary handyphone each day. Overall, there are other hotels in this price range in Singapore, but the extra perks make this hotel worth it. I personally prefer to eat local Singaporean food, and there are plenty of options from the numerous shopping malls on Orchard Road. The only negative: a noisy air conditioner in the room.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: one of the best hotels we have stayed in
desc: We just wanted to thank the team at the quincy for the fantastic stay. everyone that works there does a great job at making you feel welcome, and the guys in the restaurant were amazing. the facilities are excellent and the location is a short walk to the underground and the main shopping street. Overall a fantastic place and we are already looking at flights so we can come back and stay again

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Within expectations boutique hotel
desc: Had a staycation after reading all the good reviews on TA The hotel is situated in Orchard, good location but its hidden up a hill. Recommend to cab or drive, cuz walking can be tiring Quincy has a unique strategy of allowing everyone to use all their facilities - akin like a club lounge privilege like some hotels have. But instead of being exclusive, everyone can enjoy it. Pros and con of it as it lose its exclusivity and q uality, explain more below Room - the . Like thall food in the mini bar is complimentary and there are drinks, beer too, some tidbits and coffee. Theres a smart phone for foreigners too. I like how theres a ledge near the window to sit and enjoy the view. Anyway, i find the room is more for couples as the toilet door cant be locked and the wall is a window.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Small in size, big on sevice
desc: My first visit to this "boutique" hotel where everybody gets to be treated equally. Unlike most hotels where one has to pay a premium to qualify for the services on their club lounge floor, over here in Quincy, you pay one rate and all the extras are included i.e laundy, day long refreshments, breakfast, evening cocktails a full mini bar to boot. Because it is a smaller hotel, you are known by name and warmly greeted when you enter the lobby. When told that I was under the weather, a fruit platter was sent up to my room together with a get well card and when I went downstairs later on that day, another team member enquired about my health. A very nice touch. How many hotels can boast of this unless you are a guest staying in one of their expensive suites!! Location wise, The

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Exceptional Hotel
desc: Honestly one of the best service experiences we've encountered anywhere in the world. Excellent free laundry facility / excellent complimentary breakfast / snacks/ light dinner each day. The food was incredible and so fresh. Free alcohol at 6pm each day - this is very expensive elsewhere so was greatly appreciated (loved the singapore slings and good wine). Fab rooms, fab pool - can't rate it enough. Location spot on. Saving the best for last - the service and staff as faultless. They go above and beyond and this made our trip. Thanks all, we loved staying with you.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: The best value for money hotel in Singapore
desc: We were a party of four two adults two children. We had two rooms and stayed for a week. The rooms were large comfortable and clean, the hotel has quirky modern design and is well appointed to make the most of Singapore. The pool and gym are open 24 hours which is great. The inclusion of laundry, mini bar and drinks and light refreshments from 6 to 8:30 pm makes one or probably the best value for money hotels in Singapore. The buffet breakfast had a wide range of items on offer with the choice of eggs and pancakes cooked to order.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel, super extras!!
desc: The Quincy is a great little hotel! The staff are simply lovely and the ‘extras’ are surprising and very very good value for money. While the hotel description says Breakfast included with ‘light bites’ during the day, this is almost 99% ‘full board’. The food offerings all through the day are very generous and appetising and you really do not need to eat outside the hotel at all. The evening session includes alcohol beverages ! The ‘extras’ aside, everything else about the hotel is also a big extra, two pieces of free laundry per day (delivered in express time), the linen in the rooms are amazingly clean and fresh, beautifully white, the pillows are some of the most comfortable ever. The minibar in the room is replenished daily with a choice of drinks and snacks. Water and

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Outstanding Property
desc: A fantastic property only a short walk from Orchard Road. The staff at the hotel are outstanding. A huge thank you to the restaurant staff for there exceptional service.We stayed at the property for 1 week and were impressed by the variety of food and especially the free alcoholic drinks available from 6pm until 8.30pm.The rooms were of a high standard with all the amenities required for a comfortable stay. Nice touches like a phone with international calls to certain countries and 2 pieces of free laundry per day. We will be back

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A good choice to make
desc: Well located a short walk from Orchard Road, this hotel is straightforward in its approach and offer. The rooms are all modern, spotlessly clean, with all the amenities you would expect. Service is friendly and efficient. But what stands out is what is provided throughout the day for food and beverage. Breakfast is a full buffet. What is different, though - and completely free of charge - is there are two coffee machines for topping up throughout the day; tea, biscuits and cakes are served at tea time; and then, between 6pm and 8.30pm, there are free cocktails combined by a good, if limited number of hot food plates. And it all works. The hotel was fully occupied and there was a very real sense of guests enjoying their stay. The price? Great value for Singapore.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Couldn’t recommend the hotel more!!
desc: Wow. The Quincy is definitely one of my favourite hotels I’ve stayed in- and that list includes many 5 stars around the world! The value for money is just brilliant! It’s expensive if on a ‘travelling budget’ but compared to many in Singapore it’s a brilliant price. Breakfast included, snacks all day, a dinner spread with alcohol for free every night- which seemed to have no limit! I’m a wine lover and very fussy and their red was lovely! Italian! The loveliest, friendliest most helpful staff! Rooms are immaculate- everything you need, literally! Lovely bath, hot shower, comfy bed, robes and slippers, a phone to take out with you for maps WiFi and calls! They even have two pillows with a guide to which one suites your sleeping positions best! The rooms are lovely and the staff

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing hotel, super helpful staff
desc: We had an amazing 3 nights at the Quincy recently..the rooms are very well set up with many great features such including in room iPhone to book attractions at a discount, free calling, free internet and more...in too. Nespresso machine..great pool with e celebs views on the 12th floor ...breakfast, refreshments, dinner, and minibar all included in your nightly fee...plus two items cleaned free and returned to you same day each day. Conveniently located to Orchard Road. We highly recommend this hotel for its helpful staff. They couldn’t do enough for us 👍❤️😎

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great place for a stopover
desc: From the early check-in to the late checkout, we were absolutely delighted with the staff, amenities, room, surroundings, location and the food and drinks. The complimentary drinks and nibbles at 6pm was a highlight, particularly their Long Island Iced Tea. I would highly recommend the hotel.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: High standard and service
desc: A great experience and exceptional hotel. The amenities are of high standard and service 5 star. The included food & drink package was exceptional in presentation, quality and quantity. Close to Orchard road and public transport for easy sight seeing of attractions.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great place to stay
desc: Always stay at the Quincy when I come to Singapore (stayed here the last three years). Friendly staff, great location and having the mini bar and snacks included is a great touch. The location is also walking distance to Orchard Road right near Paragon shops and Lucky Plaza.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic Quincy
desc: Our four day stay at the Quincy was terrific. I would highly recommend this boutique hotel. Staff were friendly and nothing was too much trouble. Buffet breakfast, and food throughout the day was included, as was evening drinks and light dinner options. It was our wedding anniversary while staying there and we were presented with celebratory cake. The hotel is located just behind Orchard road and close to the MRT also. I would definitely stay here again when visiting this beautiful country.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice hotel at great location
desc: Location is very good, at the heart of shopping district. Staffs were excellent and try to accommodate your request. Very efficient check in and check out experience. Room was very good with all amenities. Breakfast spread can be better.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome hotel!
desc: Great hotel! Awesome rooms which were clean and the bathroom was AMAZING! Everything seems to be complimentary, even the mini bar. Perfect location, only a 5min walk to main Orchard Road area and less than 10mins to the MRT station. The staff were extremely helpful. Will definitely use this place again and will be recommending to all my friends. Thank you Quincy!!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: AWESOME HOTEL
desc: This was an awesome hotel. The location was really close to Orchard Rd. Stay 2 or more days and you get many perks. The staff were very helpful and friendly I will defiantly be staying there whenever I am in Singapore

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Value All Inclusive Quincy!!!
desc: A great value hotel with everything you need at your fingertips! We were very happy with our stay at The Quincy. Before we even checked in, we received a very welcoming email from Frieda with some useful information regarding our stay. The hotel met all of our needs and we loved all the inclusions such as the daily breakfast, free mini bar, light refreshments as well as dinner and evening drinks. We felt there was enough food variety to satisfy our hunger cravings. Some examples of food on offer: Breakfast - fresh fruit, yoghurts, pastries, bacon, sausages, scrambled eggs, juices Dinner - fried rice, a pasta dish of some sort, fish/chicken dish, soft drinks, beer, wine, cocktails Mini Bar - chips, softdrinks, iced tea, beer Our stay also included 2 pieces of laundry per day

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Interesting good value hotel
desc: Interesting and good value stay. Short walk to Orchard Road and Orchard MRT station. Staff were fantastic. Breakfast, snacks and light dinner were great and so comfortable if you just wanted to stay at home after a day out. Hotel itself is in a pleasant and quiet area. The pool is small but refreshingly cool in the morning - go early to avoid family groups. Mini bar is free and replenished daily - includes beer and mineral water. Free laundry for two items a day. I will certainly stay here again.Interesting and good value stay. Short walk to Orchard Road and Orchard MRT station. Staff were fantastic. Breakfast, snacks and light dinner were great and so comfortable if you just wanted to stay at home after a day out. Hotel itself is in a pleasant and quiet area. The pool is

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Exceptional Service
desc: Can not recommend a hotel as much as this, we are impressed from the time we arrive to the time we leave. We love the friendliness of the staff, the cleanliness of the facilities and the overall experience.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Singapore stay 2018
desc: We stayed at the Quincy hotel for 3 nights in August. The staff were brilliant, couldn’t do enough for you. The mini bar and extras in the room were free. We even had 2 garments cleaned free each day. We were booked in for bed and breakfast yet we were also offered cocktails and snacks free. The rooms were roomy and clean. The location is ideal just off orchard road so was handy for tube stations and shopping. We also walked from there to the Botanical gardens and only took about 15 mins. Great hotel, great stay.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Exceptional
desc: Stayed at The Quincy for 4 nights on business. Super friendly hotel in a great location close to Orchard Road. Room was very comfortable and bed was great. Lots of variety at breakfast. The hotel provides a lot of things for free which you would get charged for elsewhere-even more reason to stay. The team were all really friendly and eager to help and deserve the rave reviews they are getting. Hard to find fault with anything and would recommend wholeheartedly.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic location and great hotel
desc: This was one of the best hotels that we have ever stayed in. We spent 10 days there. It was very clean, comfortable and really good value with 5 star service. The included free extras like breakfast, afternoon snacks, good coffee and alcohol with a light meal at night. It was walking distance from the MRT, Orchard Road and the Newton Hawker centre. We would highly recommend it.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: excellent stay
desc: Had a wonderful stay here. Staff lovely, helpful and efficient. Location was excellent. Complimentary drinks and food each evening was a great touch and food perfectly adequate. Singapore sling was great. Pool area was good and water temp very refreshing

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing stay.
desc: My husband and I stayed here for 6 nights recently. After reading past reviews I was a little hesitant after seeing the complaints about having to walk up “the hill” as my husband had back surgery not long ago. Ignore the negatives about “the hill”!! It’s just a slight incline and is no trouble. The staff are amazing and so are all the inclusions. Room was clean as was everything else. Breakfast was great. The selection was just enough and we found all food to be tasty and well seasoned. We seriously could not find a fault with this hotel. The location is great, walking distance to Orchard rd malls, easy access to taxi’s or grab cabs which we used often.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: The Quincy Hotel
desc: Very friendly staff who went the extra mile. They even delivered a birthday cake and photos of the occassion. Very clean and standards are good. The walk up hill at the end of a day is the only negative thing in the heat and humidity, however it ensures you burn off the calories. otherwise very good hotel.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A lovely "boutique" hotel
desc: I went to Singapore on business in September and my wife accompanied me. This is why we looked for a hotel that wasn't the typical "chain hotel" where you don't really know in which city you are because they all look the same. So based on the good reviews from this website, we stumbled across the Quincy and we really loved it. Before arriving, the hotel kept us already informed of our coming stay, with personal messages. When we arrived it was very nice to talk to anybody there, they all seem very friendly and are happy to chat to you. And they are all keen to help you if you have questions. Check-in was efficient and the room was great. It all looked pretty new. The breakfast has got a decent spread of dishes, it's not as large as you would find in some of the bigger chain

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Visiting Singapore has always been a dream
desc: We stayed at this little gem of a hotel for 5 nights and loved everything about it. The location is great away from the hustle and bustle, staff were fabulous and always very helpful, the extras you get staying here is an added bonus. We didn’t utilise the food and drinks that were offered as we spent most of our time exploring the city but my husband did use the laundry offer. Staff even made us a card and gave us some chocolates for our wedding anniversary which was so lovely and personalised. We wouldn’t hesitate staying in this hotel again when we return to Singapore. A real gem in the middle of a massive and beautiful city.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Small hotel with great touch!
desc: We have been spending ca. 10 days in September 2018 at this hotel, while visiting our friends in Singapore and visiting Singapore itself. This is a small hotel on Mount Elizabeth; it is very close to Orchard Road, its stores and public transportation connections (ca. 10 minutes walking on the hill). We enjoyed our stay a lot. Service was great; room was super comfortable, with an extremely simple yet super functional set-up. Food is provided throughout the day at the Quincy: breakfast in the morning; refreshments, snacks, soft drinks and ice-cream throughout the day; cocktails, wine & beer with some small bites in the night - all is complimentary; this applies also to the mini-bar in your room. On a couple of nights we were quite tired because of our intense sightseeing and we

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A terrific hotel
desc: This hotel is so nice and the all inclusive package is great. Staff were really friendly. The room was really clean and very comfortable. Happy hour was really good and the food was ample. There was a self serve ice cream machine too. Close to Orchard Road. Would definitely recommend this hotel.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: The Best in Singapore
desc: I loved The Quincy! Quality exclusive boutique concept and a truly five-star service. Amazing spacious room, really modern, with espresso machine and even a handy phone with a local SIM, so convenient! I was impressed with quality of the food. Breakfast was delicious, plenty of choice and good coffee. There were also snacks at the lounge available all day and a 'light' dinner which was delicious and plentiful! Make sure to go to the 12th floor pool for the amazing panorama.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location, loved the food and drinks!
desc: We stayed in September and were very happy with our stay. Firstly the location is good, quiet but a short walk from Orchard Road - although it is a little uphill on the way home which can be a struggle! Room was clean and spacious, only slight criticism was the water in the shower often took some time to get warm. Rooftop pool was lovely, both for swimming and relaxing. The food and drinks on offer in the lobby were great! We ate breakfast every day and often had a coffee and delicious cake in the afternoon after returning to the hotel from exploring. We didn't have dinner but would often have a drink and some snacks before heading out. Sometimes the food at breakfast was a little cold, it would be good if the food was cooked more regularly or the food was monitored to check the

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: One of the greatest hotel in Singapore's premium area, Orchard Road
desc: The Check-in process was really smooth. I love the front desk team, they teamed up well. One of them was processing my check-in, another one was preparing the welcome drink. The room is pretty spacious and designed with contemporary chic interior. The view of the hidden parts of Orchard Road intrigued me to enjoy it with a cup of coffee from the Nespresso machine. In Room Mini bar also provided and free! They will refill it in the next day for you! The partial swimming pool is a winner! I can enjoy the city view while floating myself with the provided crops for Instagram by the Hotel. Good move from the hotel for Milenial travellers!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Best Hotel Ever
desc: We will come back again. We are enjoy stay at Quincy, with all the inclusive meals, cocktails, mini bar, laundry, and of course the very welcoming young staff. Location is just 15 minute walk from paragon mall. room is big & clean with bath up. Thank you Quincy. You are the best.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Stay
desc: We stayed here for the last leg of our Singapore trip and the little quirks you get here are so convenient if you want to take your time. The breakfast buffet included made it easy to eat something quick and filling and while the choices weren't big, they were actually quite tasty! The welcome drink offered to us when we got to the hotel was a life savior as we were sweating like bullets upon arrival. We didn't take advantage of the light refreshments that were offered daily in the lobby since we spent the day out but the free mini bar was quite nice to snack on if you were feeling a bit peckish later on in the night. The hotel was a10min walk to Orchard Road where all the shops were which was easy to reach to though if you have trouble walking, getting back to the hotel

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good for relax
desc: Staffs are friendly. Room are big and clean. Foods and beverage not with too much option but good enough for basic needs. Deserts are good! Fantastic for a Leisure or Business trips! Highly recommend for adults.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Singapore Sweethearts
desc: Fantastic staff and hotel! Thank you so much!!! We loved it!!! We so appreciate your efforts to make sure we had the best holiday!!! Great location, great club facilities, pool, rooms and price. There was. Nothing the reception staff couldn’t do for us five girls!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good service but did not meet expectations
desc: We spent three nights here and selected the hotel based on the excellent TP reviews and the fact that we were able to get a heavily discounted rate through Amoma. The " pros" have been stated by other reviewers : good location, quiet ( no package tours), decent facilities and of course the " all inclusives". In reality, unless you are spending a large part of your time in the hotel, you are not going to take advantage of the " all inclusives". We found that, other than the evening cocktails, we ate out all the time ( since Singapore is famous for its food scene) and used our "free" minibar once, ditto the laundry service. The pool is tiny, the sauna takes forever to heat up and the breakfast and other buffets served the usual mediocre, unappetising stuff one finds in all hotel

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful! Best hotel ever!
desc: Second stay at Quincy and I loved it even more the second time. This is where I will stay each time I am in Singapore! Great variety of food each morning and evening! Rooms are great, free minibar, the pool at 12th floor is amazing! Did not try the gym or sauna but hope to try them next time!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Such Great Value for Money!!!
desc: Hotel was fantastic, Staff were super friendly and helpful, hotel was in a great location. There were so many great inclusions like the mini bar, evening cocktails, food, laundry service a phone with maps and so on it was crazy how much was included that other hotels would charge extra for. I would highly recommended this hotel to anyone.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Best hotel in heart of City
desc: One of the best hotel I have ever stayed in my business travel, I think this is the best hotel if you are looking to stay in heart of Singapore. very supportive staff and never heard no for anything requested. Thanks to sales manager Mr. Daniel for the extended support.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel and service
desc: I’ve lived in Singapore for forty years and have been to many of the five star hotels like the Sands which feels like stepping into Hrand Central Station. My special needs Son has been warded at Mount Eluzabwth hospital , so I checked into the Wuincy to be close by , I’ve heard so much positive things from friends staying there. This is truly a lovely place to stay in and within walking distance to Orchard road the main shopping center. The entrance and dining area is beautiful and delightfully modern. The room I stayed in is modern, clean and beautiful , rate included breakfast . Dry good value for the very reasonable price. The stag in the dining area and front desk are friendly and very helpful. Would highly recommend theQuincy to visitors coming to Singapor, Hreat place to

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing hotel - beautiful!
desc: I'm sad to have to leave the Quincy Hotel after a five night vacation stay. The hotel is beautiful, the rooms are comfortable, and the staff make this such a welcoming place. Hariz especially went out of his way to take care of me - each day, he anticipated my needs and made sure they were addressed. Thank you to Hariz and the rest of the staff for making this a 5* ++ experience! The rooms are well appointed - comfortable beds and the best pillows I've ever experienced. I need to get some at home! I stayed in a deluxe room, and it was very good. The Nespresso machine was a nice touch, though I made more use of the coffee machine in the lobby. The breakfast buffet was excellent: good quality baked goods and freshly prepared bacon, eggs, potatoes, and a few other dishes each

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Quincy Hotel - exceptional
desc: Stayed here for the 2018 Singapore Grand Prix, exceptional hotel and staff. Looking to come back in 2019. The food and drink was lovely and all included. Rooms are clean and quiet. Staff are very helpful and friendly. I would highly recommend this hotel.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good
desc: It is in a very good location. I think it is reasonable.All the staff are friendly and warm. Free dinner and minibar are very helpful. It is also a special mention that the shuttle to the hotel is free.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Value plus
desc: Currently staying at the Quincy and it’s a very nice hotel. Location is close to Orchard Rd shops and MRT ( train station) staff are friendly and helpful and the inclusions of all day snacks and drinks in the evening are a bonus. It’s in a quiet location but only 5 minute walk to Orchard Rd. Would definitely come back .

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hospitality and location
desc: Had a wonderful experience at the Quincy Hotel. Staff were very attentive and went out of their way to ensure that we were well looked after. Room was vey comfortable and clean. Free mini bar and plenty of free food and drinks in the evening and throughout the afternoon.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: The staff make all the difference
desc: I stayed at the Quincy recently during a stopover. The hotel is well located, an easy walk to Orchard Rd for lunch and some upmarket window shopping in the cool of the air con. Conveniently, breakfast and dinner were supplied at the hotel and the mini bar was stocked regularly. Happily, swimming pool provided the opportunity to stretch out after a long flight. The room was comfortable and quiet which was exactly what I needed. After taking a taxi to the hotel I became a victim of credit card fraud. The Quincy staff were terrific: helping me contact the credit card company, the local cab company and another hotel which discovered my card held as security was not longer approved. I can't speak highly enough of the care they provided. Excellent service from lovely people.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Quincy mount e
desc: 1. ur room now is quiet old2. but ur service with free mini bar and snacks is very good3. at nite around 10 u dont serve drink and wine or others.. its better i u can serve itOverall i love stay in quicy, i have stay there 2 times.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Quincy staff are their greatest asset.
desc: The Quincy is a great property, it is just a tad far from the MRT as well as being up a hill. It's a tough walk in the heat. The hotel staff are very helpful and accommodating of any request. Great value for money with drinks at happy hour and afternoon tea also complimentary.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel
desc: We stayed for 3 nights earlier this month and it was fab. We arrived earlier than check in time and lucky for us our room was ready which was perfect after our long flight from the uk, meant we could rest and freshen up without wasting too much of the day. Room was spotless and spacious. Free Minibar was a nice touch, along with the snack, cocktail hour and light dinner included in the price, such great value for money and everything was good quality. The infinity pool is lovely and so convenient it being open 24hrs! Short 5 min walk onto orchard road and 10mins yo the mrt station, really great location and all the extras really make this a great choice. Would highly recommend.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: VALUE FOR MONEY
desc: The QUINCY Stay was AMAZING for 4 main reasons: 1. GREAT and friendly STUFF. 2. good LOCATION. 3. Spacious room 4.Value for money (FREE COCKTAILS, snacks and dinner)I highly reccommend this hotel to all

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Wow, Wow, Wow
desc: From check in to check out this hotel was a real joy. We arrived early in the morning from our cruise and were greeted with a welcome drink and were informed that our room was ready. Included in the room was a well stocked mini bar ( beer, soft drinks, crisps, nuts and water), nespresso coffee maker and a kettle with instant coffee and tea. The room was very spacious with huge bathroom with a separate shower and bath. There is also a mobile phone with 4G to use while your out and about. Food was all included, breakfast, lunch, afternoon cakes and evening meal. Cocktails were served from 6-8.30 every evening, they had 3 to choose from along with beer and wine. The waiter kept coming round and 5 minutes before they were due to close he went round every table taking orders! They

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Thank you
desc: Had a wonderful stay at your hotel with my daughter thank you for your hospitality would highly recommend you thank you and hope to see you again sometime . We were especially impressed with your cocktail hour and your supply the free food throughout the day it was very much appreciated and very nice thank you

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Best Hotel Ever!
desc: This hotel has a great business model, with all the inclusive meals, cocktails, mini bar, laundry, and of course the very welcoming young staff. The room (11th floor) had good views and good amenities such as gym and pool. Just a brief walk to Orchard Rd with all its shops and public transport.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: 100% satisfied
desc: My wife and I spent 6 nights at The Quincy in early September. From the moment we checked-in till the moment we checked-out the staff went out of their way to make our stay enjoyable. I requested a room as high as possible and that was delivered, the view from the 14th floor was excellent. The inclusions were brilliant, complimentary food and drink, a complimentary minibar and complimentary use of a Handy Phone. A special mention must go to Kit Yin, who kept the drinks flowing during the 6 pm to 8:30 pm happy hours. The location of the hotel is ideal, close to Orchard Road for easy access to shopping but far enough away so that, when you've had your fill of retail therapy, you can escape the Scotts and Orchard crush quickly and easily. I highly recommend The Quincy to anyone

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great staff , beds & location
desc: Beautiful little boutique hotel 2 min walk to Paragon shopping centre and Orchard Rd. Food was better quality than the 5 star Eastin Grand, Bangkok we had just come from ( in the Executive Lounge). Everything was lovely . Only negative is lack of power point in the bathroom for a hairdryer. Only shaving power point?? And lack of power point thats easily accessible near the mirror in the room.. cord too short to reach from bedside so I just gave up. Love the arty style. No affiliation with Quincy Villas, Lombok where I have previously stayed.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A hidden gem
desc: This hotel was a great find and I would definitely recommend it to others for both quality and price. Staff in reception and dining area were very helpful and polite. The rooms were nicely appointed and very quiet which is nice in a busy city.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent hotel for stay over in Singapore
desc: Can’t recommend this hotel strongly enough for short stay experience (2days) room clean and food excellent with good touch “club” room facilities complimentary. Location is perfect just a few minutes from MRT and Orchard Rd shopping.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic friendly hotel
desc: Stayed two nights for stopover. Really nice place small but quiet pool and excellent extras including free food, drinks and minibar. Sauna and steam room a disappointment, but pool great fun and gym looked really well equipped. Couple of suggestions for management: disappointed that laundry was not clear at 2 items per room rather than per person. Could make that clearer on the terms/at check in. And whilst we filled in food preferences we did not feel we are directly catered for with a vegan diet. There were things to eat at breakfast and evening snacks (soya milk provided when we asked) but we were not given much choice or offered vegan options. However these are minor things and our stay was excellent and great value.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Room Maintenance & Food and Beverage Questionable
desc: Stayed at the hotel with a family member and was able to see that the issues I had in my room were also in their room, the rooms are in a definite need of updating and maintenance needs to take a room offline to ensure that they can completely re-paint the rooms and perform a proper siliconing in the bathroom (it looked like a five year old had undertaken this task). Housekeeping also need to pay attention to the signs about hanging up your towels to re-use, I did this and on every occasion they were replaced with new towels which was not very environmentally friendly. The corridors also appeared to be something out of a horror movie, lighting was definitely inadequate and more lights need to be placed in them. Food & Beverage at the hotel was something that I would consider

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Best hotel experience
desc: Fantastic service across all departments. The lunch snacks and light dinner is generous and very good. Room is very comfortable and clean. Hotel is 5-10min walk to Orchard Road and all the shops. Highly recommended.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Just a week in Singapore.
desc: This hotel was awesome 😎 they offer all day snacks n coffee n tea was fantastic. The hotel is on queen street. Up on the hill dead end street beautiful and quiet situated under big green trees. So peaceful. The rooms are huge but they have everything and are modern n clean. Bed was very comfortable. The swimming pool was great can swim and look over the street n shops in orchid road Highly recommend it everyone. The staff were very friendly and very helpful. A+++

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Couples Holiday
desc: We had a fabulous 8 night stay at the Quincy. From check in to check out the service from all staff was excellent. The included food and drinks were wonderful and much appreciated. We used the included laundry service of two pieces everyday. It was invaluable. Next time we would choose the larger room size so we had a lounge chair as there is not a lounge area in the hotel so we found we were sitting in the dining room to relax. Also, the Quincy is a bit further from an MRT station than is ideal although this is only a problem when it rains. Unfortunately, it rained a lot during our stay. We would definitely stay at the Quincy again.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: "Staff are amazing"
desc: Fantastic four star hotel, room was clean, coffee, snacks all the added extras that make your stay more enjoyable. Lovely pool area that is 24hours. Staff on reception were so helpful, and thank you for the card for our anniversary and all the other little touches. We love Singapore and when we come back we will definetly stay in your lovely hotel again

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Aircon
desc: Got sick because of aircon, it was too cold and can not lower it. Location is good and close to Orchard road. Noise cancellation is not good as neighbor room close the door and make horrible noise. Staffs efficiency is ok.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice packaged stay in heart of Singapore
desc: The hotel is about 10-minute walk to Orchard (or half that, if you cut through York Hotel) and while the premises can use an update, everything about our stay was top notch. The staff is extremely friendly and helpful from the smooth check in/check out, the gentleman at breakfast to the lady at happy hour. The rooms are the right size, the rooftop pool is small but can provide a refreshing reprieve, and the gym is an excellent amenity to work off all the food and snacks the hotel provides for free. Oh, the mobile phone albeit bad service at times was very handy for discounts on attractions. My only complaint is that of the many little black moths/bugs in the bathrooms. But I definitely would come back again.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Recent five day stay at Quincy Hotel, Singapore.
desc: Excellent service from the front desk through to housekeeping staff. An excellent room that looked out onto the city (able to get some terrific photos). Amenities were very clean and well suited to our needs. Our room was more than big enough, well laid out, and the bed very comfortable. Complimentary food was always nicely cook and presented. Suitable ranges of food for everyone, and the complimentary drinks were an added surprise. The only thing that we could perhaps suggest a change for, was the cost of the laundry. Perhaps a set amount for a bag of laundry per person, or have a couple of self service laundries within the hotel. However, this is just a suggestion and not a complaint, as everything else far outweighed this. And it was nicer to take home a case full

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: E xcellent stay
desc: The outstanding aspect of our Four day stay was the quality consideration and service of all the hotel operatives. It was really exceptional and matched the comfort, convenience and style of the facilities and amenities. An unqualified recommendation.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: The Quincy - An excellent place to stay
desc: Excellent location close to Orchard Road.All staff very friendly, helpful and accommodating.The all inclusive buffet breakfast, light lunch and light dinner/ cocktails were excellent giving a good choice of food. Especially the Tiger beer helped me to relax and enjoy my time into the evening.Given the chance I would definitely stay with you again in the future.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Extremely helpful staff
desc: While in Singapore our family required some printing to be done - unfortunately our booked hotel had no operating business centre. We tried the Marriott @Tang Plaza Singapore. Despite us not actually staying there, the hotel staff were exceptionally helpful. The Concierge Rolando went above and beyond. He was so helpful and friendly - he printed the pages required himself. While Rolando was printing, we had an impromptu act of kindness from the Bellman Latif who gave each of the kids lovely presents. We weren’t even guests at the hotel, yet we were treated with so much kindness - I can imagine how good it would be if one was actually a guest there ! The atmosphere in the lobby was beautiful! The next time we’re in Singapore we will definitely be booking at this hotel. Very

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: We totally enjoyed our stay at teh Quincy!!
desc: Sooo happy I found the Quincy Hotel in Singapore. The staff is so helpful and we enjoyed the location - just a couple of blocks from Orchard. The rooms are very modern and updated with all the tech stuff you need. We very much enjoyed having breakfast, snacks all day and happy hour with dinner all included!! Happy hour is from 6pm - 8pm and includes a terrific buffet plus unlimited wine, beer and cocktails! Everything in the mini bar is included!! What a deal! I would definitely stay there again!!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great service and hotel in Singapore.
desc: Had a great stay at the Quincy. Experienced great service and friendly staff from the moment we arrived. Lots of great benefits and extras to make the stay feel very special. Would definitely stay here again.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great way to end our overseas holiday
desc: The hotel, staff and offerings of free nibbles, cocktails ,wine and beer , in the evenings topped off our last leg. Staff were so attentive, facilities were excellent and so close to key places. The receptionists and wait staff were quick to assist us with directions and weather updates. Never have we stayed in a hotel where mini bar was free. To top it off a Handy Smart phone that we could take with us around Singapore with free wireless and local calls , a fantastic idea and very helpful to travellers , thank you Quincy staff for thinking of everything.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Disappointing birthday staycation
desc: We encountered problems with the tv as it went blank suddenly while we were watching an interesting movie at around 1.30am.We called for assistance but there was no response. We then decide to smoke at the basement and while on our way out, we informed the counter staff of the issue. The counter staff at that point of time mentioned that they will inform their 'engineer' of the issue.While on our way up, the counter staff told us that the 'engineer' will be on the way up but to our surprise when we came back to the room the 'engineer' was already inside. I honestly don’t think is inappropriate and i was certainly wasn't satisfied that the 'engineer' was already in the room i booked with his working boots on trying to change the tv channel. We left the room with the 'do not

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A home away from home
desc: The Quincy is a magnificent Hotel. Nothing is too much trouble for the friendly staff. One said they endeavoured to make it seem like home and they definitely achieved that. The food offerings are the highlight. Breakfast was excellent but it is the so-called snacks throughout the day that blow you away. Toasted sandwiches plus salad and snacks for lunch, two beautiful gateaux for afternoon tea and a limited, but perfectly adequate range of options for tea with free alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks. The amounts were generous and the staff plied you with offers of food and drink. Much, much more than I would consider "snacks". We will definitely be staying at The Quincy again. The Staff are unbelievably helpful, professional and friendly.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Does it get any better than this?
desc: It starts when you walk in the door, happy, smiling, friendly staff, efficient and courteous. They just can not do enough for you. Unfortunately, our toilet blocked, so we reported it at breakfast. How long does it take to eat breakfast? Well, when we went back to our room the problem had been solved!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfortable and good location
desc: Only stayed 1 night at Quincy. It is very comfortable, clean and in a good location near large shopping centres on Orchard Road - short walk. Staff were friendly and helpful. Breakfast spread was certainly adequate but not lavish. Complimentary mini bar snacks were handy. Several hours after our checkout we were able to use the pool shower facilities to freshen up prior to international flight - this was a great bonus for us.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing Stay 💕
desc: I am amazed with the staff the efficiency, hospitality,kindness,the effortless way they went to help,bed was a little hard so staff put a topper on immediately.I also have difficulty walking, staff would come almost running to help. The way the carried out the normal way of looking after you was simply amazing there is no other words to describe this gorgeous little hide away. I had a birthday whilst there surprised me with a warm felt happy birthday. I would love to say more, simply the best experience I have ever had Thank you so much for this wonderful experience love you all. We will be back missing you guys already 💕

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent
desc: My husband and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay and have recommended the Quincey to friends & family. We did look forward to the drinks in the evening while enjoying the the company of other visitors. Great service, location & value! Thank you 😁

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: LUV Quincy
desc: Our preferred hotel found on google some years ago and visit and stay when ever we pass via Singa - luv the amenities especially the included benefits - highly recommend - to us our regular hotel and close to Orchard Road

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good Stay with Unexpected Benefits
desc: We selected the Quincy because it made an offer that seemed to good to be true. They provided complimentary minibar, light lunch & dinner with drinks. This was an offer too good to not try. Delightfully surprisingly it was true & on top of this the room & hotel was very good stay too. Location was another plus as it was just around the corner from Orchard Road. On my next trip to Singapore I will certainly be staying at the Quincy.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: The Quincy-Outstanding!
desc: A group of five adults our stay at the Quincy was fabulous. Located just a 5 minute stroll to Orchard Road and a 10 minutes from the train. The staff greeted us warmly every time they saw us. Buffet breakfast was included each morning and consisted of fruits, juice, yoghurt, toast, bread rolls, cheeses and cold cuts of meet as well as the usual bacon, eggs and other hot dishes. The coffee was great (a must for me) and available from 6:45 am. During the day snacks were available for the guests (no extra charge) with lovely cakes, biscuits and endless soft serve ice cream for the sweet tooth. Happy hour was pretty special as well, after 6pm. Once booked in you were able to have two items laundered each day (excluding days of arrival and departure). The pool is located on the 12th

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Quincy Review
desc: good service but value for money is lacking. The buffet offered is very basic and room is very small. Did not get the time to visit the pool or gym. location is very good as its walking distance from orchard street where all the shopping plaza's are. Worthwhile only if you get the price 40-50% off.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Impeccable service
desc: Boutique styled hotel in a great location with some excellent inclusions and a terrific staff who all provide an impeccable service. This is a hotel that epitomises what "hospitality" means. Would recommend this hotel to all ages and combinations at the price we paid

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: HOTEL NEEDS UPDATING
desc: The staff in all departments were excellent. The bed was great, but the rooms lacked an appropriate standard of maintenance. The location was good and close to Orchard Road. The food was monotonous - the same day after day, with no variety. Hotel is dated and needs updating.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great packaged service
desc: We were very pleasantly surprised by this hotel. Our taxi initially found it difficult to find in the dark as it isn’t one of the most well known so make sure to have the address and phone number if catching a cab from the airport as they don’t all use GPS. The staff were all lovely and very helpful. We booked a package deal which had breakfast, light daytime refreshments and light dinner included plus complimentary minbar and two items of laundry included each day. It was excellent and we rarely ate elsewhere unless we wanted to. The size of the rooms for the price also really impressed us compared to what we’ve previously experienced. The hotel never felt busy or noisy and we just loved the lobby decor. Good gym and pool plus the rooms had a bath. Fairly close to the train

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: great hotel with excellent staff and services
desc: stayed a total of 4 nights and wish we had booked longer one of the best hotels we have stayed from check in to check out could not fault wonderful friendly and very helpful staff we will be back thank you

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Friendly and efficient.
desc: Stayed for one night on the 5 October and had a great stay. I arrived at about 930 am to drop my bags off but was greeted by a friendly team who said my room was ready! Rooms were nice and large and the free in room bar and snacks was a nice touch. I didn’t realize the snacks were also free so after I’d eaten a bag of crisps that evening had expected to be paying but again was nicely surprised. :-) especially nice when you come in late from work drinks and have the munchies. Breakfast was your bulk standard hotel fare but when breakfast, lunch and dinner are ALL included you can’t expect too much. Bottom line it’s a great value hotel. Location is amazing and a short walk to Paragon Mall - which is a nice place to shop. I also used the gym and although totally

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great staff and food
desc: Stayed here on the way to New Zealand and on the way back. The front desk staff and restaurant staff were excellent. The food was was also very good. Have been to Singapore before but would choose to stay here again next time in Singapore. Would recommend highly.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Highly Recommended
desc: We recently spent 6 nights at the Quincy Hotel for our Wedding Anniversary. It was conveniently located in a quiet area near Orchard Road. The staff were fantastic and went out of their way to ensure we had a memorable stay. Our room was great and there was plenty of food and beverages on offer throughout the day. It is a boutique hotel and you get an experience that you would not get at other hotels.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Value and Location
desc: Great if you are looking for value, location and friendly staff! The Quincy was a 10-15 min walk to the subway station and the craziness of Orchard Road and as such was a quiet, restful place after a day out. Staff were friendly and helpful. Great value for Singapore-free breakfast, snacks and drinks/food, mini-bar, a smartphone to use during your stay and laundry were added extras that would make me for sure stay here again. Rooms were comfortable, large and quiet. Large windows, tub and rainshower. I appreciated the blackout curtains and housekeeping that left the room sparkling and always restocked. Free laundry service returned everything on time as stated by hotel. Food options were diverse and included ripe fruit, cheese, crackers and delicious pastries. Hot items were not

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellence all round !
desc: Hubby & I arrived at Quincy late in the evening, just 10mins before the meal station was to close. The Check-in staff said to go have our dinner first and he'd have our room key ready for us after our meal (Great initiative!!) And what a lovely surprise awaited us! The service staff brought us beer and wine and complimentary too! What a great welcome , after our haphazard meal on the incoming flight from HKG and we didn't need to stumble down to Orchard Rd in the dark to eat. Breakfast, lunch and again dinner were complimentary throughout our stay. Staff were superb! hospitable, genuinely friendly and helpful! A great business strategy for Quincy-given their "just a little" off the main Orchard Road location -to offer these complimentary gestures so that guests didn't feel

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Don't hesitate, Book it now!
desc: Outstanding experience, well beyond expectations. From the warm welcoming drink to the free 2 piece per night laundry service to the complimentary cocktails and light dinner, this list truly goes on and on. Anyone booking will not be disappointed and many other hotels should take note of how to run an establishment

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel in a good location
desc: Stayed for 2 nights after a cruise. Check in was quick & easy. Staff very friendly and accommodating. One of our rooms was upgraded which was nice. The ‘inclusive’ concept is good. Breakfast included hot & cold options, fruit etc. Plenty to get you started for the day. We were not around during the day to sample any of the offerings. Evening time included beer, wine & cocktails. As we were only there 2 nights we made the most of the included food and beer before heading out on one evening. Loved having a smart phone for use while sightseeing. All staff were fantastic. Really enjoyed our stay.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A great stay!
desc: Spent two nights here and it certainly measured up to the raving reviews it receives on TA for good reason.....it deserves them. We stayed 2 nights in room 1109 and was quite pleased. It offered nice views and was spacious and nicely appointed with quality linens and towels. In fact, our entire stay here from check in to check out was just wonderful. The employees here seem to be a notch above most employees in both competence and politeness that we have experienced in our travels. Can't single any one out, they ALL were superb. We found the included breakfast here to be far above average as well. Not only your expected items, but a grill for fresh eggs and pancakes too. The only fault we found, if pressed to give one, would be the distance between the hotel and the

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great service
desc: A really good city hotel with excellent staff and great service. The staff all go out of their way to look after your every need, it was really helpful to be able to check in early and leave our bags and shower at the end of the day on our day of departure as we had a late flight home. Good range of all inclusive refreshments. Nice pool with good views.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Best hotel staff I have ever exprienced
desc: All the staff were exceptionally helpfull whether they be in the restaurant, on reception or porters. They could not do enough to look after you. We had a medical emergency during the stay that was handled professionally and sympathetically.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic service
desc: We arrived early at hotel and asked to leave heavy bags until check in time. The brilliant reception staff said room was ready so why not move in, no charge. Decided to have a drink before going to room. No charge. Light buffet at lunchtime. No charge. Cocktail in venting before going out. No charge. Crisps and beers in room, use of mobile phone, no charge. Dinner in evening, no charge. All this done with the most fun service from all the staff, absolutely brilliant. Finally we were leaving late on book out day, could we leave our bags whilst we toured the city, you bet and, we’ll you know what comes next. When we came back to collect luggage the reception suggest a refreshing shower but we opted for a last drink to enjoy the atmosphere one last time. When we came to pay for

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful Boutique hotel in quiet location close to Orchard Rd retail precinct.
desc: We arrived late evening to be greeted warmly, offered cool drink, and exeprienced a very smooth, fast check in. Our room was spotless, very comfortable with great furniture and furnishing. Ammenities were above expectation! Quiet location enables a quiet, restful environment. We couldn’t believe that the hotel was all inclusive with regards to the mini bar, breakfast, all day snacks and beverages. Add to that two items of clothing laundered and delivered same day for no charge. Staff were very polite, and nothing was too difficult to manage. We will definitely recommend to family and friends, and we will be back to stay at The Quincy hotel to spend a little more time exploring Singapore. Best value hotel with truly fantastic customer service.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: What a Gem.
desc: Perfect situation, Mount Elizabeth Road, just off Orchard Street. Great for the MRT and exploring. Small hotel with very welcoming staff. Complimentary two item laundry daily, all day snacks and free flow cocktail hour, wait staff were superb and very attentive - Singapore Slings a speciality! Definitely recommend The Quincy without a doubt. Not luxury but very acceptable and good value for money. We shall be back!.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: You're missing out if you haven't stayed here
desc: This is my first review of any hotel as I was just too impressed not to write one Everyone at the hotel was fantastic From the staff, waiters and cleaners and the location!Offering free minibar everyday, 2 pieces of laundry and all day food and refreshments They say it is a light dinner etc. BUT it is a buffet. So it's great if you need to save money. Everyone was welcoming and I would highly recommened this to anyoneThis hotel will be somewhere I will stay for all my trips in the future.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good stay
desc: Everything was good other than because we landed in the morning there were no standard rooms available so we had to pay for a larger room to save waiting round after a 13 hour flight / 18 hour trip. Other than that was great stay

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Modern hotel in an affluent area
desc: The Quincy hotel is in Orchard close to the upscale mall. It is close to many Michelin Star restaurants as well. The hotel is very modern, has a great breakfast, yummy ice cream all day and a great light dinner. The gym is on the 12th floor over looking the area. The pool is cool as it looks over the city as well. There are snacks in the room, but they only serve room service until 10pm so make sure to eat before you get back. We went on a tour at 6pm and didn’t get back until 11. We were starved, but couldn’t get food from the hotel and there are not many late night options close. Our stay was very nice at Quincy and we would stay there again.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Short stay in Singapore
desc: A very good relatively small hotel in Singapore. Everything about our short stay was very good, including our stay in The Quincy Hotel;. The room and general hotel service was very good, and the food was excellent, being a a good mix of various cuisines. We were also able to use the hotel facilities during the last day of our stay as were were leaving Singapore on an 11.30 pm flight to the UK

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fabulous
desc: We just finished spending a week in Singapore at the Quincy hotel. What a terrific experience! The hotel is very close to the best shopping on Orchard Road and close to the metro. The staff was very knowledgeable about all the attractions to visit in Singapore. They were eager to point them out on our map and give us directions. The hotel advertised snacks all day. However it was really three included gourmet meals each day. You have daily access to the minibar without a charge and you could get an ice cream at anytime of the day. The swimming pool on the 12th floor was a great way to cool off each day after experiencing Singapore’s heat. We have already recommended this hotel to friends who have booked it for their vacation . I highly recommend the Quincy.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good hotel near orchard
desc: Nice Botique hotel on mount Elizabeth road near orchard road in singapore. Rooms and bathrooms are relatively small but nicely designed. The hotel has a small gym and swimming pool on the 12th floor which is useful for business travellers. The restaurant is mediocre. Overall will Recommed for budget stay in singapore..

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Holiday
desc: The Quincy hotel is within a short walk to Orchard Road. The staff are extremely helpful and make you feel very welcome. The rooms are a good size, very clean and very quiet, The breakfast has plenty of variety and the early evening light refreshments also have plenty of variety. We will definitely stay here again

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful staff and great location
desc: I never been to a hotel that is feel like home.we checked in with given welcome drink and friendly staff. Muhammad checked us in. We are family of 3 and with two infant. We book studio at very last minute,thank you sophia yu who manage to fit us in. Muhammad upgraded us to deluxe that is really nice of him. Zai served us with the welcome drink make my family calm down with my two active infant while i settling the check in. When we checked in the room, i can't inflate my kids float for them to go to swimming. I called front desk again to help me, 5 mins later hafiz and joey from hskp came up to my room and bring a pump to help me inflate my floats.the swimming pool have beautiful view of city at 12th floor. Swimming pool is 1.2m kids below of that,must be supervise by adult.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: great value!
desc: great value, location, cleanness... free food through the day, comfortable beds, walking distance to orchard. fast check in, super friendly staff. absolutely to be recommended. stayed in many singapure hotels, but this is the best value

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent
desc: What a fantastic hotel. The room was spacious with a very comfortable bed. Bathroom and shower well stocked with good products too. The food and drinks were plentiful and to a high standard. A superb location. Shopping for anything is 5 minutes away by walking. The metro is a 15 minutes walk. Lastly the staff are so friendly and helpful. I will definitely return to this hotel. Singapore is a must visit place. So clean and polite. Very little crime and litter free, even on the metro, where people also talk very quietly even if they are on their mobile. A good example to the world. Thank you.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful stay
desc: We thoroughly enjoyed our time at the Quincy Hotel. They were extremely accommodating of our children, especially at meal times. We found the included food and drinks a wonderful bonus. The hotel was clean, the staff friendly and the amenities great. Although it's not right next to an MRT station, we liked the fact that we were a bit out of the hustle and bustle. Although the rooms are not huge, they have everything you need for a comfortable stay. We found the portable phone with wifi particularly useful and we used the discount ticket prices for a few attractions which was an added bonus. Would highly recommend and definitely stay again

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A hidden gem of a hotel close to Orchard Road
desc: Considering how expensive Singapore can be, the Quincy hotel is fantastic value for money.Just a ten minute walk from the main Orchard Road it perfectly placed. Close to MRT and easy for taxisQuincy hotel manages to include, free breakfast, free mini bar, free dinner and best of all, free alcoholic drinks with dinner. If you've ever bought alcohol in Singapore yoully know that's a huge bonus.I will definitely be staying here again and again

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfortable Stay away from home
desc: With early check-in allowed, free mini bar, breakfast, refreshments in evening and clean comfortable rooms, Quincy located close to Orchard Road has all that you want when you are away from home. Polite and helpful staff is always available to assist you.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Another great stay at the Quincy
desc: We always stay at the Quincy Hotel when stopping over in Singapore. It ticks so many boxes, that after we found it a few years ago we have never stayed anywhere else in Singapore. The really responsive reservations team always answer all your questions quickly. The options of an early check-in or late check-out if staying during the week is incredibly useful as our arrival flights are mostly very early morning. On this last trip got to the Quincy at 07h30 and they were able to give us the room straight away. "Normal" early check-in time is 10h00. The rooms are starting to show their age just a little bit, but are still clean, comfortable and spacious, with all the amenities you need. Great to have the free mini-bar, and also the use of the free mobile phone during your stay

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel, great value for money
desc: The Quincy is a great hotel and lives to its standards. The hotel is modern, stylish and clean - everything you'd expect from a 4* hotel. The staff are super friendly and welcoming. The complementary food and drinks are a huge added bonus. I would certainly stay again.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Funky hotel right next to Orchard Road.
desc: A well travelled friend of mine recommended the Quincy. We arrived early evening after a seriously delayed Qantas flight from Melbourne. The team at the front desk were disarmingly friendly, I mean really friendly. The check in process was smooth and in moments we were headed up in the elevator to our room. The building is quite old, but has had a makeover and when we arrived in our room we were most pleased. Lots of attention to detail, comfortable with all the trimmings. There is a complimentary happy hour downstairs in their groovy bar. My wife had a fairly crappy Long Island Tea, cordial not fresh lime... I had a red wine that was OK. The food on offer was not exactly haute cuisine, but hell, what do you get for nothing. That notwithstanding I have booked the Quincy again in

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: The Best
desc: Just amazing........the inclusions in the Hotel are unbelievable......continue to do the same....friends we met said the same,Every person we met at the din8ng room were in awe of your inclusions in the offer....Breakfast,Lunch ,Dinner,free cocktails,free minibar....unbelievable...thank you...we will be back.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Super!
desc: What a find. Boutique style hotel with central location. Modern rooms and outstanding service from all of the staff. Food is reasonable and was included in the price as were the endless cocktails, cakes and ice cream. The finishing touch was the gift of luggage tags, chocolate and hand written note from the Quincy team! You made our stay outstanding.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Worth it for the price paid
desc: Booked a staycation to celebrate my hub's birthday. Pros: - Friendly and helpful staff - Good spread of food throughout the day. The chicken wings served during cocktail hours is comparable to ikea's - It was peak hours so they prob forgot to prepare the cake they promised. But they made it up by giving us a box of chocolates (even though I did not bring this up) Cons: - I'm a light sleeper so the noise from the aircon kept me up the whole night.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Lovely hotel !
desc: We stayed at the Quincy for 8 days and thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Nothing was too much trouble for the staff and the hotel is well located being within walking distance of Orchard Road. Delicious light meals & snacks are included in the room rate as are 2 pieces of washing per room per day. We would definitely stay at the Quincy Hotel again.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Pleasant, helpful staff
desc: Our modern room was adequate rather than stunning but the staff and the free food and drink at this hotel made it a very good choice. We really appreciated great coffee at breakfast and late afternoon on our final day when we also enjoyed a lovely free evening meal of pepper chicken, rice, vegetable samosas and delicious berry crumble cake. Given the humidity and the need for fairly frequent changes of clothes we also really appreciated being able to have 2 items washed and beautifully pressed for free on a same-day service.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Value for money - Central
desc: close to shops , MRT and still in quiet area. Nice and trendy. Free all day coffee . Great club facilities ( refreshments, and eats). Staff are always friendly . $15.00 grab ride to the roof top bars around the bays .

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellence in Singapore
desc: I highly recommend your stay at this boutique hotel where the decor is fun and quirky classy. The swimming pool is spectacular and open 24/7 as is the gym. I thoroughly enjoyed the restaurant/club where the cocktail making definitely puts a grin on your face. The food is different every day and delicious. The staff are so friendly and helpful I cannot fault this place at all. So central to everything in a safe city where shopping seems to endlessly stay open.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fabulous start to our epic trip
desc: We are on an extended holiday to Singapore then on to Australia and New Zealand and we were fortunate that this was our first stop. The hotel is ideally placed for the main shopping area of Orchard Avenue and transportation options to reach all parts of the city. It is a very comfortable hotel and the staff are incredibly attentive without being overpowering and extremely courteous. We were also lucky enough to discover that our B&B booking also included lunch and evening meal and free bar if we wanted them. Overall an excellent start to our trip and this hotel is highly recommended.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good location, but not what was expected
desc: The location is nice, but the hotel is average. The rooms are small and breakfast is average. However, when we arrived (an hour after check-in is open) we were asked to wait as the room wasn't quite ready. After 15mins I asked how much longer it would be, to be told they were rushing it and it'd be another 30mins. That's not a rush. We also had our baby asleep in my wife's arms in the lobby, you'd think they'd know that we just wanted to put her on the bed and priortise it. It's a good location, decent hotel, but I think you can better for a similar price.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: 2 night stop-over betwix N.Z. and London
desc: Slightly out of town location with no views other than other sky scrapers. No balconies or outside area except pool on 12th floor which was open to the elements on two sides. (A spa pool would have been a welcomed extra) and nice seated and illuminated area surrounded by water features outside Dining Room / Lobby. Great value as Mini Bar, Afternoon Tea, Evening Cocktails and Canapes were all complimentry - no need to spend any money within Hotel. Staff were efficcient and friendly. Taxis very cheap to get to famous Landmarks and Activities. Would recommend for short stay.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Your Hotel Search Is Over
desc: Let's not beat around the bush, Singapore is expensive and the hotels are certainly no exception. That being said there is always value for money if you look hard enough and this hotel is as far as you need to look. With breakfast, all day snacks and a full buffet meal with unlimited (trust me, they're not stingy) cocktails, wine and beer in the evening , all of sudden the price you pay for a room seems a bargain. Add to that a location just off Orchard Road, very comfortable modern rooms, a great pool, efficent friendly staff and you have the full package. Look no further.
