hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful experience
desc: A great staying in this cosy and chic hotel, extremely well located and connected with the main means of transportation. The complimentary minibar, food and beverages offered during the day were outstanding and definitely a unique valuable trait of this hotel among many, many others. Thank you very much for your professional and kind hospitality!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Singapore
desc: We were staying for 3 nights in the hotel, as a first part of a trip. Position is very good, quiet neighborhood close to Orchard Road and MRT station. Room was nice, on the 6th floor, very clean, everything fully functional. Breakfast not impressive, however good enough. We appreciate the snacks during the day. We like that we can use the swimming pool late in the evening (opened 24/7, like the gym). Services very good, receptionists give us the info that we needed.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great views and great rooms
desc: My husband and I recently stayed here as part of a wider trip that also included Hong Kong and Khao Lak in Thailand. This was our second stop on our trip and we were delighted with the hotel. The room was very nice and, although not very big, it was adequate with a huge picture window with great views over Singapore; these could also be enjoyed from the bath through the one way glass looking through the room. The location is excellent; walking distance to Orchard Road and the excellent public transport system and the attractions beyond. The staff were fabulous; so friendly and helpful. The breakfast was very good too as were the all day snacks and evening drinks from 6pm, although we were barely in to take advantage of this. I would definitely recommend this hotel if staying in

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Singapore Delight
desc: The Quincy is a great place to stay. Nothing is too much trouble for the staff. Hotel and grounds are very relaxing. Would certainly recommend this hotel. A great base to explore Singapore from. Would certainly stay here again.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome
desc: It was a repeated visit as we had a great experience during our first. It did not disappoint this time. Awesome location just a couple of minutes walk from the buzz of orchard yet quiet for a relaxing staycation. We will certainly be back again.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Only good things about this place :)
desc: Quincy is one of the best hotels I experienced.It’s a gem in Singapore that I am sure it can exceed even the poshiest ones around. They are modest with their description as the complimentary offerings are beyond „light“. Also, the food selection, the free minibar, the room with a bathub, the 24h pool&gym, the friendly staff make this place remarkable. :)

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Hard to beat
desc: I found the hotel on line and chose it because of location and the included breakfast. . Once I checked in I was informed of the lunch and dinner hours that were also included. We had just gotten off a cruise boat for two week and all three meals were included. I told my wife it felt like we were still on the boat.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice cute small rectangle hotel.
desc: I stayed in this cute hotel for 2 nights. Reception are friendly and helpful. They offer small cup of welcome drink, I went to my assigned room and inspected the room. Nice room with great view. I then went to 12th storey for afternoon swim. Nice rectangle shaped swimming pool. (to some people who complained that swmming pool is too small, show appreciation to designer of this cute hotel for fitting in swimming pool , with gym into this rectangle buidling. Many hotel of this size don't even have swimming pool, some got circular swimming pools - suitable only for kids playing on water.) I had great swim there, from one end to other end, diving to admire the view of Orchard Road, under water.) Afternoon tea time- go to 1st storey lobby side for coffee, cake and assorted

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: MANY NEW STAFF!
desc: Many new staff that I have not seen before -even asked me if I had stayed before !(been coming there two/three times per year since it opened) -new toiletries are great (last ones not so good -maybe earlier ones Moulton Brown better?) -food is great (when it opened first was terrible!) -still love the terrace/garden outside -stayed 1409 young man who looked after my room was just great -sorry did not catch his name Andxxxx? -but really attentive -great guy -(one of these people always there when you need him) reception as usual (all new people??) great -really is my Home in Singapore -arrived a day late as busy with business -made the mistake as staying a day later not book in advance so stayed somewhere else-a disaster! -but highly recommend The Quincy -just a really nice

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Strategic Location - 3 minutes walk to Orchard Road
desc: Very convenient for shoppers as Orchard Road is just 3-5 minutes walk away.Tea and dinner buffet (including selected wine and cocktails) on the house.Facility is quite limited, rather small swimming pool.It's located in a quiet area, hence, noise is definitely reduced.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great service
desc: I have stayed here several times. Few weeks ago, I visited here again. As always, the service was great. From the time we enter the hotel to check in and till we check out, they provide a super service, which is super personal. One main thing that admire in this wonderful place is that, all the staff of the hotel genuinely care about the comfort of the guests. One small example is that, We were out side the hotel waiting for a "Grab" (similar to Uber). The sky has bit darkened with clouds, but we didn't notice it. The doorman asked us whether we have umbrellas (voluntarily, without us even asking), and we said no. Then he said that it might rain in few hours, and he went in to the hotel and got us two umbrellas. I know it is a super simple gesture. But these kinds of small

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Best kept secret
desc: I loved the serenity , calm, peaceful this hotel has to offer. A short walk to orchard road but the hotel is away from the hustle n bustle of the city . Definitely enjoyed my short stay there n wonderful n friendly staffs. The breakfast can be better and the light refreshments too. The room I stayed was wonderful with a nice bay window, comfortable bed.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing hotel
desc: Excellent hotel, we were warmly greeted on arrival, with reception telling us of all the benefits included in our room, we had free tea and coffee all day, which was very nice after we had returned from sightseeing hot and tired. We had a complimentary buffet in the evening, and the food was very good. This included wine, beer and cocktail. The staff in the buffet were very friendly, and the service was excellent, chatting to us about the hotel, and Singapore. Couldn’t fault the hotel at all. We had a room on the 14th floor, and it was very quiet. Just about 5 mins walk to orchard road, and very close to the metro to get around the city.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: An awesome stay @ Quincy
desc: The hotel wowed us from the point we stepped into the entrance- the front office staff offered us a welcome drink which was thirst quenching and Freida, who attended to us, was courteous and friendly. We were also welcomed by the Quincy “animals” by the sofa and had to “adopt” one of them home! They were too cute to resist. The rooms were clean with well stocked amenities and the bed was comfortable with pillow options. The following day Freida also followed up with us on a tap mixer issue and resolved it. The breakfast was good, and we had a really awesome time during the cocktail hour, which was part of the perks that came along with the stay at Quincy (you can eat in all day at their Lobby restaurant - breakfast, sandwiches for lunch, cakes for tea and cocktails and light

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Best Hotel in every way
desc: We are up early to check out of the Quincy Hotel in Singapore to get an early flight home. After a 4 day stay we have been pampered & spoilt beyond belief. The Hotel itself has a lovely quirky fitout . The food in the Restaurant is excellent. Whilst they mention breakfast & snacks on their website the food in the evenings was far more substantial than a snack. From the moment that we arrived the staff on reception gave us a very warm welcome. Nothing was ever a problem,from directions to recommendations. We enjoyed Singapore Slings & Mai Thais at Cocktail Hour & all of this was included complimentary. Our room (805) was superb!! Peaceful & quiet. The bed & choices of pillows was great. All up it was a 5 star experience for both of us. Even the pool, sauna & steam room were never

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A unique place to stay in Singapore
desc: Very friendly and professional staff, very clean room, perfect location, food and beverages for free, original swimming pool: this is a unique place in Singapore, near Orchard and so many other places to visit!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Exceeded all expectations excellent
desc: Location - just off Orchard Road Arrival - was greeted with free punch check in very easy and staff very helpful. Rooms Very nice comfortable beds daily linen change and cleaned. Free mini bar refreshed each day.Good size rooms and bathrooms. This hotel offered what it says - free mobile phone to use free data maps book tickets and free international calls. 2 pieces of dry cleaning per room free and excellent service . When travelling this is very handy. Free snacks are at lunch mid afternoon cake and free wine beer gin and great food from 6-8 . The food and drinks free saved us a good amount of our holiday money . Staff everyone is so helpful from door staff reception and bar staff who go out of there way to look after you. There is a nice quite unused area just off

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful!
desc: Book a night of stay at The Quincy Hotel thru Agoda. The service and friendliness of the staff is top notch. The room is clean and comfy. Would recommend to people who want to stay in Orchard area but on a quieter side of it.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Smart,welcoming hotel,plenty of free food and drink.
desc: Very stylish hotel close to Orchard Rd and MRT. Modern,smart rooms,free wfi,minibar,afternoon snacks, dinner with free cocktails and wines. Great value for money. Good amenities open 24 hours,pool,sauna,steam room,gym. Staff very friendly and welcoming

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel
desc: Chose this hotel based on reviews and it didn't disappoint. Breakfast, snacks/drinks/cocktails included made for an excellent value. Location was good as well , close to MRT stations and shopping. I would definitely stay here again

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: What a find!
desc: The inclusions at the Quincy are pretty unbelievable. In your room rate is included breakfast, lunch, dinner, afternoon snacks. cocktails, all day ice cream, two pieces of laundry a day, and free wifi (am sure am forgetting a few - yes, they were that many!) The hotel also has an amazing infinity pool on the 12th floor open 24 hours, well fitted rooms and super always smiling staff. Will definitely be back. Thank you Team Quincy for a lovely lovely break <3

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great experience
desc: Was a a little apprehensive as my daughter booked it for us!It turned out to be very pleasant and the service and staff were absolutely wonderful! Will definitely return and hope we will be able to get good rates all through the year! Keep up the good work

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A Great Find
desc: Just spent 6 nights at the Quincy Hotel and it was top notch. The location is very central, just a 5-10 minute walk from Orchard rd makes it the perfect place from which to explore the city. While it had everything a four star hotel could offer, the Quincy went a step further by offering lunch, cocktails as well as dinner to all their guests. For me the best part was their coffee machine (not a Nescafe fan) which helped me get started in the morning as well as the evening. Full marks for their service too!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent staff in a centrally located Hotel
desc: We loved this hotel. Nothing was too much trouble for any of the staff receptionists, and waiting staff. I particularly liked Sally she was full of local knowledge and very helpful, there was another lady who I didn’t catch her name who went above and beyond as well. All of receptionists were very helpful and nothing was any trouble. For example, on the last day we kept our room on until 6pm as we were flying at 23-15. They looked after our baggage whilst we nipped down to orchards shopping centre to get a couple of last minute bits, when we returned a bit hot they offered us soft drinks and snacks to keep us going. I was so grateful. We stayed 4 nights then went to Malaysia for three nights then returned for three. Stayed in room 1108 firstly secondly stayed in 1005

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good experience.
desc: Enjoyed my holiday at this hotel. It suited my needs.Happy with complimentary additions. I enjoyed meals and relaxed atmosphere.Staff helpful and helped with ĺuggage and information. Location within easy reach of Orchard metro.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome experience
desc: Love the stay at Quincy. The service provided was commendable. Check-in was quick and came with a welcome drink. Check-out was swift and a surprise came along for birthday. Got a complimentary upgrade as well. Thank you Quincy!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: What a find
desc: Recently spent 2 nights at Quincy Hotel after finishing a cruise in Singapore. Hotel is Fantastic with amazing hardworking staff. All day snacks and drinks after 6pm including great cocktails. The bedrooms had baths and separate showers and dream beds. Best sleep I had of a 3 week holiday

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great boutique hotel
desc: We arrived at the hotel around 4pm but our room wasn't ready yet. When I booked, it stated that check-in was at 3pm so I was rather disappointed with that. We were told to wait for an hour so the maid can finish cleaning our room... We complained and the manager came back 5 mins later and said our room was ready. The location was decent, but we thought it was a little too far from Orchard Road. It is a good 10 mins walk from Orchard Road. The amenities, complimentary mini fridge, and light refreshments were the highlight of the stay. Every morning there is breakfast buffet and the light dinner every night was very tasty! The staff at the hotel are very polite and nice. The only thing that can improve is the speed of cleaning the rooms. The first 2 days, we left around 11am

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: PERFECT HOTEL and STAFF
desc: We arrived and stayed 4 nights and the hospitality and service was "FAR beyond our expectations". Mohamad ->Thank you and special thanks to Vicki and Raveen. Name spelling may be wrong!! (lol). Will definitely return .

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Lovely Hotel
desc: Travel Bag booked us in this hotel, and we were so glad they did. On arrival we were informed of the free lunch/afternoon tea/ice cream/dinner with cocktails/free mobile phone and two items of laundry per day included in the price. We found the mobile very handy and we took it out with us everyday to use its GPS. The hotel is close to the Train underground and we bought a two day pass with unlimited travel. On return we used the pool everyday and most of the time were the only ones using it. The staff were very friendly, the room was very clean, our sheets weren't changed everyday but I don't think that was necessary. The hotel is close to Orchard Road where all the designer shops are.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Feel really good about the hotel
desc: Singapore is a wonderful place to visit and stay at Quincy Hotel is an excellent choice to make my week more enjoyable in a humid and quite warm weather. Location, Room, Facility, Service, Breakfast/refreshment are all factors for me to recommend this hotel to you.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Absolute gem
desc: My partner and I stayed here for four days, 3 nights in January. We were very happy customers. Our room was spacious, the bed was super comfortable as were the pillows. The view from the room was lovely. The staff are so pleasant and helpful, I have to make a special mention of Sally as she truly makes you feel welcome😁. It is close to Orchard Rd and a short cab ride to Clarke Quays. The food is good and the drinks are awesome. Well done Quincy, your amazing 🙌🏻🙌🏻🙌🏻

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel
desc: We (couple) really liked the Quincy. Staff were very warm and welcoming and everything was seamless. I need strictly gluten free and staff were incredibly attentive and accomodating to meet my dietary needs. We loved that we could eat breakfast, lunch and dinner-so convenient! The room was lovely and the bed was comfy. Also great to get two free items of laundry per day! Would definitely stay again.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Relaxing stay
desc: We loved our time at The Quincy. The staff were all so lovely, the extra inclusions were amazing. The location was so good, it was super easy to get to public transport and was near everything we wanted.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Really pleasant experience
desc: The quincy lives up to what is advertised.. The rooms are good .. Staff is friendly.. Good location.. All in all a solid 4 1/2 star hotel. The mini bar is well stocked and the only thing i would like to see change is the pool being temperature controlled.. It will make it even better

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Stay here !
desc: A quirky boutique hotel that stands out from the many Singapore options due to service and snacks. Every interaction with staff was easy and they have a customer focused attitude. Included in room rate was good breakfast with hot and cold options , lunch snack ( toasted sandwich, salad and fruit ) plus evening drinks . You can work out at the gym or Relax on level 12 with the infinity pool. Short walk to Orchard Rd and Paragon shopping mall . Room price was excellent at less than $260 / night .

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: The Quincy hotel
desc: Excellent service, great facilities and close to shops and transport..Staff were very accomodating on our individual requests and were genuinely interested in how our daily travels went..Well done to all involved

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing Hotel
desc: We spent time here in January 2018 and this place was nothing short of amazing. Small boutique hotel and the staff and amenities were absolutely fantastic. Nothing was too much effort for the staff. All staff were so friendly and a special mention to Kit Yin who made us feel so special. Would definitely recommend this place to anyone. We found the location brilliant ... short stroll to Orchard Road.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic place .Great service staff are so friendly
desc: Excellent would recommend staying here .The food and service are fantastic especially happy hour from 6.00 pm till 8.30pm .The staff cannot do enough for you .The rooms are very clean .Great location .

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Best value
desc: I have never before stayed at a hotel where everything is included in the room rate. It makes for a very comfortable and relaxed stay. Everything from the service, the food, the amenities in the room, to the atmosphere and decor at the hotel is of very high standard and quality. We would definitely saty here again.Just one observation...the closest train station is quite a walk from the hotel considering that it is uphill all the way. I would recommend taking the taxi to and from the airport when traveling with large suitcases.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great selection of refreshments and awesome customer service
desc: It is very thoughtful to offer a good selection of breakfast, afternoon snacks and light dinner with cocktails. The staff were all very attentive and always ready to offer something to guests. You could see them smiling all the time or having a small chat with guests in the cafe or at the lobby. Certain TV channels did not have good reception but it was ok as the bed is very comfortable for taking rests!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Simply a top-notch place!
desc: I wonder what others get, when they spend some crazy 4000 SGD _per day_ in Hilton? Does Hilton invite Sir John Gardiner and his orchestra in your room to act as a wake-up service? :-)) But here, in Quincy, even for some 200 sgd per night I have : 1. A delicious breakfast 2. A complimentary dinner 3. A perfect steam bath and brand new gym 4. Really clean and spacious room ( you will get some 11 to 14 square meters for this price in other hotels, here they offer 20 and more ) Plus their management is really flexible and customer oriented and they have offered a great discount to turn me away from their competitors ( I planned to change the hotel to stay closer to my employer ). And I never ever received any payments to write such a praise, it's completely sincere :-) Great

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great value hotel in Singapore
desc: I would definitely recommend this hotel. If you are wanting a full 5 star luxury experience this is not for you. However if you want fantastic value in a great location with a very good night sleep, then it is. This is a small boutique style quirky hotel. Staff overall were helpful but not overly friendly and room cleaning patchy on days. Shout out though to Sarah and Irene in the restaurant who were very warm and friendly. Irene at night had my wine ready as I arrived for the free food and drinks. Book direct then you get a better price and access to free breakfast, omplimentary mini bar, food and drinks from 6-8:30 pm. For room prices in Singapore this was amazing value. The food on several nights as good as I have had paying expensive 5 Star club room prices. Hotel is a 5

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Does what it says in the tin
desc: At the end of our 2 week Christmas and New Year vacation in Hong Kong and Bali we just wanted somewhere comfortable to spend our last 2 nights in Asia. The Quincy is just that - ————-nice and comfortable . It’s not trying to be anything it’s not which is reflected in the value for money . The staff are good and the location is great . Taxis are readily available and the friend desk are more than happy to book. Room size is more than adequate and we had 2 of the best nights we had had over our vacation . Although we didn’t eat the tonnes “ free” food on offer we did have a couple of sneaky V&Ts which was a nice touch as was the complimentary 2 pieces of dry cleaning service and the free iPhone ( local calls ) The pool isn’t great but then again what would you expect - it’s an

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Outstanding value
desc: We booked this hotel through Trailfinders for 3 nights as an affordable mid range hotel B&B basis. What we found was as good as 5 star accommodation. Fully equipped stylish bedroom, outstanding buffet dinner and daytime snacks and a decent breakfast. It has a small, intimate restaurant and the food is authentic recipies. Everything was included in our room price. The staff are charming and service excellent. It's a 10 minute walk to Orchard Road and the MRT station. Honestly, I couldn't see the point in staying anywhere else in Singapore.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: great concept, good execution
desc: We stayed two days here and really like the concept. If you're taking the metro, it is a bit of a hike, and kind of confusing - we had several people ask us on our route to the metro how to find public transportation. The most obvious way will have you walking through the parking lot of another hotel, so it's not exactly easy to find. The front desk area is happening, and there are lots of people coming and going, but the staff are helpful. We could not get in early, but did get our room by noon. The lobby has a small dining area - which seemed too small to seat everyone, but somehow managed to work, even for the snacks, breakfast, and light dinner/cocktail hour(s). The food was not good, but it was free. I didn't try the restaurant food. There were plenty of things to choose

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Quiet, comfortable and great value
desc: Stayed here for 4nights, outstanding value for money. Beds super comfy rooms good size and bathroom lovely with separate shower. Can walk to Orchard Rd, only 5mins. We had breakfast, dinner and drinks included during 2 1/2 hour happy hour and free daily bar fridge top up. Staff are very accommodating, also spent quite a bit of time in the rooftop pool.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Another good stay
desc: The location of this hotel is good, just a few minutes walk from Orchard Rd. The staff are very friendly and helpful. The facility itself is nice and has all you would need for a city centre hotel. Lastly, the value of this hotel compared to other in Singapore is excellent.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great 2 night business trip
desc: Here for 2 nights on business and thought the place was perfect. Staff very helpful and facilities all you needed. Only a short walk down to Orchard Road, and in the mornings I managed a run down to the Marina in 20 minutes. The tariff included breakfast, snacks, cocktails in happy hour and free mini bar, which was great (if only I'd been there enough to take full advantage). No bar, but the breakfast area on ground floor did have beer on tap (though it was off when we were there), and they were happy to pop next door and get bottles of beer, but it did close a 10pm. On the one night we did want a later drink, we just brought the beer from the mini bar down and sat outside which was nicely appointed. Did not use the pool, but looked quite impressive up on the 10th floor.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel with free food
desc: Lovely hotel with great facilities staff and free food and drinks it is next to orchard Road which is full of shops and very busy down side a wee bit far to mrt and make sure if you book 2 rooms you specify that they need to be next to each other

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Quick overnight stay
desc: Overall a pleasant, clean hotel. The staff would have to be the friendliest we have ever come across Happy hour was great!!!!!! Good location! We would definitely stay again if returning to Singapore.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Lucky change
desc: Got allocated to the Quincy after original hotel overbooked. Fantastic hotel. Complimentary items were incredible. Rooms beautiful, clean and the beast bed and pillows I have ever had in a hotel. Food supplied free of charge great and saved us a lot of money. Staff very friendly, nothing too much trouble. Infinity swimming pool great. What can I say .5 star throughout.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Was having such a good stay, until it got ruined right at the end
desc: This is my second time at Quincy. I booked the room for a staycation, which was inclusive of free late check out.Everything was going so well, until the very end. Late check out was at 4pm, but at 12pm (regular check out time), the staff started calling us and coming up to the room to check on us to see why we hadn't checked out and what time we were checking out. This is despite our booking clearly stating check out at 4pm (i signed off on it when i checked in)This incident ruined the entire experience and we left early anyway as we felt that we weer no longer welcome past 12pm. I was looking forward to making this my go to place for a yearly staycation, but I guess now I'll be looking at other alternatives.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: The Quincy
desc: We stayed at the Quincy for three days before our cruise and had a fantastic stay, we were only expecting room only but were offered complementary breakfast, evening meals and drinks during our stay, the staff were helpful and friendly, I would highly recommend the Quincy

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: excellent location and service
desc: Great location for shopping, just 5 min walk to the main shopping malls. Excellent service at the reception and restaurant, you almost enjoy full board because of the food the hotel is offering during the whole day.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Honeymoon reyreat
desc: Great hotel. Highly recommended. Great complimentary foods and lovely staff. The room was clean and large with an incredibly comfortable bed. They have an infinity pool open 24 hours and although we checked out we were able to use guest showers. Amazing hotel!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Gem of a hotel in great location
desc: We stayed here for three nights and had a wonderful experience from start to finish. Lovely and welcoming staff, free 2-item daily laundray, great breakfast, afternoon snacks and great dinner with free-flowing drinks in the evenings. We only utilized the dinner one night but came back and had a snack and drink outside in the lush seating area adjacent to the breakfast bar. The room was lovely and clean and the service impeccable. We appreciated the close proximity to Orchard Road with its transportation options. Would stay again in a heartbeat.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Super hotel and great value!
desc: This hotel is amazing, not least because of all the add ons as mentioned by others. The food choices were wide and varied each day in the evening and breakfasts were great. If you don't like the buffet chioces, you can order a la carte at breakfast. At dinner, the drinks are free and unending! The laundry each day makes a nice difference. The hotel was pretty full during our stay, but the staff are cheerful and friendly at all times, making guests feel welcome and cherished. There are some quirky decorations in the lobby which make the place feel very comfortable. There is a quiet outdoor area at the front of the hotel where you can enjoy a nice afternoon snack or drink. The room was very comfortable with free bottles of water replaced every day. Black out blinds allowed us

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Gem of a Singapore Hotel
desc: 4 star hotel with 5 star service. 7 minute walk to Orchard Road, quiet location with service and amenities that are over the top. Would recommend without question as my favourite hotel in Singapore and would not stay anywhere else .

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: fabulous hotel
desc: great location for shopping. Great facilities- pool and gym. Food varied and nicely served; good choice and quality. Evening cocktails lovely. Hotel grounds beautifully landscaped; sculptures well placed and enhanced the hotel

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: No. 1 choice in Singapore
desc: As the title said, it is our no 1 choice in Singapore. The reason is simple; It is a unique, little hotel that makes all the guests feel special. The rooms are clean, good preassure in the shower, lots of hot water (and Kevin Murphy products!), comfy beds and the location is perfect. There is no doubt where we are staying in Singapore (we have been here 4 times) A special thanks to Frieda Li in the reception (thanks for the mints:)) It was such great customer service. Hope to see you again!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great staff, Quality, and Proffessional staff.
desc: Spend a night at Quincy, Great staff proffessional way of handing things. Welcome drinks provided all day refreshments, superb mini bar. Celebrate my girlfriend birthday, great surprised from the whole team Especially to Cerlyn Liew, thank you once again Will definitely be back.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very good Hotel
desc: We stayed here with friends, originally booked in the next hotel, The Elizabeth, but so glad we had been changed by Planet Cruise. This hotel was very clean and, nice pool, food was a good selection. Also some dry cleaning we had done was very good.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Feels like a boutique hotel, amazing service
desc: We have literally just checked out of this hotel and moved on to our next destination. This hotel was booked for us by our travel agent so we didn’t know much except that it was “breakfast only”. We were very pleasantly surprised by this hotel. The staff cannot do enough for you and the rooms and facilities are great. Although there are a couple of hundred rooms, it never feels busy and manages to feel more like a little boutique hotel. We were also surprised to find that the mini bar was free (what a nice change!) and that the hotel provide complimentary snacks throughout the afternoon (cake to die for) and a small buffet dinner in the evening. The location is central, just a ten minute stroll to Orchard Road, the main shopping precinct, where you can catch the hop on hop off

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Short stopover in Singapore
desc: A gem of a hotel with excellent and friendly staff. The extras that come with it were very welcome and we took advantage of the breakfast, dinner and drinks. The laundry service was excellent too. A short stroll from Orchard Road where the hop on hop off bus is accessible and also the MRT. Would throughly recommend it as it was a fantastic price too.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Recent visit
desc: Hotel could be great but currently to fussy so basics not in place and they concentrated on what would have been good if the rest was perfect. Nice ideas but not working for us. Add more characters we are told. Done

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Decent hotel but needs refreshing
desc: I stayed here for a staycation recently but had put my father up in this hotel 8 years ago when it was new. The hotel unfortunately has not aged well and is in need of a makeover or renovation. Staying here, you are given several perks, such as a free minibar, breakfast buffet, lunch and dinner buffet and refreshments (all included). You even get free cocktails at night, which is a nice touch. That said, the hotel is a bit off the beaten path and the restaurant was always overcrowded. Service was decent overall but I just feel that this hotel has seen better days.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Would highly recommend
desc: What little we paid for in Singapore (drinks, including non-alcoholic), was surprisingly expensive, other than at the brilliant hawker centres. So it meant that we appreciated the all-inclusive price all the more. The pool can be surprisingly cold! Service from all staff was excellent. They welcome you back each day as a friend, or at least with recognition. We contrasted that with our wander through Marina Bay Sands, which was so huge that you must be just another statistic. The worst was seeing people queueing to check in, herded by those zig zag webbing lines. Quincy was considerably more personal. I'd debated staying there but, when we compared the two, we were both really, really happy with our choice of the Quincy. That 'hill' that reviewers talk about is

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: very nice
desc: i stayed here for my birthday and the staff was very nice! i loved the club experience and the food was good. the only thing with the light dinner that it involved many fish dishes so i could only have one or two things because i do not eat fish, though the people who did have fish in our group said the dishes were great, the bed was comfortable and the toiletries were fantastic!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A Great Experience!
desc: I booked this hotel online and was intrigued by the all day food offer and free drinks and free minibar. It turned out to be much more with the service being excellent, especially the very efficient and kind servers in the restaurant, the room spotless and very nice room attendant, the soft jazz in the background, etc. All in all, a very delightful experience. One should be aware that the walk from Orchard Road is a bit arduous especially in the blazing heat & humidity but it would not stop me from booking again or recommending The Quincy to friends. The only negative I have is that the outside smoking area for the hotel, and apparently also for the hotel next door, is right outside the dining area windows. While you can't smell the smoke, smokers loitering a few feet from

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great value for money location near Orchard Road
desc: Excellent in every aspect, from service to amenities to staff. Plus the open minibar, free breakfast and happy hour are welcome additions! I wish I had discovered the Quincy before. I just recommended it to a friend as the place to stay in Singapore. Will definitely return.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful
desc: Loved our stay here. Staff were both professional and friendly. All day refreshments were welcome as was the free minibar in room. Room was comfortable and clean. Hotel not suitable for young children as no adjoining rooms. Would definitely come back to The Quincy.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent
desc: My friend and I stayed here for 6 nights... and we score it 10/10. The staff were super efficient and very friendly and the inclusive afternoon drinks and cakes plus the evening 4 course buffet was excellent, well prepared and very tasty. Rooms are large and spotlessly clean, with a free mini bar, good WiFi and a big, comfy bed. Thank you Quincy for making our trip to Singapore so enjoyable and successful... we would always chose to stay here, over all the big shiny commercial city hotels, you just made us feel so welcome and at home. A special thanks to Kit Yin for doing such a great job serving complimentary drinks on the patio ! The small, boutique hotel is on a quiet, leafy road - a ten minute stroll to the busy, busy overwhelming Orchard Rd.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very good afternoon cakes
desc: It was our first time in Singapore. We had a 9-night stay. We liked the laundry service,and afternoon cakes. The breakfast was a little bit dull after a few days. Only one time we had a light lunch in the middle of neighbourhood walks. We also had light dinners a few times. We also took part in the movie night by the swimming pool. The Handy smartphone was a nice surprise.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Brilliant
desc: Fantastic experience from start to finish. We stayed 3 nights in a well equipped clean bedroom with free mini bar and local phone calls. Food is available all day with drinks in evening.Staff couldn't be more helpful in every way. We stayed in Room 1409 on top floor. Both Singapore and this hotel are totally brilliant

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent central location, great staff & facilities
desc: Fantastic hotel to stay in Singapore, centrally located in the Orchard district, with the MRT (Orchard) only a short walk away. Room facilities are great - clean, spacious & comfortable bed with a complimentary minibar, safe, and beautiful toiletries for use. Staff are friendly, welcoming & always willing to assist with any enquires, issues or just for a friendly chat. Great all day food options (complimentary). Hotel is close to Orchard Road & Scott Street, so public transport is close by; or taxis easily accessible & with hotel next door as a collection point for bus collection to most Singapore experiences.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: excellent stay
desc: exceed my expectation and value worth due to hotel provide almost all-day light snacks and free complimentary mini bar. Staffs is all very polite and nice.. location is also a plus as it is easily walkable to orchard... will definitely stay again

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A great place to stay
desc: We were in Singapore for 2 nights (nearly 3 whole days) and the purpose of our trip was to recalibrate the jetlag having headed East from the UK. It always does our head in. But 2 days in Singapore before heading home to Australia helps the re integration into work and time zone. For this, The Quincy was the best place to stay for us. Our needs are relatively simple. Creature comforts without spending a fortune and without going too far afield. Close enough to Orchard Road but not too close. The pool and the steam room a welcome opportunity to relax. Staff were attentive without being intrusive and went out of their way to make our stay comfortable and happy.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great facilities, however room itself was a let down
desc: Pros: I was initially skeptical booking the hotel after reading the complimentary items they throw in, because I was expecting the bare minimum since you’d have to pay much more in other hotels to receive “club benefits”. However, we were pleasantly surprised! Afternoon consisted of sandwiches and fries you could order ala carte, some salad, cheese, biscuits and nuts with tea, coffee or juices. Evening consisted of Hot items such as fried rice, chicken, pasta, samosas, cake, Kuih, cheese and cocktails off a menu. Breakfast was also good with bread, cereal, scrambled eggs, hash brown, bacon, porridge. The food was consistently tasty, I was very impressed. There’s an outdoor area which is very serene and great to enjoy your cocktail. They have a small gym and pool

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing
desc: One of my favorite hotels in Asia. I have stayed here 3 times and will always go back. Everything is 5 star and the staff remembered us after a 2 year absence. The location is also fantastic. Close to everything but still very peaceful

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice pre cruise stay at the Quincy
desc: We booked the Quincy for a four day stay before catching a cruise because of the location and value. We arrived at the hotel around 01:30 and the staff had our documents and checked us in within seconds. We had booked one of the larger rooms and it was just like the description. The bath room was large and had good storage. It's definitely not a 5 star facility, but is clean, bright and has a wonderful staff. We enjoyed the morning breakfasts, snacks, drinks and some of the evening meals. It's about a 5 minute walk through the hotel across the street to Scotts Road and about a 15 minute walk to Orchard Road and the MRT. Everything in the room functioned properly - our only minor issue was the TV picture was not clear. We will definitely try to book the Quincy on our next

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Thank you
desc: Food(Morning and night) service was very good. I was able to spend comfortably. I would like to increase the number of items for the free laundry service. (About 3 or 4 items should be free.) Thank you very much.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A hotel to be comfortable in
desc: A great hotel with lot of suprise ! On a Hill but not to hard to reach by foot. Excellent service overall. Extra credit för afternoon food with beer and wine. Don't miss this excellent hotel with walkingdistans to city or the subway.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent location!
desc: Excellent location, friendly staff, free food! Highly recommended for visits. Within 5 minutes walking distance to Singapore's best shopping district, friendly and accommodating staff and free flow of alcohol during dinner. Will be back!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Little Gem
desc: This is a small boutique hotel, upon arrival staff waiting taken care of our luggage, ushered us in for quick check in very impress. Our room was on 4th floor, good with big window & shutter, bright & airy. The bathroom had separate bath & shower with toiletries. The wardrobe has, gown , slippers & free safe & hair dryer. The tea, coffee free snack & mini bar. They surprised us with cake for my husband birthday took picture, even though, it was 2 days before & handed picture upon leaving, nice gesture. All day snacks available, ice cream, tea & coffee, afternoon tea with cakes, light dinner , cocktails, beer & wine no extra charge brill. The Orchard road few minutes away, walk across York hotel car park, far east plaza, lucky plaza nearby have food court. The taxi

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Exceptional value and service
desc: Great location, close to Orchard Rd. Hotel staff were friendly and provided exceptional service. Hotel package included free laundry (2 items per day) and free cocktails and finger food in the afternoon. Great value for money.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Top of the line
desc: This was my fourth stay at the Quincy for business in Singapore. Nothing is ever too much trouble for the staff. The whole hotel operates like a club floor with food and beverages available from breakfast through until 8pm. Two pieces of laundry per day, a handy phone with free calls (some international) and enough data for local maps etc, and a small mini bar in your room, all included! Central location and a perfect home away from home for two weeks.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great boutique hotel
desc: I’ve wanted to stay here for a while because of the great reviews and it didn’t disappoint. Having breakfast, snacks, dinner and drinks (including cocktails) included was a great touch and out of the ordinary for a Singapore hotel. Saved us a lot of money too! (We ended up having to change money back to Aussie dollars as we had leftovers which never usually happens). It was in a quiet little culdesac which was leafy green and peaceful. It was a ten min walk to orchard road so shopping! The room comfortable with a good sized bathroom and a great big window with a nice view over the city. The gym was great and while we didn’t have time to use the pool it looked lovely with a view over the city also. (Another great thing about it being a smaller, boutique hotel is that

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Singapore Delight
desc: Good service, smaller hotel close to city centre and public transport. Easy to get around Singapore from this location Close to cafes and restaurants Pool was great after a day of exploring Singapore.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Must be my 20th time here? -not sure but this time my sister visited also.
desc: Worked in Singapore so was here when this Hotel opened -was not so great then but last six/seven years visit about 2/3 times per year -this time met my sister there -( she flew in from Ireland)n nothing to not like about the Hotel -Location great -5 minute walk to Orchard Road,Rooms -clean and comfortable, Pool open 24 hours, small garden/terrace can relax in the evening , all inclusive -food great -many staff have changed but still lovely people -really a great place to stay . Best kept secret apart from the Hotel itself in Singapore is the waiter in the restaurant /bar -know him 6/7 -years-longer? just a great guy ( wont say who he is -small hint Indian gentleman) -he makes the Quincy THE Quincy -people make Hotels special -he is one of those people !! and one of the

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Anniversary Staycation
desc: We stayed in Quincy hotel for our Anniversary. The room is beautiful with a window corner area with cushions for sitting and enjoying the view. We opted for the upgrade with a u-shape bolster on the bed and whiteboard wall with markers to play with. The toilet is also very spacious with a separated bathtub and shower area. However, the door is a sliding door which means that the closet will be open when you wish to close the toilet door. The room also has many free goodies in the mini fridge and cupboard. There is also free breakfast, high tea and evening dinner provided by the hotel. Do take note that sandwich is also served from 12pm to 2pm and cakes are served from 2pm to 6pm. However, there is not a lot of variety of food to choose during 12pm to 6pm. Breakfast and dinner

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Highly Recommended
desc: This hotel is fantastic. The location is great, and the staff go above and beyond to help you. The rooms are beautiful and clean. The service is so good, and the value for money is absolutely fantastic. The food is delicious! I would highly recommend staying here. I have stayed there twice in the past 6 months, and look forward to returning again as soon as I can!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect
desc: Perfect hotel near the orchard. Very nice service and friendliness from the whole staff. Laundry perfect and on time ervery day. Hope the management will do it on this level for an long time. Come back again.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very Quirky Boutique Motel,
desc: Loved this Motel, wish we had stayed longer. Great price and awesome service, they couldn't do enough for us . This room included light supper , mini breakfast and drinks and ice cream. Lovely room with huge window. Will stay again next time we are in Singapore. THANK YOU for our great stay.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A Singapore Treasure!
desc: Excellent for its location, cleanliness, generously sized rooms and bathrooms and quality of service. All the additional free extras were excellent such as 2 pieces of free laundry daily, 2 bottles of water daily, food and drinks at lunchtime and evenings daily. I would not hesitate staying at The Quincy again.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Remarkable Hote
desc: As good experience that I've ever had in a city hotel. All of the staff seem to give at least 101%, and were so friendly and helpful. The facilities are top notch, the food excellent, the bed comfortable, the room quiet. I recommend it highly for those who want a personal experience where you are a name and not a room number.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fabulous Stay
desc: From the moment we checked in the staff have been very attentive and accommodating. This hotel is well positioned and offers every thing you could hope for. The extra benefits make it extremely affordable and excellent value for money. We would definitely return next time we're in Singapore and recommend for short or long stay, business or pleasure.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: One of the best hotels I have ever stayed in
desc: Just stayed 7 nights in this amazing hotel. The value for money was incredible. Our room (1104) was fresh, clean, modern,cool, extremely comfortable, & as mentioned before, the beds and pillows, auto night blind and sound proofing gave you the best nights sleep. The big window view of the city at night was lovely. The complimentary breakfast, mini bar, all day refreshments, laundry service, and all you can eat delicious dinner were incredible, and last but not least, the staff were all happy, professional, and extremely accommodating. They all went out of their way to make our stay special & memorable.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good base for whistle stop tour of Singapore
desc: Stayed her for 2 nights on stopover to New Zealand. Good base for exploring Singapore and taxis easy to come by or be more adventurous and take the metro. Staff helpful & friendly. Reasonable breakfast, small restaurant area but ok. Nice offer of evening cocktails & light refreshments throughout the afternoon in our package. About 15 mins car ride from Chinatown/Boat Quay. Pool & spa area a real bonus. Rooms clean & bed very comfortable. Would recommend.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Old friends
desc: I have stayed at the Quincy many times before and the service and friendliness of the staff keeps me coming back. The position is central, the rail is accessible the gym and pool the laundry and the finger food and drinks in the evening all add up to , I will stay again next time .

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Still the same, in a good way
desc: Quincy will always be one of my favourite hotels in Singapore. The rooms are spacious and the bath rooms are comfy too with great amenities - noticed they’ve stopped using Le Labo amenities and changed to Kevin Murphy. The room is clean and the bed is comfortable as usual. Service at check in is always warm and friendly. The staff are mostly courteous and approachable as well. Breakfast selection is not wide but acceptable. The price you pay for the room includes breakfast, evening cocktails and some light food and also snacks throughout the day. Not forgetting the mini bar is free as well that includes a few cans of soft drinks, maybe a couple cans of beer and some chips. On weekends they also have movie screenings for free at the roof top for free.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very cool boutique hotel in Singapore
desc: We slept at The Quincy Hotel, a modern business boutique hotel. It has even won the Singapore’s Tourism Awards, and we totally get why. The staff is so helpful and friendly! They really made our stay so great. Another great thing about this exclusive hotel is the amazing pool where you can cool off in the water but still swim in the sun at the same time. We had the Quincy’s Qool Weekend packageduring our stay, and it included breakfast, all day refreshments, cocktails and movie night at the pool. We really love when hotels organize such cool packages, it makes your stay so special. The hotel is very close to the shopping mall Far East Plaza, so it’s an amazing location if you like a little shopping (as we do ‍). It’s less than a 5 minute walk away, so that’s just in time before

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing value
desc: Great location and all inclusive food and drinks each night which was enough to fill us up so we didn't spend money on this. Food also available during the day. The staff here are amazing and we will definitely return. Also the hotel is a bit quirky which we loved.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location
desc: This hotel is in a great location close to orchard. Free WiFi works great and breakfast, daily snacks and light dinner a bonus. Always clean and the pool and gym are a welcome addition. Good value and look forward to coming back next time.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic!
desc: Fantastic hotel with excellent staff. Well equipped modern rooms with every convenience at hand. I really didn’t expect the food to be as good and the free drinks in the evening was the icing on the cake! Would thoroughly recommend.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good location and brilliant concept...
desc: We had a two night stay in the Quincy last week, whilst returning from NZ to the UK - and we really enjoyed ourselves. All the staff are welcoming and enthusiastic - they actually want to help and are proud of their hotel. Our room was on the 5th floor with good views over the surrounding area, and all the facilities you could want or need. The 'all inclusive' concept (which is explained at check in) is great and works well - breakfast, laundry, wifi, day time snacks and an evening buffet with drinks are all included. We haven't come across this idea with hotels of this standing before and wonder why others don't emulate it? Lastly, the location is good being in a (relatively) quiet cul de sac, but within walking distance of the 'retail opportunities' and hop on-hop off

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Pleasant stay
desc: Stayed here for 3 days, service was good and had a pleasant stay. A walk away from Orchard and not difficult to find, so easy. Free refreshments as complimentary and since I was staying for business, it's easy to entertain my guest just for coffee - accompanied with some light snacks. Thank you, Quincy!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Enjoyable stay
desc: This past week I spent 5 days and 4 nights at the Quincy Hotel. It was a very enjoyable stay. My room was very clean and comfortable. The staff does an outstanding job of assisting you and making you feel very welcome. The stay includes breakfast in the mornings and if you are too tired to go out, a light dinner option in the evening. The hotel is located near Orchard Road where you have unlimited shopping and dining awaiting you. Other attractions are a short taxi ride away. If you are looking for a good place to stay while in Singapore, the Quincy hotel will be a fine option. Very Recommended.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: I Would Struggle To Find Fault
desc: The service and value this hotel achieves is astounding. Breakfast was included, so were two pieces of laundry per day, there was all day dining available, also free. The rooms were of a good size, the facilities are probably in need of a refresh (I don’t think it has been refurbed in ten years) but still extremely comfortable, the pool was excellent and service was faultless. Let me take a moment to speak highly of the staff. Attentive in every way, from fixing the mobile to the local phone network, to hailing you a cab and ensuring your eggs are cooked to perfection. It’s only drawback is that it is about 500 meters from the local MRT station and that includes a small hill. It really wasn’t and issue. No doubt in my mind I would recommend someone to stay here and would

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent holiday
desc: We stayed for 9 nights and from check in to check out every member of staff was polite, friendly and helpful. Our room was clean and tidy and the facilities in the hotel were just right for being conveniently located to enjoy all the wonderful delights of Singapore. The complimentary cocktails and drinks in the evening were very welcome since the cost of alcohol in Singapore is very expensive. Thank to you all and we will be staying with you again.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Cannot fault in any way
desc: You can see from previous reviews that this hotel is faultless. From moment at check in the staff are really helpful and you can see they enjoy their job. There are cleaning staff going around the public areas of the hotel constantly cleaning. The beds are really comfortable and the pillows so good that my wife bought one from the hotel for $35.00. The hotel offers fee dry cleaning of two items a day (which is really handy when you have been on the road for 3 weeks) as well as all day light refreshments, coffee and cake in the afternoon and dinner in the evening with free alcoholic cocktails. Not to mention my favourite, free soft serve ice cream to help yourself. This place saved me heaps of money, having not to buy any food. You want to end up staying here all day. Great pool

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Lovely Pre Cruise Hotel
desc: Lovely hotel, very friendly and efficient staff. Good location very Close to Orchard Road. Nice surprise that it was all inclusive, evening meal including cocktails until 8.30pm. Nice Large room. Highly recommend

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Value for Money Hotel
desc: An excellent hotel in terms of staff service, room and inclusive add-ons. We were in a deluxe studio on the 13th floor, just one floor above the level of the pool which was very good in terms of size and amenities. The reception staff were very friendly and helpful and the restaurant staff were also great. As well as breakfast, you could also enjoy afternoon tea and cake and from 6pm till 8.30pm you could eat and drink as much as you liked. The staff were more than happy to keep filling your glass if that's what you wanted. The only small downside was that we found the walk to and from the MRT and bit long in the heat and humidity, but the staff are happy to get you a taxi. Overall, we found this hotel great value for money, with great staff and service.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great value for money
desc: Definitely agree that this hotel is great value for money. The inclusions are great - small mini bar and crisps replaced daily, breakfast with 4-5 hot options, fruits and breads/cheeses/salads, 2 pieces of laundry every day was fantastic for us after being on a cruise, staff at the desk were generally helpful. Location wise, it’s about a 10 minute stroll to Orchard Road which we didn’t mind at all, definitely different to staying on top of an MRT station though. You can cut through the York hotel to get to Scott’s Rd a bit quicker, but we preferred walking the other way. While we utilised the breakfast a few mornings and had drinks 1-2 nights of our 6 night stay, we prefer to eat local breakfasts and local foods where possible. I was impressed to see Kaya Jam as a breakfast

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Boutique Hotel
desc: This hotel was excellent. Room were very clean and spacious. Staff were delightful & could not do enough for you. Everything to eat & drink throughout the day was included, breakfast, drinks of any sort, afternoon tea, cocktails in the evening and even ice cream machine to help yourself from. A small outside space is available with water running around the area. All in all it was a lovely place to stay. Thank you.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good standard hotel
desc: Our first time to Singapore. We selected The Quincy based on research and previous reviews. We stayed for 2 nights and could of stayed longer. From booking to check in and throughout everything was very good. The hotel is in a nice suburb close to amenities. The staff are friendly and professional. The facilities are very good in particular the breakfast room and all-day snacks and drinks in the evening were very good too. The Deluxe studio room we chose was a good standard with bath and walk-in shower. The housekeeping was also very good. We would recommend this hotel to other travelers.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: An oasis
desc: Arrived to be welcomed by lovely cooling fruit drink when it was hot and humid. Room was comfortable although the aircon fan was a little noisy but it didn't take long to adjust to the sound great view from the 11th floor and the staff allowed us to use the pool and shower area after we had checked out as our flight was late in the evening. Would definitely stay here again

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very good and valuable hotel
desc: Good location near Orchard Rd. and underground train station. Very easy to shopping area. Room is very clean and quiet. Free some laundry when stay over 3 nights. Complementary mini bar and buffet cocktail 6.00-8.30 pm. is appreciate for me. Next time to visit Singapore, I'll stay at here.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Squad Goals
desc: This was the hotel that we stayed at on our very first visit to Singapore. The hotel is at the top of hill (slight incline). It looks very nice from the outside and has a garden to relax in. It is about a 5 minute walk from a shopping centre which leads out onto the famous Orchard Road. The staff checked us in and gave us bottled water and had our luggage taken up to our room. The room was a very decent size. Nice big bed, big walk in shower etc. The breakfast at the hotel was awesome. There was a nice variety of things to eat. There was complimentary dinner/lunch type food available. Every single member of staff that we had dealings with, especially Hafiz, Tonny and Muhammad were more than helpful. They gave us local knowledge on dining, site seeing and getting around. This is

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: You can't beat the Quincy for overall value for money.
desc: This was our second stay here on a stopover and I tried to find somewhere that was better value for money but it just isn't possible. I would imagine the location may not appeal to some if for example you wanted to be by the bay but otherwise very hard to go past. This would be my "go to" hotel on any Singapore stopover.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Hospitability = Quincy Hotel
desc: Everything you ever heard about Far Eastern Hospitability is proven by Quincy. Staff is great, kind and very helpful. You feel home here. The location is exellent, you are a couple minutes walk from Orchard Road and MRT ( the local transport system) but the location is quiet and green. There is a big selection of compimentary services that make your pleasant stay even more nice. Should you think on Singapore this hotel is absolutely on the first place.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good Value Good Location
desc: We enjoyed our stay at The Quincey. About 10 min walk to Orchard Road MRT so nice and handy and was only a $20 Grab fare to airport. Having all inclusive nice. Good breakfast and enough food at night for a good dinner with cocktails, wine and beer included. Coffee, cake, juice and ice cream available all day with extra food put out for lunch. Room was a good size but ours was a bit dirty and run down. Still bed comfy and black out blinds ensure a good sleep. Was good value for what you get. Pool is nice too and actually quite large. Staff all very pleasant and very efficient check in and out. We booked directly so got a 4pm check out which was great for our evening flight. We enjoyed our stay and would come again.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Vegetarian and family friendly hotel
desc: 1. Staff are well trained and helpful 2. Value for $ - buffet breakfast, dinner, evening cocktails are included 3. Complimentary parking for local who drives 4. Amendities includes Sauna, gym and pool with complimentary 100 plus in the chiller 5. Love the complimentary snacks and minibar from the room Thank you Quincy staff for giving our family such great staycation experience!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Highly recommended
desc: The Quincy was an amazing place to stay. It is centrally located and easy walk to great shopping and restaurants with a cab ride to the Zoo or Gardens on the Bay. Wonderful ambience and great service.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Boutique Hotel in the heart of Singapore shopping area.
desc: Would thoroughly recommend this hotel. The staff were really friendly and nothing was too much trouble for them. Especially liked the fact that there were no hidden extras, including the complimentary light lunches and drinks, even cocktails. Thank you for an enjoyable stay.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic place to stay
desc: This was a wonderful find! Extremely clean and modern, with every possible room amenity you could want. Loved the included food and drinks and the location was fantastic! Would like the cow hides to be removed from the reception floor-we found them unnecessary. Lovely air con and even though the mattress seemed hard initially, we actually slept really well, with no back problems! Great views from the pool and lovely staff!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Highly recommended
desc: Very pleased with the service, location and friendliness of the staff. Everything was a described and better than expected. The food and drink was good quality and plentyful. Will happily return if we are in Singapore again.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A great hotel in the heart of Singapore
desc: My husband and I stayed in this hotel for two nights and really enjoyed our stay.. This boutique hotel is well designed, very close to Orchard Road but tranquil being in a side street. The staff were excellent - including Chandra in the restaurant who couldn't have been more helpful. The hotel provides a great breakfast and the 255 hours of free drinks and food in the evening are a real bonus - especially if you sit outside in the lovely tropical garden next to the elegant water features sipping on cockails and eating delicious food which is fresh and plentiful! A great find! Meri and Rob Chappel, Australia

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: 100% RECOMMENDED
desc: It was so nice and felt different experience at Quincy to stay. The room are clean, bathroom also clean, the service was excellent. Definitely recommended and 100% want back to stay at Quincy Hotel...

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Hype-less
desc: Unclear on all the buzz. I stayed here based on Telegraph rec ... Telegraph usually never lets me down but first times and all that. With clever marketing this hotel comes across as very chic boutique, but felt much more like a dressed up Ibis. The rooms were hot and very institutional looking, especially the flooring - felt like I was at school. Bathrooms are average. Beds average. Most disappointing - the food. Evidently it appeals to the masses based on this hotel’s popularity but reminds me of Hilton executive floor (you pay for an “upgrade” but the wine’s cheap and the food previously frozen.) Dont get me wrong - it’s not “bad”, it’s just typical chain hotel fair w no elevating factors I could discern. Staff deserves 4 stars, but other factors kept the stars to 3.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Hotel with alot of extras
desc: Loved The Quincy Hotel so many extras included in price (checkout there website too many to list) Staff very friendly, rooms clean, great pool Beds are on the firm side but may please some guests Would definitely recommend staying there (we stayed 5 nights) Located about 20-30mins from airport

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing place to stay 🙌
desc: We just spent 3 nights at this wonderful hotel and would highly recommended it! The staff were excellent and very friendly and helpful, nothing was a problem. Lovely buffet breakfast and a light dinner/dessert and drinks/cocktails in the evening ( all included in your stay ) and a very good location! We had a late flight and the staff very kindly held our bags for the day after we checked out, then offered us showers before our flight when we came back for our bags. We hope we can come back one day! ☀️☀️☀️

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Outstanding!
desc: My expectations were exceeded from arrival to departure. Efficient airport transportation and check-in. The facilities were clean and well maintained. Staff were very warm and welcoming. The food and drinks were AMAZING! I honestly didn’t want to leave. :)

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Singapore best hotel
desc: Quincy is our new favourite hotel in Asia. Great location close to Orchard road. Orchard Station & major shopping centres. Modern state of the art facilities Friendly professional staff Exceeded all expectations. We will definitely be back

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Return visit to the Quincy
desc: Our flight into Singapore arrived early morning so we cam prepared to change and park our bags as we were well ahead of check in time. Very pleasantly surprised to be told our room was all ready for us, and we could go straight up. The early check in was indicative of staff who are very happy to help, and you really feel that nothing you ask for is a problem. We will be back.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: An excellent hotel!
desc: Fantastic hotel! Easily one of the best hotels I've stayed in. The staff were very friendly and helpful, the hotel was well located ( a short walk from a major shopping street), and the free breakfast, lunch and dinner in the restaurant as excellent!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED. MODERN, CLEAN AND IN PERFECT LOCATION.
desc: One of the most awesome hotels We have ever stayed in. Clean and modern rooms, perfect size. The most comfortable bed with crisp white linen. Best pillows ever. Location perfect, 5 minutes from Orchard Road. Friendliness and efficiency of staff spot on. Enjoyed the complimentary all day tea, coffee and light snacks that were available. Quicy is HIGHLY RECOMMENDED. Great value for money. Will definitely stay there again.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: One of the best hotel experiences we’ve had
desc: We Loved staying here. One of the best hotel experiences we’ve had. Everything is taken care of. You get buffet breakfast, drinks and complimentary food(I would say dinner) at happy hour in the evening and 2 pieces of laundry a day. Could ask for more😊 The location is fantastic within the heart of Orchard rd, within a few minutes walk of the main shopping area, easy access to buses and trams. The hotel staff, specially the duty Manager Mohammad are fantastic and nothing is too much trouble. Extremely professional, helpful and pleasant. We would definitely stay here again and would recommend it all of our friends and family. Thank you for a lovely stay.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Delightful hotel
desc: This hotel is amazing, and I cannot be happier of being their guest. The food choices were wide and varied each day in the evening, and breakfasts were absolutely great. Furthermore, the hotel was pretty full during my stay, but the staff are cheerful and friendly at all times, making guests feel welcome and cherished. There are some nice decorations in the lobby which make the place feel very comfortable. The room was very comfortable with free bottles of water replaced every day. Black out blinds allowed me to sleep well despite jet lag. It was quiet and peaceful. The location was the reason I chose the hotel as it a short walk to Orchard Road without the noise and crowds of that very busy street. It is very conveniently located for taxis. The hotel is relatively small,

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel
desc: Everything about this hotel was good. Rooms were comfortable, clean and beds very comfortable. Everything is included in your room price which was fantastic. Staff was very courteous. Had use of showers after check out as we didn’t fly out till 12 pm.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Singapore trip May 2019
desc: Very nice hotel, near city center, not too expensive, excellent staff. Only complaint is the restaurant hours, if they extended the hours later into the evening it would be more accommodating to business travelers

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Wow. Superb. Must Visit.
desc: After reading a lot of reviews on TripAdvisor and other websites we decided on Quincy Hotel for our stay in Singapore. And, we are so glad on choosing Quincy. Everything from the booking, check in, rooms, stay, food, checkout was just perfect. We had requested on a early check in. This is a boutique hotel just off Orchard Road, on Mount Elizabeth. As you enter there is the reception and beyond that the Restaurant. Everything was ready as requested and after a quick check in, we were in our room. We were on the 11th floor. The 12th foor is the swimming pool and gym. You need to swipe your room card in the elevator to go to your floor. Now this room was exactly as in the photos. A lot of storage place, electronic safe, robes, hangers, emergency torch, iron, ironing board,

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good Stay. Shame about the bed
desc: Stayed here for 5 nights. Was happy overall with the stay. The all inclusiveness was great and a good drawcard to stay here. Food and drinks during "light" refreshments was very generous. Breakfast was a reasonable - had many of the food items you expect during breakfast without going over the top with choice. Pool area was nice. Amenities were great and having a mobile phone to use was extremely handy and saved having to get a Singapore SIM from one of the service providers. The hotel looks funky and interesting, which helps to keep it fresh and modern. Staff were delightful and helpful with any request. As others mentioned, it is a bit of a walk to get to the MRT, but nothing to complain about. There is a slight short cut to get to Scott's Road. The biggest downside

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation
desc: Had a staycation with my sister recently and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay.
