There was always something to eat at the lounge :) and because of the location, we could order in almost anything on offer along Orchard Road through deliveroo... we didn't have to leave the hotel for meals. Also, the steam and sauna were a plus :) Will probably return for another stay .

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good value
desc: Happy to come back again as it is such a good hotel. Only thing that is a problem is alway walking up the hill. Overall value the food and drinks are great. I have stayed at this hotel over half a dozen times and it has not dissapointed.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Terrific location and a nice staff.
desc: This is in a great location near the famous shopping area. It is truly a boutique hotel with a lot of thought out extras. Everything they promise. It is about a 10-15 dollar, US, taxi ride to the marina area. If you want to stay in the Marina area check out the Marina Sands but we recommend Quincy for a different sort of stay.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Business trip in Singapore
desc: Nice hotel with excellent room, friendly staff and service. Nice breakfast and excellent gym facilities.However, the location is a bit remote and not that close to MRT station and it needs at least 15 mins walk from MRT station.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Lovely hotel and staff
desc: We stayed at this hotel twice and our stay was great. The staff on the check in counter (special mention to Bryson) were great they accommodated an early checkin and a late check out due to our flight times. Food and drink were all included and the waiters/food staff were also great - lovely lady looked after us well (sorry couldn’t recall her name) Only feedback - would be great if more bottles of water were in the room rather than have to ask.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect as always
desc: This hotel give an incredible price / quality ratio. Rooms are big and comfortable, clean, breakfast is good, wifi is quite fast and stable, and the amount of services they provide is amazing. I even could enjoy a lounge at the airport thanks to them ! And it's very well located close to Orchard Street. The gym is nice and the swimming pool is an absolut treat. Very very cool place

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice place to stay away from the busy road
desc: Very clean, nice and warm atmosphere. Food and beverage are average, but you can have all you want to eat with no extra cost (complimentary lunch, dinner, and snacks). For the price you pay it is worth.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great place for a staycation
desc: The service and room cleanliness was great. Food was up to standard as well. Although pool and gym was smaller than i thought but it is all you can ask for for a short staycation or accomodation if you are visiting singapore. Would revisit in future

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: One glorious week in Singapore
desc: Our stay at The Quincy Hotel in Singapore was excellent, the staff are so friendly and helpful, nothing was any bother for them. The food is of a high standard and plentiful. The location is only a five minute walk to the Orchard road shops and the metro rail system. The rooms are clean and spacious. The pool, sauna and gym are good, overall a great stay.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Hotel in great location - worth the money
desc: This hotel is in a really good location for Orchard Rd. The staff are very helpful, food choice was pretty good, wine/beer/cocktails were all good and included in the room price. Nothing really not to like about this hotel.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay at Quincy
desc: Very accommodating staff and did everything for us to celebrate our 25 year wedding anniversary. Meals and drinks included were great and made the holiday more affordable. Close to Orchard Road for shopping.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great place to escape to for a few days
desc: The mobile phone they provide during the stay with google maps and local phone calls was invaluable. The breakfast and dinner included was fantastic (including drinks at dinner time). The location was great - if you don't mind doing a bit of walking (up a hill) to/from the MRT.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic place to stay
desc: The Quincy is a great hotel with fabulous staff, amenities and great location. It was a quickie relief to come back to the Quincy for 3 nights address exploring Singapore. The hotel is so clean, modern and we'll located. The free snacks, happy hour and mini bar were amazing additions to our stay and nothing was too hard for the lovely professional staff.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent 3 night stay
desc: I was recommended the Quincy as being ideal for a single older woman to stay, and how right it was. The hotel was within very easy walking distance to Orchard Road. I was able to be picked up for tours from across the road, and delivered back. The room was spacious, and to be able to have an evening meal as well, without having to leave the hotel. Service was faultless, and I wasn't made to feel an oddity being on my own.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Didn’t disappoint second time trip!
desc: This is a favourite hotel of mine, so on a repeat trip to Singapore we couldn’t go past booking again. The location is terrific, a short walk down to the busy orchard road precinct, conveniently located near paragon shopping centre. From the lovely rooms, to the sensational service from every staff member, I can see why Quincy keeps its position in the top 10 hotels. The all inclusive price is great, I put the laundry service to great use every day. The pool is compact but lovely, great temperature and sensational view! Gym is small but well equipped and the showers at the gyms area are very well appointed. The foyer is funky with cushions and decor. Breakfast nice does cook to order options and a good array of buffet, drinks and nibbles each night are excellent value, again

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great staycation
desc: Great place for a staycation. It is just off Orchard road and provides food all the day round. Breakfast was good. Light refreshments are provided in the afternoon and a simple dinner is provided with cocktails and drinks. The room is nice and service is good.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect Stay in Singapore
desc: I would like to thank all the staff of the Quincy Hotel for making our stay extremely pleasant. Everyone was very polite and helpful with our requests. The house-keeping kept our rooms clean and comfortable and even on the day I accidentally left the Do Not Disturb sign on they came back in the evening to clean our room. The bathroom amenities were very good and the shower temperature and water pressure was perfect. The check-in & check-out process was quick. The free handy phone in the room was of a major help to us on our entire trip. The breakfast was delicious and so were the afternoon refreshments and evening cocktails and dinner. The taste and quality of the meals were so good we didn't feel the need to eat out of the hotel. Free minibar was also a bonus. The 24 hour gym

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Helpful staff and great hotek
desc: Only a 5 minute walk from orchard road. Close to everything but far enough away to be quiet. The staff were super helpful and polite. The included buffet breakfast was a good way to start the day. We didn’t get to try the included lunch or light dinner as we were out exploring but the complimentary mini bar was greatly appreciated. Although the pool is not huge, we had it all to ourselves... so peaceful!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Best Hotel Ever!!!
desc: The hotel is absolutely amazing! The best I ever been and I have been in a lot! It offers a lot of things like: good breakfast, good dinner with free drinks, 24/7 gym and a pool in the 12th floor with amazing view, mini bar that is filled every day and a free laundry service for 2 clothes per day. The room is great, very quite and pleasant. What I liked the most about this hotel is the excellent and unique service! :) In the dinner I was treated by a very nice lady named Kit Yin, she always welcomed me with a smile and spoiled me wit a lot of drinks. In the reception, I got a lot of help especially from a nice guy named Steve. I asked him where I can buy: a fresh milk, a stapler and a mouse pad. He gave me fresh milk, lent me a stapler and one day afterwards a mouse pad was

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel
desc: Excelent hotel, with very good breakfast and light evening meal, both included in my room price. Metro is about 800 meters. Use taxi if you have heavy bags, hotel is up on the hill. the staff were happy and professional

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Absolutely excellent deliverey of hospitality standards.
desc: Returning to stay at Quincy was an obvious choice. Highlight of this trip was the thoughtfulness of the staff. I had arranged for a pick-up upon arrival at Changi. Quincy specifically arranged for a female driver to pick me up at the airport when they realised that I'm a lone, female traveller. Though Singapore is know for its cleanliness and public safety enviro, I thought Quincy made special note of their guests. Thank you !!!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great for a group catch-up
desc: We selected this hotel with four other couples for a birthday and it worked perfectly. The booking process and pre-arrival emails were excellent, and all the staff we encountered during our stay were very friendly and efficient. Our Deluxe studio room on the 7th floor was very comfortable, as was the bed. There were tea-making facilities and a Nespresso coffee machine. The night blinds were very good, but the air conditioning was quite noisy and not very efficient. The open wardrobe space was good although not practical for any long dresses. Great Kevin Murphy (yeah 5* marks for these!) toiletries. The bathroom was very spacious as was the shower – this has a glass window into the bedroom which could provide ‘privacy issues’ for some guests; there is, however, a full-length

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome experience of comfort
desc: Rooms are very clean and comfortable Meals are always provided and staff are very friendly. It is located in walking distance from orchard road. Which you can always access bus or MRT services. Enjoyed my stay at Quincy Hotel a lot.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Value
desc: What an amazing hotel and overall excellent value. The hotel was so extremely well priced that I was honestly a bit worried that it might be so-so. I was completely wrong; the hotel was an excellent choice for our stay. The location is 10-15m walk from the metro, it is a very easy street to navigate with a slight incline on the return. The area seems to be mostly upscale condos and is clean, safe and within a few minutes of some of the fanciest shopping I have ever seen. You are given a hand held device with free international calls, GPS and ride hailing abilities can be installed. This little phone was worth its weight in gold, really an awesome amenity. The room is extremely well laid out and offers a great deal of privacy. I wasn’t sure about the Deluxe King from photos

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Brilliant Stay
desc: Our stay at the Quincy was faultless. From the time of arrival through to departure they were nothing but accommodating. The room was spacious with access to a free mini bar. Our deal was also inclusive of a buffet breakfast, light refreshments during the day, buffet dinner & complimentary drinks. Would highly recommend.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Surprise! 😁
desc: Booked the Studio Room for a staycation however, twin beds were only left on level 2 and we were given the option of king bed on level 11. We loved it as the room was spacious with bay window ledge for us to chill with a great view! Room came with free mini bar, full set of toiletries, towels, bath robes, shower head & bath tub (stopper was a little rusted but still acceptable). TV channels were limited but thankfully Quincy has facilities such as the Infinity Pool, Steam Room, Sauna, Snacks (cookies/chips) and drinks (at level 1) which kept us occupied. Cocktails/Mocktails & mini buffet of canapes were available from 6.30pm to 8.30pm which could easily fill as dinner too. Great for anyone who doesn't want to leave the property! Requested a cake as a surprise for my friend's

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Standard has dropped
desc: The standard at quincy hotel has dropped a fair bit. They used to serve you drinks upon arrival but now they do not. They have also removed lunch completely from the club lounge so if you were looking for a staycation where you did not have to leave the hotel like I was expecting, be prepared to settle lunch on your own. The rooms are still clean and the shampoos, showergels etc. are of much better quality now. The staff were extremely rude for some reason, especially those during dinner. I saw them staring at me the whole time while making dirty looks to one another. Even when I was minding my own business, I was asked for my room number many times even though I had already told them. I noticed this treatment was not reciprocated to any other guests, and the Caucasians actually

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Quincy
desc: Excellent place to stay in Singapore, very good value for money and staff are so friendly and helpful. A ten minute walk to the nearest MRT station but very close to Orchard Rd. Ammenities are good, though the outside pool is only one depth with no shallow end so a bit hard for older people to get in and out climbing the ladder. Overall we were very pleased with our choice and will stay there again if we return to Singapore.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Mark
desc: This hotel is one of few that offers the little things for free such as mini bar laundry and food available during the day the staff were excellent and couldn’t help enough it’s a pity there are not more of these around the world as we would choose them every time so much better than the big branded hotels

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Hotel
desc: We have just returned from spending 10 nights at this hotel and we couldn’t have picked a better hotel. We arrived early morning and were pleased that a room was ready for us. The reception staff were very friendly, nothing was too much trouble for them. A special thank you to waitresses Sally and Kit Yin who made our holiday but to be fair all the staff were great. Breakfast was good, there was something for everyone, the light dinner was also good especially if you had been out all day and didn’t fancy going into town to find somewhere. The free drinks in the evening was an added bonus as alcohol is expensive in Singapore. If we were to go back to Singapore we would definitely stay at the Quincy again. Straight down the road you are at the MRT and Orchard Road. The Singapore

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Aggressive and rude service, poor value for money
desc: Check in with Miss Hennessy was efficient and friendly. The engineers who are supposed to repair things in this hotel are atrocious. When I arrived in the room, several things in the room were broken or not working, like the electricity plug and the music station. The wifi is frustrating because when you stop using your mobile phone, the wifi cuts out so nobody can send you a message. They told me that there was nobody in the hotel who supported the wifi, but they used an outside company. Within 30 minutes of checking into the hotel, I had spoken to 5 different people who weren’t able to help me. Some of the staff were inhospitable. I got into an argument with the guy serving cocktails as he wanted me to sign for four drinks when I had only had the one. The room was

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Generous hospitality
desc: Loved staying here- lovely pool area, helpful friendly staff. Amazingly generous with free food morning and evening and happy hour. Nice lounge area to catch up with friends. We were able to also dine in hotel next door, the 2 places are somehow connected.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Hotel
desc: A great choice for us and three other couples to stay for three days. Staff very friendly and professional. Complimentary food and drinks were great, as was the complimentary laundry service. Would definitely stay again.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay at Quincy Hotel by Far East Hospitality
desc: This hotel has got to be one of my favourite hotels i've visited so far. The room was spacious and had everything you could want including a ironing board and a great bathroom. It was very cleverly designed, to fit everything you would need, it took me a while to locate the wardrobe and ironing board because of this though! The hotel as well has nice extra touches such as complimentary food offered in the dining area and two pieces of laundary each day. I definitely miss the hotel already after returning home. I definitely will be returning if I visit Singapore again!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfortable stay
desc: Great room. Good value. Free minibar not up to standard- one can of beer daily for 2 people. Bathrobes old. Afternoon snacks consisted mainly of 2 cakes cut into slices--not as advertised. Evening offerings excellent

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Place
desc: Always good, the staff and great and extremely friendly. This is usually my first choice hotel when I come to Singapore. One thing to watch out for is the laundry, I’m not sure what temperature things are washed at but very often things I have put in come back shrunk so much so that although 2 pieces a day are complimentary I no longer take the chance and do not use that service.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Had enjoyed staycation with Quincy
desc: Feels right at home with Quincy. My kid likes the infinity pool with the instagramable rainbow unicorn float and I like the steam bath facility. Had enjoyed complimentary all day light refreshment and light meal to keep us fill without leaving the hotel to look for food eventhough it's ~5 mins walk to the bustling Orchard Road.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Business trip to Singapore
desc: Excellent hotel, friendly staff, nice rooms. Included dinner and drinks are very nice. Will definitely come back. Very central location close to Scotts road and Orchard road. My package also included a two hour stay at a lounge at Changi airport (midnight flight) which was very convenient.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing find in Singapore
desc: I would give this hotel 10 out of 10 for a hotel. From the moment we stepped in we felt very welcome, nothing was too much trouble to the friendly staff they have. Our room was gorgeous and included the quirky glass walled bathroom. The view to die for. We had trouble with the air con but we were moved to an equally gorgeous room. Breakfast was included, yum. In the evening they served a free cocktail, beer or wine.. But what we didnt know was that dinner was free too. Free cold drinks, ice cream and snacks most of the day and our minibar in our room was replenish for free too. This helped so much with our holiday budget. On check out day we checked out at 12 but they allowed us to use the poo sitting area at the front until our shuttle at 3.pm. Their location is awesome,

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: I booked thinking it would be quirky but it turned out to be so much more
desc: The listing on places like booking.com makes the hotel appear if it's a place for the young and hip, sort of an Asian Aloft. I'm not usually in that crowd, leaning more to traditional high end hotels. I was surprised. There is no annoying "come join the hipsters pitch" that's often combined with an implicit "just forgive us and put up with it because we can't provide the level of service you want." Instead what I experienced at the Quincy was excellence through and through. There was enough caring shown by the hotel employees, but not too much. Breakfast was well tended as was the evening cocktail hour. The pool is nicely tended, even in the wee hours of the night. And although I've seen others complain about noise, I found it a very quiet oasis just off Orchard Road. My

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great staff good stay
desc: Quick and easy check in. Most helpful staff. Room is pleasant and very clean. Linen of mediocre quality. Room service food good. Recommended for short stays or if you need to be in walking distance to the nearby hospital.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Badoux comments
desc: It was well located, the room was nice but not really big, the refreshement package do not include soft drinks during the lunch, the air conditioning was to strong we had to switch off or to put it at 30°, we had somme issues at the arrival (the front desk asks us the ID and the approval document to use the credit card of my dad immediately but we arrived late. So they could ask it the next day.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Lovely Hotel
desc: Great amenities. Nice pool, friendly staff, food included is a great perk! Evening nibbles including drinks was an excellent touch. Room was very nice and modern, with a bath and excellent shower. Bed slightly too hard for us but overall would stay again!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Clean, good value for money, thoughtful design
desc: Room was clean and big. Loved how the hotel has very thoughtful and welcoming design, like to-go cups at the coffee machine, isotonic drinks at the pool/gym. And loved how the minibar, tea, dinner, and breakfast are all included in the price.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay
desc: Friendly, efficient and good value. Quincy made us feel very much at home at a great location with an easy but efficient feel. A smaller hotel with a more relaxed ambiance. Room was a little on the compact side but quite comfortable.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Lovely hotel
desc: Lovely hotel just off Orchard Road with easy access to MRT and all amenities. Friendly staff, lovely food and drink. Rooms really clean and comfortable - excellent accommodation. Would definitely stay here again.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Quincy stay
desc: This hotel was a real surprise. Recommended by our travel agent, it was close for walking to Orchard Rd and the facilities, providing afternoon tea and dinner included in the price was great. The breakfast was good too

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent hotel with fantastic extras!
desc: Loved everything about Quincy! Great location, friendly staff and amazing value for money with breakfast, snacks, and light dinner included in room rate. Will definitely stay again on my next Singapore holiday.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good location, friendly staff but not a great option for vegetarians.
desc: Location of the hotel is good in terms of proximity to Orchard Road and the staff was friendly and warm on a regular basis (having said that it is a good 12-15 minute walk to the Orchard MRT and one should keep that in mind when planning their daily itinerary). We are pure vegetarians in terms of food habits and the restaurant experience was disappointing. There used to be only 1 vegetarian dish in the breakfast buffet. In the light dinner served in the evening, at the maximum there used to be only one vegetarian snack (however the restaurant staff did ensure vegetarian fried rice for us in the evenings on 2 days). Hence if you are looking at the hotel in terms of benefits (breakfast along with refreshments and light dinner), it does not exactly serve the purpose for pure

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Recommended
desc: Conveniently located, only a short walk away from Orchard road, all the malls and MRT station. Offers food all day, complementary dinner with alcoholic beverage, free content of minibar, free laundry service (2 items/day). Friendly staff. The only point to improve is information. Some information is vague or confusing (for example, they say to give in the laundry by 10:30am to receive it back the same day, but doesn't mention where/who to give it to, - or when we asked for a taxi and shared with them our plans for the evening, they didn't mention that half the city is closed down because of national day celebrations and we won't be able to get where we want to go, so we got stuck in traffic and wasted a whole evening).

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Recommend The Quincy
desc: Great smaller hotel near Orchard Road. A bonus was the inclusion of meals - we found the evening offerings just enough after a day out & the food was tasty & varied. Having drinks included was an absolute bonus.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay
desc: Booked on Agoda last minute. Efficient. Room modern and comfortable. Staff helpful, no fuss. Breakfast - good enough limited spread but good quality - better than some more expensive hotels. Would stay again if good deal from Agoda

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect Hotel
desc: My daughter and I spent a week in Singapore and loved our stay at the Quincy. Great location, wonderful staff and lots of nice extras. We enjoyed the breakfast and afternoon wine. Wonderful laundry service and a nice pool that let us cool off in the afternoon. Highly recommend this hotel.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Singapore trip
desc: Location and cleaness are the strength points of this hotel. Food quality is low level and the structure as a whole is, in my opinion, a little overlooked. It appears to be very best hotel in the past, but now it is just a medium quality hotel.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Clean and compact
desc: I liked this hotel and booked it on the merit of the reviews. However as we were spending most of our short holiday seeing the sights I realise an all inclusive hotel was not suited to our needs as we were unable to take advantage of the benefits we'd paid for, so we probably spent more than we needed to for our accommodation in singapore. That being said the positives include the very friendly staff, the very compact but lovely and clean pool (with gorgeous view), small gym and restaurant. I didnt enjoy the breakfast at all unfortunately, so we went out for breakfast instead the second day. I thought there would be a lot more choice and the tables are quite cramped in the small restaurant area. The bedroom was very clean and the bed very comfy with floor to ceiling window and

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Hotel and Great Service
desc: What a great hotel this is, first time stay but is now in our "favorite list" Rooms clean and tidy, Reception responsive, Mini bar included, Snacks all day. Would highly recommend this Hotel at the price See you again very soon

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Short getaway
desc: Planned for a simple and short weekend getaway from my busy work life. Chose this hotel for it's location and wanted to try somewhere different and new. The room i got has an excellent view during sunrise and sunset, a lil glaring in the noon though. But if you're looking for a hotel that's sightly off the city centre but still want the urban view, you should try this hotel.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic Hotel!
desc: My room was very clean and spacious. The room is also stocked with a small array of complimentary refreshments as well as having the option of free drinks and canapés down in the restaurant area in the evening. The breakfast is also quiet nice with a decent selection to choose from which also changed everyday so you don’t get bored! The staff in the hotel are extremely helpful and friendly and were very quick to assist me when I was having trouble with card slot in the room that would buzz loudly every time I inserted the card. The staff we’re quick to move me to a new room and offer free extended checkout for the inconvenience, to which I was very thankful for. Big thank you to Quincy Hotel and their staff for the extremely enjoyable stay. Will definitely come back! :)

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Superb stay in a superb hotel
desc: Probably the best hotel we have ever stayed in. Worth every penny! Singapore is an expensive city so the food and drink included in the price make all the difference. Service is courteous and attentive.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Top notch
desc: We stayed here last night and wow were we blown away. The service we received and inclusions we got such as drinks and food were amazing tea was excellent and so was breakfast. Don't experience this in Australia that's for sure and good location to orchard road. Highly recommend!affordable accommodation and everything is included!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Time for Us
desc: Time to have to wind down after very busy holiday. Singapore is so clean after some of the places we have visited We enjoyed our visit & asked our travel agent not to hesitate to include the Quincy hotel to thgrffi

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A great stay!
desc: The Quincy is the perfect choice for a city trip to Singapore with the family. The location is great, the pool is perfect for children and adults alike and the service offering (free meals; laundry) are perfect. We will come backQ

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: great stay great people
desc: great stay people friendly great rooms food was great pool had a view drinks cold mini bar was well stocked nothing to much trouble happy hours great great deal with 4 night stay staff looked after us

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Beautiful hotel tucked away from Orchard Road
desc: Stayed at this hotel several times over the last year. Staff are so lovely especially one lady who we saw on every trip who worked in the restaurant- wish I could remember your name. Hotel is clean, modern and comfortable. 5min walk away from Orchard Road. Lovely pool and gym area. Good breakfasts. Evening drinks served with light dinner type food every evening. Lovely place to stay.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Highly recommend
desc: The Quincy was recommended to us by friends who stayed there last year. Wow! What a fantastic hotel. 5 - 10 minute walk to Orchard Rd and MRT Orchard. The staff were very good, kind and nothing was too much trouble. The dining was very good, breakfast and dinner with drinks all great. The shopping was phenomenal in that area. Tangs Plaza, Orchard Ion, Paragon all at the end of the Rd.Highly recommend this hotel and would stay here again on our next visit to Singapore.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A must try Hotel with Great location and Hospitality
desc: Staff in every department is excellent especially in the dining area. Great Hospitality. Highly recommended. I was here with my wife for treatment in Mount Elizabeth Hospital. Excellent location. Very peaceful and was impressed with the care all the staff made us feel.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Stay
desc: Stayed for 2 nights during a recent business trip. Everything was catered for, from drying cleaning to mini bar to all day dining and evening cocktail drinks / light dinner. Conveniently located near Paragon Shopping centre and walking distance to Orchard or Somerset MRT stations.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Don't look any further for accommodation in Singapore - the Quincy Hotel has it all
desc: Excellent service, seemless check-in and check-out. Very clean, quiet and well equipped. Excellent offerings with Breakfast and Dinner included along with drinks until 8.30pm. Infinity pool offers great views and the gym is well eqiupped also. The hotel is very close to Orchard Road and the MRT.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Acceptable
desc: The location was very good, near by Orchard road which majority of shopping malls are located. They provide light meal in the evening and also som refreshment at noon which is good option for saving food cost. The pool and gym was acceptable and beneficial.The houskeeping service was on time. We ordered in-room service and found the food quality acceptable with quite reasonable price. The staff were not that much friendly. Breakfast was a bit simple, not so many choices which you might get bored after two days. There were no mattress in the gym. we experienced some difficulty with plug-ins in our room, after asking reception they provide us with one connecting adaptor which partially solved our problem.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: My choice is right.
desc: Facilities are very good hotel I had been stayed in Singapore. Light dinner is so okay for me. Location is easy to go shopping . Room service is more perfect than other hotel. Pool and gym are nice for health.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A fantastic hotel
desc: This was a wonderful hotel very close to orchard road and the underground station. The addition of free mini bar, snacks and food in the evening was amazing and the quality of the food superb. I would highly recommend and definitely use again

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Best value hotel
desc: Really enjoyed our stay here. Not only does it include the usual buffet breakfast. It also includes free coffee and cakes for afternoon tea and free dinner and drinks. This includes cocktails wine beer and spirits. The mini bar is also free as and is restocked daily. Quincy also gives guests 2 items of laundry per day free of charge. But perhaps my favorite feature is the Dairy Whip ice cream machine in the lobby. Perfect to indulge in after a day out shopping. Staff are courteous and helpful. Beds are a little on the firm side but this is a minor complaint. Highly recommended

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect hotel , perfect hospitality
desc: This hotel has been our best hotel stay ever.Our room was spacious and so very comfortable. Beautiful views from the 11 th floor made the room feel even bigger. The bathroom including the bath was also fabulous. We had such a warm welcome on arrival. Staff smoothly took our bags to our room and we had complimentary cocktails that are available each evening from 6:30-8:30. Complimentary full buffet breakfast was also just lovely. Thank you to staff at the Hotel Quincy-we shall return for sure.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Recommended
desc: Highly recommended place to stay. Staff are so helpful and accommodating., nothing is a problem. I have never stayed at a place where the beer,cocktails, afternoon refreshments, cakes, sweets, mini bar are all free. It has been a great place to stay and its a 5 minute walk to the shops on orchard road. The rooms r repally cool and the shower with the see through glass on both sides is different. You can watch tv while showering. I would rate this 9 out of 10.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Business trip to Singapore
desc: The Quincy hotel was a great experience being away from home.The ammenities included in the price were great. The location is central, close to Orchard road, however still quiet. Nice and clean rooms with many extras.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Staff. Building needs more maintenance
desc: This review covers our third and fourth stay at the Quincy. We booked a studio room and then a deluxe. The rooms included breakfast, afternoon tea, cocktails, light dinner. It also included two pieces of laundry per day per room as we booked directly with Stay Far East chain. We got the best rates by booking with them directly. Good The staff are exceptional. They are busy but always on the ball, attentive, responsive and helpful. If we had a problem they responded instantly. Service second to none. Great views from the rooms. Beds comfortable. Fridge in room is replenished with free drinks daily and nuts and crisps. Tea and coffee in room. Also downstairs in lobby throughout the day. You can also get a soft ice cream from machine in lobby throughout day. Nice to be

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic
desc: Where should i start? The room was perfect. Great pool. Free breakfast snacks all day free dinner and happy hour also free. Is this the reason for 5 star? No. It’s the staff. I didn’t get the name of the guy on reception but kit yin in the restaurant was 5 star. Highly recommend

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Quirky Hotel
desc: We stayed here in August 2019, for 4 nights, great value, close to shops and transport. Lovely room, nice breakfast, but the offer we had included a meal at night with drinks, great value. Room was great, and the staff were very friendly and helpful.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Birthday
desc: Absolutely loved this hotel! Small, quirky and perfect location for orchard road. Staff are fabulous, so friendly. Rooms are adequate in size, clean and comfy. Mini bar in the room is free, so added bonus! Loved the complimentary all day light refreshments and early evening free cocktails, also the buffet breakfast was delicious. This will be my first choice when we go to Singapore again!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel, great location
desc: My sister and i came to Singapore to celebrate my sister's birthday and we couldn't choose a better hotel for that. The location is perfect- 5 minutes from everything in Orchard and 5 minutes to a bus station that will take you everywhere. Breakfast is great and offers a lot of options that will fit different people. There is light refreshment all day long which is great. The room was big, which isn't a normal thing for hotels in this area, and it was super clean. The pool and gym are great as well and we really enjoyed them. The staff is amazing and they really made my sister's birthday special. Thank you!! In general i would highly recommend this hotel- you won't regret it.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Hospitable, comfortable and looked after stay
desc: -Great inclusive food -Good location -Great service Only negative is the restaurant staff should learn to respect and prioritise all guests (including that of south Asian descent) not only western guests. Ironic thing is, these staff members were also of south Asian descent. An element of neglect Nonetheless fantastic stay and great service provided by far east hospitality.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: The Quintessential Hotel Experience
desc: My husband and I had the distinct pleasure of spending 2 nights at the Quincy Hotel and our experience was absolutely flawless. From the handcrafted cocktail we were served upon arrival, to the impeccably clean room & facilities, and the unparalleled customer service. Our room was large, cool, well-appointed, with a spectacular view and the most comfortable pillows/bed we've ever slept on. There are just too many little added touches to mention... free minibar that's replenished daily, complimentary food and beverages in lobby, gorgeous infinity pool and outdoor gardens, laundry service; I could go on-and-on. This is by far the quietest and most sumptuous hotel we have ever stayed at - and we are quite well-traveled. Ironically, we moved over to a suite at the Marina Bay Sands

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: First time in Singapore
desc: Lovely friendly staff, good value and excellent location. Shopping malls and eateries of all budget within walking distance. (The hotel is on a gentle slope, so if you have trouble walking this is not for you.) MRT also close by so getting around was really easy. I recommend this hotel and would stay here again.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Quincy
desc: Great quiet location close to Scotts Road and Orchard Road. Short taxi ride over to Marina Bay area. Very friendly and efficient staff. Breakfast and snacks were high quality and chef was happy to oblige any request.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Home away from home
desc: I had a perfect stay at Quincy hotel. Very friendly staff, spacious room, many extras – especially the free dinner and drinks. Also the location close to Orchard MRT was good. Perfect place for women traveling on their own.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: First trip to Singapore
desc: Very pleasant stay. All Inclusive holiday to start our trip to Europe. Very clean rooms and staff very helpful. Close to hop on hop off bus and many restaurants and shopping centers. Nice and modern rooms.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Quincy is the Best
desc: The Quincy Hotel staff are so very friendly and helpful and it is easy walking distance to Orchard Road and all the shopping, eating and drinking that you will ever need. The complimentary mini bar set everything off and our room was outstanding. Happy hour every afternoon with complimentary drinks was a big plus and nibbles, tea and coffee all day was also very good.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Ice Cream Lover's Dream
desc: Stayed at The Quincy for 5 nights late August and could not have chosen a better hotel. From the moment we walked in all of the staff consistently went the extra yard. Particular thanks to Tonny and Madeline on Reception and Kit & Ravi in the restaurant/bar. Also thanks to the breakfast chef. The best scrambled eggs we have ever had in a hotel. The system used of constantly replenishing small servings to the serving dish meant the various offerings were not stewed and sitting for a long time. The overall included offerings of breakfast, light refreshments and evening light meals and drinks was excellent, AND, the piece de resistance was access to a self serve soft serve ice cream machine throughout the day and well into the evening, with chocolate and strawberry sauce. Simply

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great place to stay
desc: We didn't expect all the extras, we booked for breakfast, when we arrived we were told that we had all day food and drinks. Lovely food, lovely staff, we were treated very well and respectfully. We definitely would recommend this place and we would stay there again

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: No smile but extra service
desc: Staff is no smile and provide just essential their task. But they offer 2item dry cleaning as free of charge, free mini bar for soft drink and water, free evening drink and snack. Amenities are average nothing special.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent experience and will come back!
desc: Very convenient location! Fantastic and super friendly front desk check in service! Wonderful food and drink but limited cocktails choices. Clean room and toilet. Very comfortable bed and pillows and had good sleep like being home.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: The most generous hotel ever!
desc: We love the place. Superb food! The best staff from Check-in to buffet dinner.. They always make sure that we have enough food and drinks in our table. they are playful with our kids, foods are top-up non stop, the cocktails are great! We will come back for sure! Thank you...

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Service exceeds expectation
desc: Due to an episode prior to the staycation, I did not expect much from the 1 night stay at Quincy. However, the staff were warm, friendly with service that exceeded expectation. Special thanks to Bryson (sorry got your name wrong previously) for the friendly welcome and Tonny for the professional service and good gesture. I highly recommend this hotel for its good service, on top of its well-maintained amenities and cleanliness. Thank you Quincy Team for everything!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Fulfilling week long stay!
desc: Had a great time with my week of stay at Quincy! I was able to fully rest and relax after my minor surgery as everything I need is at Quincy, from food - breakfast to dinner, not to mention cocktails available in the evening, as part of complimentary benefits. The warm and accommodating hotel team made my stay more memorable - thanks to Bryson, Henessy, Alan, and Yin! Til next time! :) Alvin 407

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Very nice stay
desc: Stayed here as a solo traveller. Nice sized room compared to some other Singapore hotels. Huge bed, clean room with strong shower. Having food at the hotel was great and the cake and ice cream available throughout the day was a nice bonus! Pool and gym are open 24/7 and were almost always empty, so this is great for a solo traveller like me who wants to relax without noisy children running around everywhere. Hotel location is great with walking access to Newton Hawker and Orchard area. There are several MRT stations within walking distance so it is also easy to get around. Would definitely recommend this hotel if you can afford it.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: One night staycay
desc: Everything was inclusive which made the stay perfect. Staff were all very friendly and accommodating. Location was wonderful as it was minutes away from the shopping district (not that we needed to leave the property anyway).

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel
desc: Great location within a 5 min walk of Orchard MRT. Great service from all staff. Good breakfast and afternoon nibbles and a cold juice great after a day out. Free cocktails before an evening out made a great start to the evening. Our package also included 2 free pieces of laundry a day! Great bonus in the heat of Singapore. Would definitely stay here again.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Hotel in great location
desc: The Quincy Hotel not only offered accommodation, the cost also included breakfasts, light lunches and between 6p.m to 8.30p.m cocktails, wine, spirits and beer with a buffet dinner. The bar fridge was restocked daily, which mainly consisted of water and soft drink beverages. We have never experienced another hotel like the Quincy for service and additional extras at no additional cost.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A lovely stay
desc: My husband and I recently stayed at The Quincy and had a lovely stay. My husband stayed there in May and really liked it so when we had to be in Singapore again this past week we choose it again and were not disappointed. The staff is supper friendly and accommodating, The location was fantastic, close to everything we needed. I love the fact that all the amenities are included, like mini bar and in room snacks. They have a lovely morning breakfast buffet, daytime snacks and a wonderful evening buffet as well. I am almost loathe to give it too many stars as it is such a great value and it may be booked up the next time I need to be in Singapore!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Love, love, love this hotel
desc: We have stayed at the Quincy every year in August, since 2016. We love the staff who are always friendly and helpful. We love the cocktail hour, as anyone who has been to Singapore knows alcohol is not cheap here but when your hotel offers free drinks for 1 1/2hrs each evening you can’t complain. We love the location, just a short walk about 10minutes to the nearest MRT. My husband and I have travelled quite extensively and we are not easy to please, but the Quincy manages to tick all the boxes for us. Highly recommended.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: A wonderful hotel with amazing staff!
desc: From the check-in process, which was as helpful as any I've ever experienced, to the 3 am checkout where the staff went above and beyond to get us on our way promptly, staying at The Quincy was a delight. The rooms are very nice and roomy considering the cost of the hotel, and the bathroom was pleasingly modern. The hotel pool has good views over the city, and the steam room and sauna are very welcome features, along with a solid workout room. You won't go hungry at The Quincy: an excellent free breakfast, with western and local offerings and fabulous coffee, gives way to snacks and drinks available in the lounge until 6.30, when there are 2 hours of complimentary drinks and what they modestly call "light dinner;" on our first night at the hotel we were perfectly well-fed

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Stay at the Quincy
desc: I would highly recommend a stay at the Quincy hotel. First and foremost the service provided by the staff was outstanding, and consistently at a high standard. The staff was always ready to assist and go the extra mile above and beyond regular hotel services. As as example for one of the many items they assisted me with due to my unfamiliarity with using the coach system in Singapore, the staff took time out of their busy schedule to recommend multiple options for booking, walk me through the process and making the booking on my behalf. In addition to the great service, the complementary meals, cleanliness of the rooms, central location and overall hotel quality were also of a high standard. Without a question, I would return.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: one week in Singapore
desc: The location of the hotel is within walking distance to all transportation. The room is well equipped with all the amenities that are refilled everyday. The staff were great throughout the whole time to assist us from checking in to checking out. The staff at the lobby restaurant were excellent too during breakfast and night time snacks. The only suggestion would be if the hotel can provide more information about what to do and what to see in Singapore.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Hotel
desc: Really enjoyed my stay at this hotel. My only issues were with the hot water temperature (freezing) and the AC wasn't working fully. Apart from that it was a very nice stay and I would stay again for sure.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay
desc: My third stay at this wonderful hotel. With breakfast and all day snacks included it is hard to leave this place especially if you are suffering from jet lag. Why would you want to? The hotel is in a good quiet location - it's a safe neighbourhood in my view but then Singapore is very safe. I come through Singapore a lot and this has become my hotel of choice. Orchard Road is just a few minutes away. The breakfast is very good and the coffee excellent. The rooms are a decent size and have a good choice of television stations. Staff very pleasant and appear to enjoy and value their employment at Quincy. Hard to think of anything to complain about.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Good piace, modern hotel
desc: At 5 minut from Orchard road, modern hotel with very good services: pool 24/7 with towel, gym 24/7, refreshing buffet from 12 till 6. Clean room but not very silenziate room! Good quality of food, breakfast, room service and modesto’s restaurant!

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Close and remote
desc: Nice little hotel very close to the busy Orchard and Somerset Rds. Small pool and gym that works well if you're not looking for a long swimming session. Rooms are clean and fairly spacious for Singapore. Breakfast buffé was okey but nothing fancy and little variety. Good hotel to stay if you're business is in the area.

hotelname: Quincy Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
title: Love this hotel!
desc: Stayed here for 3 nights last week and was very impressed. This hotel is in a great location, just off Orchard road but nestled in a quiet tree lined street. Easy walking distance to anywhere or a very quick Grab ride. The rooms are extremely modern and I appreciated the complimentary mini bar. I don’t understand why there is only one beer provided though. There were 2 of us. The breakfast and complimentary all day snacks and evening beverages were amazing and staff were so generous. “Like a glass of red? Here, have a bottle”.. “Like another whisky tonight Sir before your snacks?” This was brilliant service and made me feel right at home. Also made it hard to leave the hotel and head out to other planned activities. Staff were all so friendly and helpful and were up for a
